agreement	O

Special	O
Auto	O
Endorsement	O
:	O

The	O
premium	O
charged	O
at	O
the	O
inception	O
of	O
the	O
policy	O
will	O
be	O
a	O
composite	O
rate	O
charged	O
against	O
the	O
initial	O
number	O
of	O
vehicles	O
reported	O
.	O

The	O
number	O
of	O
vehicles	O
,	O
when	O
used	O
as	O
a	O
premium	O
basis	O
for	O
auto	O
liability	O
means	O
any	O
vehicle	O
which	O
is	O
self	O
-	O
propelled	O
.	O

The	O
number	O
of	O
vehicles	O
,	O
when	O
used	O
as	O
a	O
premium	O
basis	O
for	O
auto	O
physical	O
damage	O
means	O
self	O
-	O
propelled	O
vehicles	O
and	O
trailers	O
.	O

The	O
policy	O
will	O
automatically	O
include	O
all	O
new	O
vehicles	O
throughout	O
the	O
year	O
with	O
no	O
need	O
to	O
report	O
or	O
endorsements	O
being	O
issued	O
.	O

At	O
the	O
conclusion	O
of	O
the	O
policy	O
year	O
,	O
a	O
final	O
vehicle	O
total	O
will	O
be	O
reported	O
.	O

The	O
final	O
premium	O
will	O
be	O
determined	O
by	O
totaling	O
the	O
beginning	O
and	O
ending	O
counts	O
,	O
dividing	O
this	O
by	O
two	O
(	O
averaging	O
)	O

this	O
by	O
the	O
composite	O
rate	O
.	O

may	O

,	O

.	O

GUITAR	O
CENTER	O
TRAVEL	O
&	O
BUSINESS	O
EXPENSE	O
POLICY	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
,	O
Inc.	O
(	O
“	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
”	O
or	O
“	O
GC	O
”	O
)	O
expects	O
all	O
associates	O
to	O
act	O
with	O
integrity	O
and	O
represent	O
the	O
company	O
’s	O
best	O
interests	O
at	O
all	O
times	O
,	O
including	O
while	O
traveling	O
on	O
business	O
,	O
using	O
corporate	O
credit	O
cards	O
,	O
along	O
with	O
submission	O
and	O
approval	O
of	O
expense	O
reports	O
.	O

This	O
document	O
sets	O
forth	O
minimum	O
policies	O
on	O
each	O
of	O
these	O
topics	O
.	O

Applicability	O
and	O
Responsibilities	O

Applicability	O
ALL	O
associates	O
employed	O
by	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
or	O
a	O
subsidiary	O
of	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
.	O
General	O
Principles	O

Guitar	O
Center	O
may	O
reimburse	O
authorized	O
associates	O
for	O
reasonable	O
and	O
necessary	O
business	O
expenses	O
at	O
the	O
discretion	O
of	O
the	O
approving	O
manager	O
,	O
as	O
outlined	O
in	O
policy	O
.	O

Local	O
management	O
may	O
,	O
at	O
its	O
discretion	O
,	O
impose	O
more	O
restrictive	O
policies	O
.	O

Responsibilities	O

Associate	O
-	O
Use	O
sound	O
judgment	O
,	O
spend	O
the	O
company	O
’s	O
funds	O
prudently	O
and	O
comply	O
with	O
travel	O
policies	O
and	O
procedures	O
.	O

-	O
Submit	O
accurate	O
expense	O
reports	O
and	O
required	O
receipts	O
on	O
a	O
timely	O
basis	O
.	O

Manager	O
-	O
Review	O
all	O
expense	O
reports	O
to	O
ensure	O
submitted	O
expenses	O
are	O
reasonable	O
,	O
supported	O
by	O
a	O
valid	O
business	O
purpose	O
and	O
comply	O
with	O
applicable	O
policies	O
.	O

Discrepancies	O
should	O
be	O
discussed	O
with	O
the	O
associate	O
and	O
violations	O
should	O
be	O
reported	O
to	O
the	O
appropriate	O
level	O
of	O
the	O
department	O
’s	O
management	O
.	O

-	O
Perform	O
thorough	O
review	O
of	O
expense	O
receipts	O
prior	O
to	O
approving	O
expense	O
reports	O
in	O
the	O
expense	O
reporting	O
system	O
(	O
People	O
Soft	O
)	O
.	O

Expense	O
department	O
will	O
conduct	O
periodic	O
audits	O
to	O
ensure	O
compliance	O
with	O
this	O
policy	O
.	O

TRAVEL	O
POLICIES	O
Reservation	O
Procedures	O
–	O

The	O
GC	O
Travel	O
department	O
and	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
’s	O
designated	O
online	O
booking	O
tool	O
are	O
for	O
business	O
travel	O
only	O
and	O
not	O
to	O
be	O
used	O
for	O
personal	O
travel	O
.	O

Only	O
travelers	O
with	O
corporate	O
credit	O
cards	O
can	O
book	O
through	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
’s	O
designated	O
online	O
booking	O
tool	O
.	O

Business	O
travel	O
reservations	O
will	O
be	O
made	O
as	O
far	O
in	O
advance	O
as	O
possible	O
to	O
take	O
advantage	O
of	O
advance	O
purchase	O
discounts	O
.	O

Advance	O
purchase	O
discounts	O
are	O
highest	O
when	O
booked	O
at	O
least	O
21	O
days	O
in	O
advance	O
.	O

Travel	O
reservations	O
must	O
be	O
made	O
with	O
the	O
associate	O
’s	O
legal	O
name	O
.	O

Corporate	O
card	O
holders	O
–	O

All	O
business	O
travel	O
arrangements	O
are	O
required	O
to	O
be	O
made	O
through	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
’s	O
designated	O
on	O
-	O
line	O
booking	O
tool	O
,	O
Concur	O
.	O

Corporate	O
card	O
holders	O
are	O
required	O
to	O
have	O
a	O
travel	O
profile	O
in	O
Concur	O
,	O
created	O
by	O
the	O
GC	O
Travel	O
department	O
.	O

It	O
is	O
the	O
associate	O
’s	O
responsibility	O
to	O
maintain	O
current	O
travel	O
profile	O
information	O
.	O

request	O
a	O
travel	O

.	O

.	O

Preferred	O
Carriers	O
–	O
Travelers	O
are	O
required	O
to	O
use	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
’s	O
preferred	O
providers	O
for	O
air	O
,	O
car	O
and	O
hotel	O
as	O
identified	O
in	O
Concur	O
.	O

Using	O
non-preferred	O
carriers	O
negatively	O
impacts	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
’s	O
ability	O
to	O
negotiate	O
favorable	O
terms	O
and	O
increases	O
overall	O
travel	O
spend	O
.	O

Frequent	O
Flyer	O
Memberships	O
and	O
Loyalty	O
Programs	O
–	O
Associates	O
may	O
retain	O
the	O
benefits	O
of	O
awards	O
or	O
loyalty	O
programs	O
earned	O
while	O
on	O
business	O
travel	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
it	O
is	O
unacceptable	O
to	O
insist	O
on	O
a	O
particular	O
airline	O
or	O
hotel	O
solely	O
because	O
it	O
will	O
enable	O
the	O
associate	O
to	O
earn	O
more	O
personal	O
rewards	O
.	O

Any	O
membership	O
fees	O
for	O
joining	O
such	O
programs	O
or	O
clubs	O
are	O
the	O
associate	O
’s	O
personal	O
financial	O
responsibility	O
.	O

Group	O
,	O
Training	O
and	O
Meeting	O
Travel	O
Reservation	O
Procedures	O
–	O

All	O
group	O
,	O
training	O
and	O
meeting	O
travel	O
(	O
including	O
air	O
,	O
rail	O
,	O
hotel	O
,	O
rental	O
car	O
,	O
shuttle	O
transportation	O
,	O
and	O
meeting	O
space	O
)	O
,	O
must	O
be	O
arranged	O
through	O
the	O
GC	O
Travel	O
Department	O
.	O

Group	O
,	O
training	O
and	O
meeting	O
travel	O
is	O
defined	O
as	O
five	O
or	O
more	O
associates	O
traveling	O
to	O
the	O
same	O
destination	O
.	O

The	O
GC	O
Travel	O
department	O
will	O
select	O
and	O
negotiate	O
group	O
travel	O
with	O
company	O
preferred	O
vendors	O
.	O

All	O
hotel	O
reward	O
points	O
generated	O
by	O
group	O
,	O
training	O
and	O
meeting	O
travel	O
belong	O
to	O
the	O
company	O
and	O
are	O
not	O
available	O
for	O
individual	O
award	O
to	O
an	O
associate	O
.	O

Contact	O
GC	O
Travel	O
Department	O
for	O
appropriate	O
group	O
travel	O
request	O
forms	O
.	O

Changes	O
and	O
Cancellations	O
–	O
Associates	O
are	O
expected	O
to	O
thoroughly	O
read	O
and	O
understand	O
all	O
restrictions	O
in	O
connection	O
with	O
their	O
travel	O
reservations	O
.	O

Change	O
fees	O
that	O
are	O
unnecessary	O
or	O
excessive	O
may	O
be	O
deemed	O
a	O
personal	O
expense	O
to	O
the	O
associate	O
.	O

Changes	O
–	O

Any	O
travel	O
changes	O
require	O
the	O
same	O
route	O
of	O
approval	O
as	O
booking	O
the	O
original	O
travel	O
.	O

Cancellations	O
–	O
Associates	O
must	O
cancel	O
prior	O
to	O
departure	O
to	O
avoid	O
the	O
loss	O
of	O
the	O
entire	O
airline	O
ticket	O
value	O
or	O
incurring	O
hotel	O
“	O
no	O
-	O
show	O
”	O
charges	O
.	O

Reservations	O
booked	O
in	O
Concur	O
can	O
be	O
canceled	O
in	O
Concur	O
.	O

of	O
travel	O

GC	O

Department	O
,	O
contact	O
GC	O
Travel	O
.	O

–	O

Center	O

.	O

Air	O
Travel	O
Airline	O
Class	O
of	O
Service	O
–	O

is	O
the	O
manager	O
’s	O
responsibility	O
to	O
review	O
the	O

and	O
reasonableness	O
of	O
the	O

’s	O
travel	O
and	O
selected	O
class	O
of	O
service	O
.	O

Business	O

or	O
Premium	O
Economy	O
and	O
purchase	O
of	O
premium	O
seats	O
will	O
only	O
be	O
used	O
as	O
necessary	O
and	O
in	O
accordance	O
with	O
this	O
policy	O
.	O

All	O
air	O
travel	O
requires	O
pre-approval	O
by	O
a	O
VP	O
and	O
SVP	O
/	O
EVP	O
.	O

Domestic	O
travel	O
booked	O
through	O
Concur	O
will	O
automatically	O
be	O
routed	O
to	O
the	O
appropriate	O
VP	O
and	O
SVP	O
/	O
EVP	O
for	O
approvals	O
.	O

International	O
and	O
non-card	O
holder	O
travel	O
will	O
be	O
booked	O
through	O
GC	O
Travel	O
using	O
the	O
appropriate	O
travel	O
forms	O
.	O

General	O
guidelines	O
:	O

Domestic	O
–	O
First	O
and	O
Business	O
class	O
travel	O
is	O
prohibited	O
for	O
domestic	O
travel	O
.	O

Premium	O
seats	O
(	O
eg.	O
comfort	O
,	O
aisle	O
,	O
extra	O
leg	O
room	O
,	O
etc.	O
)	O
–	O

With	O
VP	O
and	O
EVP	O
approval	O
,	O
associates	O
may	O
purchase	O
premium	O
seats	O
at	O
the	O
time	O
of	O
booking	O
when	O
the	O
flight	O
time	O
on	O
a	O
single	O
leg	O
of	O
the	O
trip	O
exceeds	O
four	O
hours	O
.	O

International	O
–	O
All	O
international	O
travel	O
requires	O
CEO	O
approval	O
.	O

International	O
travel	O
must	O
be	O
booked	O
through	O
the	O
GC	O
Travel	O
Department	O
.	O

All	O
intercontinental	O
flights	O
will	O
be	O
booked	O
in	O
economy	O
class	O
.	O

When	O
the	O
single	O
leg	O
of	O
a	O
trip	O
exceeds	O
eight	O
hours	O
,	O
traveler	O
may	O
be	O
booked	O
in	O
business	O
class	O
or	O
premium	O
economy	O
*	O
.	O

Trip	O
segments	O
under	O
eight	O
hours	O
will	O
be	O
booked	O
in	O
economy	O
class	O
.	O

-	O
4	O
-	O
Rev	O
12/28/2016	O

*	O
Business	O
Class	O
vs.	O
Premium	O
Economy	O
–	O
on	O
certain	O
airlines	O
where	O
a	O
premium	O
economy	O
cabin	O
is	O
available	O
,	O
premium	O
economy	O
may	O
be	O
a	O

to	O
business	O
class	O
and	O
should	O
be	O
considered	O
when	O
business	O
class	O
is	O
authorized	O
.	O

Upgrades	O
for	O
Air	O
Travel	O
–	O

Domestic	O
–	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
will	O
not	O
reimburse	O
associates	O
for	O
the	O
cost	O
of	O
any	O
domestic	O
upgrade	O
.	O

Selecting	O
a	O
more	O
expensive	O
economy	O
class	O
ticket	O
for	O
upgrading	O
purposes	O
is	O
prohibited	O
,	O
except	O
as	O
provided	O
above	O
.	O

International	O
–	O
When	O
a	O
flight	O
qualifies	O
for	O
a	O
business	O
class	O
ticket	O
as	O
indicated	O
above	O
,	O
associates	O
must	O
first	O
attempt	O
to	O
secure	O
an	O
upgrade	O
through	O
GC	O
Travel	O
.	O

Guitar	O
Center	O
may	O
have	O
access	O
to	O
a	O
limited	O
number	O
of	O
upgrade	O
certificates	O
.	O

Lowest	O
logical	O
airfare	O
–	O
Associates	O
will	O
book	O
the	O
lowest	O
possible	O
airfare	O
for	O
all	O
business	O
travel	O
using	O
the	O
cost	O
savings	O
methods	O
listed	O
below	O
.	O

?	O

Make	O
reservations	O
as	O
early	O
as	O
possible	O
(	O
i.e.	O
at	O
least	O
21	O
days	O
in	O
advance	O
)	O
to	O
take	O
advantage	O
of	O
advance	O
purchase	O
discounts	O
;	O

?	O

Always	O
book	O
nonrefundable	O
tickets	O
;	O

?	O

Use	O
a	O
flexible	O
time	O
window	O
,	O
connecting	O
one	O
-	O
stop	O
flights	O
and	O
alternative	O
airports	O
;	O

?	O

Use	O
company	O
preferred	O
carriers	O
and	O
do	O
not	O
request	O
a	O
specific	O
airline	O
based	O
on	O
personal	O
preference	O
or	O
frequent	O
flyer	O
membership	O
.	O

Unused	O
Airline	O
Tickets	O
–	O

If	O
you	O
cancel	O
your	O
flight	O
prior	O
to	O
your	O
scheduled	O
departure	O
,	O
your	O
non-refundable	O
ticket	O
will	O
be	O
applied	O
towards	O
future	O
travel	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
neglect	O
to	O
cancel	O
your	O
flight	O
prior	O
to	O
departure	O
,	O
the	O
airlines	O
can	O
suspend	O
your	O
ticket	O
and	O
you	O
will	O
forfeit	O
your	O
future	O
credit	O
.	O

Associates	O
are	O
responsible	O
for	O
ensuring	O
unused	O
tickets	O
are	O
redeemed	O
when	O
booking	O
subsequent	O
travel	O
to	O
take	O
advantage	O
of	O
these	O
credits	O
.	O

Airlines	O
do	O
not	O
allow	O
name	O
changes	O
on	O
purchased	O
airline	O
tickets	O
.	O

Inflight	O
Internet	O
Use	O
–	O

The	O
purchase	O
of	O
inflight	O
Wi	O
-	O
Fi	O
while	O
on	O
business	O
travel	O
requires	O
prior	O
VP	O
approval	O
.	O

Most	O
airlines	O
offer	O
monthly	O
service	O
plans	O
.	O

With	O
VP	O
approval	O
,	O
high	O
frequency	O
travelers	O
may	O
secure	O
a	O
monthly	O
service	O
plan	O
through	O
the	O
airline	O
carrier	O
to	O
reduce	O
costs	O
.	O

Passports	O
,	O
Visas	O
,	O
Permits	O
–	O

With	O
pre-approval	O
from	O
department	O
VP	O
and	O
Human	O
Resources	O
,	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
will	O
reimburse	O
associates	O
for	O
passports	O
,	O
visas	O
or	O
permits	O
required	O
for	O
international	O
business	O
travel	O
.	O

Baggage	O
Fees	O
or	O
Lost	O
Baggage	O
–	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
will	O
reimburse	O
for	O
one	O
checked	O
bag	O
per	O
flight	O
.	O

Additional	O
baggage	O
charges	O
are	O
not	O
reimbursable	O
unless	O
required	O
for	O
business	O
purposes	O
.	O

It	O
is	O
the	O
associate	O
’s	O
responsibility	O
to	O
demonstrate	O
the	O
necessity	O
of	O
additional	O
baggage	O
.	O

Guitar	O
Center	O
does	O
not	O
reimburse	O
for	O
lost	O
or	O
damaged	O
baggage	O
or	O
replace	O
baggage	O
contents	O
.	O

GROUND	O
TRANSPORTATION	O
Taxis	O
or	O
shuttles	O
–	O

Use	O
of	O
taxis	O
or	O
shuttles	O
for	O
travel	O
to	O
and	O
from	O
local	O
airports	O
is	O
allowed	O
when	O
they	O
are	O
the	O
most	O
cost-effective	O
means	O
of	O
transportation	O
.	O

Auto	O
Rental	O
–	O

Automobiles	O
will	O
be	O
rented	O
only	O
when	O
taxis	O
,	O
shuttles	O
or	O
public	O
transportation	O
are	O
impractical	O
,	O
more	O
expensive	O
,	O
or	O
not	O
available	O
.	O

Guitar	O
Center	O
policy	O
is	O
to	O
rent	O
a	O
midsize	O
car	O
.	O

The	O
next	O
size	O
car	O
class	O
is	O
permitted	O
when	O
three	O
or	O
more	O
associates	O
are	O
traveling	O
together	O
.	O

It	O
is	O
the	O
associate	O
’s	O
responsibility	O
to	O
ensure	O
they	O
are	O
in	O
possession	O
of	O
a	O
current	O
driver	O
license	O
.	O

Rental	O
Car	O
Upgrades	O
–	O
Associates	O
are	O
encouraged	O
to	O
join	O
the	O
company	O
preferred	O
rental	O
car	O
provider	O
frequent	O
renter	O
program	O
.	O

The	O
link	O
to	O
this	O
program	O
is	O
available	O
on	O
your	O
homepage	O
in	O
Concur	O
.	O

This	O
program	O
offers	O
associates	O
special	O
promotions	O
such	O
as	O
upgrades	O
and	O
expedited	O
service	O
.	O

-	O
5	O
-	O
Rev	O
12/28/2016	O

GPS	O
Devices	O
–	O

The	O
cost	O
of	O
a	O
GPS	O
device	O
in	O
a	O
rental	O
car	O
is	O
not	O
reimbursable	O
.	O

Associates	O
should	O
obtain	O
directions	O
for	O
the	O
trip	O
by	O
accessing	O
a	O
mapping	O
website	O
.	O

Cellular	O
phones	O
may	O
also	O
have	O
GPS	O
capability	O
or	O
access	O
to	O
mapping	O
websites	O
.	O

Rental	O
Insurance	O
–	O
Associates	O
will	O
decline	O
all	O
insurance	O
for	O
domestic	O
auto	O
rentals	O
.	O

Guitar	O
Center	O
insurance	O
includes	O
both	O
liability	O
and	O
physical	O
damage	O
to	O
the	O
vehicle	O
.	O

Additional	O
insurance	O
on	O
domestic	O
auto	O
rentals	O
is	O
not	O
reimbursable	O
.	O

If	O
an	O
auto	O
is	O
rented	O
while	O
traveling	O
internationally	O
,	O
insurance	O
must	O
be	O
accepted	O
.	O

Rental	O
Car	O
Refueling	O
–	O
Associates	O
are	O
responsible	O
for	O
refueling	O
a	O
rented	O
vehicle	O
with	O
regular	O
grade	O
fuel	O
prior	O
to	O
returning	O
the	O
vehicle	O
.	O

Fuel	O
service	O
options	O
and	O
excessive	O
refueling	O
fees	O
charged	O
by	O
the	O
rental	O
car	O
company	O
are	O
not	O
reimbursable	O
.	O

Rental	O
Car	O
Accidents	O
–	O

In	O
case	O
of	O
an	O
accident	O
,	O
travelers	O
should	O
first	O
contact	O
the	O
police	O
for	O
an	O
accident	O
report	O
,	O
then	O
the	O
car	O
rental	O
company	O
to	O
complete	O
an	O
accident	O
/	O
damage	O
report	O
.	O

Associates	O
are	O
strongly	O
encouraged	O
to	O
retain	O
a	O
copy	O
of	O
the	O
accident	O
report	O
for	O
their	O
records	O
.	O

Contact	O
GC	O
Travel	O
after	O
completing	O
the	O
steps	O
above	O
so	O
they	O
can	O
provide	O
the	O
information	O
to	O
the	O
insurance	O
company	O
to	O
ensure	O
the	O
claim	O
is	O
resolved	O
quickly	O
.	O

Parking	O
fees	O
and	O
tolls	O
–	O
Long	O
-	O
term	O
or	O
off	O
-	O
airport	O
parking	O
will	O
be	O
used	O
when	O
possible	O
.	O

Self	O
-	O
parking	O
will	O
be	O
used	O
for	O
hotel	O
and	O
restaurant	O
parking	O
.	O

When	O
self	O
-	O
parking	O
is	O
available	O
,	O
valet	O
parking	O
is	O
not	O
reimbursable	O
without	O
VP	O
and	O
SVP	O
/	O
EVP	O
approval	O
.	O

Personal	O
Auto	O
–	O
Associates	O
may	O
use	O
a	O
personal	O
car	O
for	O
business	O
purposes	O
if	O
it	O
is	O
less	O
expensive	O
than	O
renting	O
a	O
car	O
,	O
or	O
taking	O
alternative	O
transportation	O
.	O

The	O
company	O
will	O
reimburse	O
the	O
associate	O
for	O
mileage	O
incurred	O
at	O
the	O
current	O
IRS	O
specified	O
rate	O
.	O

Mileage	O
reimbursement	O
is	O
considered	O
to	O
be	O
inclusive	O
of	O
gas	O
,	O
auto	O
insurance	O
,	O
repairs	O
and	O
all	O
other	O
automobile	O
operating	O
costs	O
.	O

It	O
is	O
the	O
associate	O
’s	O
responsibility	O
to	O
carry	O
a	O
current	O
driver	O
license	O
.	O

It	O
is	O
the	O
responsibility	O
of	O
the	O
vehicle	O
owner	O
to	O
inform	O
their	O
personal	O
insurance	O
carrier	O
that	O
they	O
use	O
the	O
vehicle	O
in	O
the	O
course	O
of	O
employment	O
and	O
to	O
carry	O
adequate	O
coverage	O
for	O
their	O
protection	O
and	O
for	O
the	O
protection	O
of	O
other	O
passengers	O
.	O

Required	O
coverage	O
is	O
no	O
less	O
than	O
$	O
300,000	O
combined	O
(	O
liability	O
,	O
comprehensive	O
and	O
collision	O
)	O
single	O
limit	O
.	O

Mileage	O
-	O
Only	O
miles	O
exceeding	O
normal	O
daily	O
round	O
trip	O
commute	O
will	O
be	O
reimbursed	O
.	O

Should	O
an	O
associate	O
be	O
required	O
(	O
or	O
if	O
it	O
is	O
more	O
practical	O
)	O
to	O
travel	O
from	O
home	O
to	O
an	O
alternative	O
work	O
destination	O
,	O
the	O
associate	O
may	O
only	O
request	O
reimbursement	O
for	O
miles	O
exceeding	O
the	O
normal	O
daily	O
commute	O
.	O

Gas	O
reimbursement	O
in	O
lieu	O
of	O
mileage	O
is	O
prohibited	O
.	O

Reservations	O
–	O

reservations	O

Director	O
,	O
VP	O
,	O
or	O
SVP	O
/	O
EVP	O
.	O

Center	O
encourages	O
associates	O
to	O
share	O
rooms	O
in	O
order	O
to	O
reduce	O
costs	O
.	O

Guitar	O
Center	O
may	O
require	O
associates	O
to	O
share	O
rooms	O
for	O
group	O
travel	O
.	O

Associates	O
will	O
use	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
preferred	O
hotels	O
.	O

For	O
cities	O
without	O
preferred	O
hotels	O
,	O

rate	O
hotel	O
will	O
be	O
selected	O
.	O

The	O

of	O

or	O
luxury	O
rooms	O
is	O
prohibited	O
.	O

on	O
a	O

’s	O
website	O
for	O
any	O
reason	O
is	O
prohibited	O
.	O

for	O

service	O
is	O

in	O
the	O
rate	O
.	O

Personal	O
Hotel	O
Charges	O
–	O
Personal	O
expenses	O
incurred	O
at	O
hotels	O
include	O
,	O
but	O
are	O
not	O

to	O
,	O

,	O

bar	O
,	O
spa	O
services	O
,	O
sundries	O
,	O
etc	O
.	O

Associates	O
are	O
prohibited	O
from	O

for	O

a	O

card	O
.	O

Personal	O

.	O

Meal	O
Guidelines	O

of	O
travel	O
meals	O

to	O

per	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

CORPORATE	O
CREDIT	O
CARD	O
POLICIES	O
Associates	O
who	O
frequently	O
travel	O
on	O
business	O
will	O
be	O
issued	O
a	O
corporate	O
credit	O
card	O
.	O

A	O
corporate	O
credit	O
card	O
may	O
only	O
be	O
used	O
for	O
business	O
purposes	O
.	O

The	O
issuance	O
of	O
a	O
corporate	O
credit	O
card	O
is	O
both	O
a	O
privilege	O
and	O
a	O
responsibility	O
.	O

Abuse	O
of	O
the	O
policies	O
relating	O
to	O
the	O
use	O
of	O
the	O
card	O
could	O
result	O
in	O
revocation	O
of	O
the	O
corporate	O
credit	O
card	O
and	O
disciplinary	O
action	O
up	O
to	O
and	O
including	O
termination	O
of	O
employment	O
.	O

Responsibilities	O

Guitar	O
Center	O
corporate	O
credit	O
cards	O
are	O
company	O
paid	O
and	O
company	O
liability	O
.	O

Wells	O
Fargo	O
is	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
’s	O
current	O
corporate	O
credit	O
card	O
provider	O
.	O

A	O
corporate	O
credit	O
card	O
application	O
requires	O
VP	O
signed	O
approval	O
,	O
and	O
can	O
be	O
found	O
on	O
backstage	O
:	O
Departments	O
-	O
Travel	O
/	O
Expense	O
Control	O
-	O
Document	O
library	O

Manager	O
Authorize	O
Cardholders	O
-	O
Corporate	O
credit	O
card	O
issuance	O
requires	O
Vice	O
President	O
approval	O
Termination	O
of	O
Employment	O

an	O
associate	O
leaves	O
the	O
company	O
,	O
the	O
manager	O
will	O
:	O
-	O

from	O

;	O
-	O

all	O
outstanding	O
expenses	O
and	O
supporting	O
documentation	O
have	O
been	O
submitted	O
.	O

Expense	O
Reports	O
-	O

associate	O

not	O

associate	O

notification	O
or	O
charge	O

suspension	O

.	O

/	O

/	O

credit	O
card	O
privileges	O

.	O

,	O

/	O

SVP	O
/	O
EVP	O

Declined	O
Charges	O
–	O

In	O
the	O
event	O
a	O
valid	O
business	O
transaction	O
is	O
declined	O
and	O
the	O
associate	O
has	O
not	O
received	O
notification	O
from	O
the	O
Expense	O
Department	O
of	O
suspension	O
,	O
the	O
associate	O
will	O
call	O
Wells	O
Fargo	O
at	O
1-800-932-0036	O
to	O
learn	O
the	O
reason	O
for	O
the	O
decline	O
.	O

For	O
security	O
and	O
verification	O
purposes	O
,	O
an	O
associate	O
will	O
be	O
asked	O
for	O
their	O
unique	O
ID	O
which	O
is	O
the	O
last	O
four	O
digits	O
of	O
their	O
associate	O
ID	O
number	O
.	O

Possible	O
reasons	O
for	O
decline	O
include	O
but	O
are	O
not	O
limited	O
to	O
:	O
available	O
credit	O
;	O
merchant	O
error	O
in	O
entering	O
correct	O
information	O
(	O
card	O
number	O
,	O
expiration	O
date	O
,	O
etc.	O
)	O
;	O
merchant	O
not	O
permitted	O
under	O
Guitar	O
Center	O
’s	O
assigned	O
MCC	O
purchasing	O
strategy	O
;	O
or	O
possible	O
fraudulent	O
transactions	O
.	O

In	O
the	O
event	O
of	O
potential	O
fraud	O
,	O
the	O
associate	O
can	O
clear	O
any	O
issues	O
regarding	O
the	O
questionable	O
transactions	O
.	O

For	O
all	O
other	O
reasons	O
,	O
the	O
associate	O
will	O
be	O
instructed	O
to	O
contact	O
the	O
corporate	O
credit	O
card	O
program	O
administrator	O
.	O

REPORTING	O
AND	O
DOCUMENTATION	O

Receipts	O
–	O
Associates	O
will	O
attach	O
receipts	O
to	O
their	O
expense	O
reports	O
in	O
PeopleSoft	O
.	O

Receipts	O
are	O
required	O
for	O
all	O
meal	O
expenses	O
regardless	O
of	O
the	O
amount	O
.	O

Providing	O
a	O
receipt	O
for	O
non-meal	O
related	O
expenses	O
is	O
considered	O
best	O
practice	O
and	O
may	O
be	O
required	O
by	O
the	O
approving	O
manager	O
,	O
but	O
is	O
required	O
by	O
the	O
Expense	O
Department	O
and	O
the	O
IRS	O
for	O
expenses	O
greater	O
than	O
$	O
50	O
.	O

For	O
air	O
travel	O
,	O
attach	O
the	O
e-invoice	O
received	O
in	O
the	O
Travel	O
and	O
Transport	O
travel	O
confirmation	O
.	O

See	O
Appendix	O

A	O
,	O
Expense	O
Documentation	O
for	O
a	O
chart	O
listing	O
reimbursable	O
expenses	O
and	O
documentation	O
requirements	O
.	O

Meals	O
–	O
Business	O
travel	O
meals	O
will	O
be	O
categorized	O
on	O
an	O
expense	O
report	O
in	O
PeopleSoft	O
as	O
Trvl	O
-	O
Breakfast	O
,	O
Trvl	O
-	O
Lunch	O
or	O
Trvl	O
-	O
Dinner	O
.	O

travel	O
meal	O
expense	O

for	O
others	O
,	O

of	O

the	O
expense	O
report	O
.	O

charged	O
to	O

’s	O

and	O

separately	O

the	O
room	O
and	O
tax	O
charges	O
.	O

will	O

PeopleSoft	O
as	O
Ent-Breakfast	O
,	O
Ent-Lunch	O
,	O
Ent-	O

.	O

MUSIC	O
&	O
ARTS	O
FLEET	O
POLICY	O

Music	O
&	O
Arts	O
(	O
MA	O
)	O
considers	O
the	O
safety	O
and	O
health	O
of	O
its	O
employees	O
to	O
be	O
of	O
prime	O
importance	O
.	O

Some	O
employees	O
operate	O

company	O
owned	O
,	O
leased	O
,	O
rental	O
or	O
personal	O
vehicles	O
as	O
part	O
of	O
their	O
jobs	O
.	O

Employees	O
are	O
expected	O
to	O
operate	O
and	O
maintain	O
vehicles	O

safely	O
to	O
prevent	O
accidents	O
,	O
which	O
may	O
result	O
in	O
injuries	O
or	O
property	O
loss	O
.	O

DRIVER	O
ELIGIBILITY	O

1	O
.	O

After	O
completion	O
and	O
approval	O
of	O
driver	O
eligibility	O
background	O
checks	O
;	O
only	O
qualified	O
drivers	O
,	O
may	O
drive	O
a	O

company	O
owned	O
vehicle	O
.	O

2	O
.	O

HR	O
and	O
the	O
Fleet	O
Coordinator	O
will	O
run	O
an	O
annual	O
MVR	O
review	O
of	O
all	O
authorized	O
drivers	O
.	O

If	O
the	O
MVR	O
review	O
process	O
indicates	O
that	O
a	O
driver	O
has	O
a	O
marginal	O
driving	O
record	O
;	O
reviews	O
will	O
be	O
done	O
quarterly	O
.	O

If	O
the	O
review	O

indicates	O
that	O
the	O
driver	O
is	O
no	O
longer	O
acceptable	O
;	O
driver	O
and	O
management	O
will	O
be	O
notified	O
immediately	O
.	O

A.	O
Specific	O
standards	O
include	O
:	O

1	O
.	O

Company	O
vehicles	O
are	O
to	O
be	O
driven	O
by	O
authorized	O
employees	O
only	O
,	O
except	O
in	O
case	O
of	O
repair	O
testing	O
by	O
a	O
mechanic	O
.	O

2	O
.	O

Company	O
vehicles	O
can	O
not	O
be	O
driven	O
by	O
non	O
-MA	O
employees	O
,	O
including	O
the	O
authorized	O
driver	O
’s	O
family	O
members	O
.	O

3	O
.	O

Any	O
employee	O
who	O
has	O
a	O
revoked	O
or	O
suspended	O
driver	O
's	O
license	O
shall	O
immediately	O
notify	O
their	O
manager	O
,	O
the	O
Fleet	O
Coordinator	O
,	O
and	O
discontinue	O
operation	O
of	O
the	O
company	O
vehicle	O
.	O

Failure	O
to	O
do	O
so	O
may	O
result	O
in	O
disciplinary	O
action	O
,	O

up	O
to	O
and	O
including	O
dismissal	O
.	O

4	O
.	O

All	O
accidents	O
,	O
regardless	O
of	O
severity	O
,	O
must	O
be	O
reported	O
to	O
the	O
police	O
,	O
insurance	O
company	O
,	O
Fleet	O
Coordinator	O
,	O
and	O
immediate	O
supervisor	O
.	O

Failing	O
to	O
stop	O
after	O
an	O
accident	O
and	O
/	O
or	O
failure	O
to	O
report	O
an	O
accident	O
may	O
result	O
in	O

disciplinary	O
action	O
,	O
up	O
to	O
and	O
including	O
dismissal	O
.	O

5	O
.	O

Drivers	O
must	O
immediately	O
report	O
all	O
moving	O
violations	O
during	O
the	O
operation	O
of	O
a	O
company	O
vehicle	O
or	O
their	O
own	O
personal	O
vehicle	O
to	O
the	O
Fleet	O
Coordinator	O
at	O
4626	O
Wedgewood	O
Blvd.	O

Frederick	O
,	O
MD	O
21703	O
.	O

Phone	O
#	O
:	O
301-620-	O

4040	O

1028	O
or	O
fleetcoordinator@musicarts.com	O
.	O

Violations	O
that	O
occur	O
when	O
the	O
driver	O
is	O
operating	O
their	O

personal	O
vehicle	O
will	O
effect	O
on	O
their	O
driving	O
record	O
which	O
could	O
make	O
them	O
ineligible	O
for	O
coverage	O
under	O

MA	O
’s	O

insurance	O
policy	O

6	O
.	O

All	O
drivers	O
must	O
comply	O
with	O
all	O
applicable	O
D.O.T	O
.	O

Regulations	O
,	O
including	O
successful	O

of	O

,	O

,	O
and	O

.	O

.	O

are	O

(	O

Weight	O
Rating	O
)	O
over	O
26,001	O
lbs	O
.	O

b	O
.	O

Any	O

GVWR	O
over	O
10,000	O
lbs	O

and	O
card	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

DRIVER	O
RESPONSIBILITIES	O

A	O
.	O
DRIVERS	O
WILL	O
:	O
1	O
.	O
Always	O
operate	O
a	O
motor	O
vehicle	O
in	O
a	O
safe	O
manner	O
consistent	O
with	O
the	O
applicable	O
federal	O
,	O
state	O
and	O
/	O
or	O
city	O
motor	O

vehicle	O
laws	O
and	O
regulations	O
.	O

2	O
.	O
Maintain	O
a	O
valid	O
driver	O
’s	O
license	O
and	O
minimum	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
of	O
$	O
15,000	O
per	O
person	O
/	O
$	O
30,000	O
per	O
accident	O
/	O
$	O
10,000	O
Property	O
Damage	O
,	O
$	O
15,000	O
per	O
person	O
/	O
$	O
30,000	O
per	O
accident	O
Uninsured	O
/	O
Underinsured	O
Motorist	O

coverage	O
and	O
$	O
1,000	O
medical	O
payments	O
on	O
a	O
personal	O
vehicle	O
when	O
their	O
job	O
requirement	O
includes	O
use	O
of	O
a	O

personal	O
vehicle	O
in	O
company	O
business	O

3	O
.	O

Comply	O
with	O
the	O
following	O
safety	O
rules	O
a.	O

Hands	O

Free	O
devices	O
are	O
required	O
if	O
using	O
wireless	O
devices	O
while	O
operating	O
a	O
company	O
vehicle	O
.	O

If	O
state	O

law	O
does	O
not	O
allow	O
hands	O
free	O
devices	O
,	O
the	O
driver	O
is	O
expected	O
to	O
follow	O
state	O
law	O
.	O

b	O
.	O

No	O
driver	O
shall	O
operate	O
a	O
company	O
vehicle	O
when	O
his	O
/	O
her	O
ability	O
to	O
do	O
so	O
safely	O
has	O
been	O
impaired	O
by	O
intoxicants	O
,	O
illness	O
,	O
fatigue	O
,	O
injury	O
,	O
or	O
prescription	O
medication	O
.	O

c	O
.	O

All	O
drivers	O
and	O
passengers	O
operating	O
or	O
riding	O
in	O
company	O
vehicles	O
must	O
wear	O
seat	O
belts	O
,	O
even	O
if	O
air	O
bags	O
are	O
available	O
.	O

d	O
.	O

Drivers	O
are	O
responsible	O
for	O
the	O
security	O
of	O
company	O
vehicles	O
assigned	O
to	O
them	O
.	O

The	O
vehicle	O
engine	O
must	O
be	O
shut	O
off	O
,	O
ignition	O
keys	O
removed	O
,	O
and	O
vehicle	O
doors	O
locked	O
whenever	O

vehicle	O
is	O
left	O
unattended	O
.	O

the	O
vehicle	O
is	O

a	O

attendant	O
,	O
only	O
the	O
ignition	O
key	O
is	O
to	O
be	O
left	O
.	O
MA	O
is	O
not	O
responsible	O
for	O

personal	O
items	O
stolen	O
from	O
the	O
vehicle	O
.	O

B	O
.	O
MAINTENANCE	O
&	O
REPORTING	O

1	O
.	O

Maintenance	O
-	O
Proper	O
vehicle	O
maintenance	O
is	O
a	O
basic	O
element	O
of	O
any	O
fleet	O
safety	O
program	O
,	O
not	O
only	O
to	O
ensure	O
a	O

safe	O
,	O
road	O
worthy	O
vehicle	O
,	O
but	O
also	O
to	O
avoid	O
costly	O
repair	O
expenses	O
and	O
unexpected	O
breakdowns	O
:	O

a	O
.	O

You	O
are	O
responsible	O
for	O
the	O
maintenance	O
of	O
your	O
company	O
vehicle	O
.	O

This	O
means	O
both	O
the	O
mechanical	O
“	O
health	O
”	O
and	O
the	O
appearance	O
.	O

b	O
.	O

Spot	O
checks	O
will	O
be	O
conducted	O
periodically	O
.	O

If	O
neglect	O
is	O
reported	O
disciplinary	O
action	O
will	O
be	O
taken	O
.	O

c	O
.	O

Oil	O
changes	O
need	O
to	O
be	O
done	O
every	O
4	O
months	O
or	O
4,000	O
miles	O
–	O
Failure	O
to	O
do	O
so	O
could	O
result	O
in	O
the	O

termination	O
of	O
your	O
driving	O
privilege	O
.	O

d	O
.	O

Dealerships	O
should	O
only	O
be	O
used	O
in	O
the	O
case	O
of	O
warranty	O
work	O
or	O
with	O

from	O

Fleet	O

AND	O
maintenance	O
company	O
.	O

company	O
can	O
assist	O
in	O

a	O

repair	O
facility	O
in	O
your	O
area	O
.	O

e	O
.	O

The	O
vehicle	O
should	O
be	O
cleaned	O
(	O
interior	O
&	O
exterior	O
)	O
regularly	O
to	O
help	O
maintain	O
its	O
good	O
appearance	O
for	O
you	O
and	O
the	O
Company	O
.	O

A	O
clean	O
vehicle	O
makes	O
a	O
good	O
impression	O
on	O
customers	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
are	O
located	O
in	O
the	O

“	O
snow	O
belt	O
”	O
you	O
may	O
submit	O
up	O
to	O
2	O
car	O
washes	O
per	O
month	O
;	O
during	O
December	O
thru	O
March	O
for	O

reimbursement	O

f	O
.	O

Routine	O
inspections	O
of	O
critical	O
items	O
,	O
such	O
as	O
brakes	O
,	O
lights	O
,	O
tires	O
,	O

,	O
etc.	O
,	O
should	O
also	O
be	O
completed	O
by	O
driver	O
.	O

If	O
any	O

arise	O
,	O

your	O
vehicle	O
to	O
a	O
garage	O
and	O
show	O
them	O
your	O
MAINTENANCE	O

card	O
.	O

as	O
your	O

card	O

when	O

,	O

will	O
incur	O
no	O
out	O

maintenance	O
expense	O
.	O

g	O
.	O

Keep	O
copies	O
of	O
all	O

receipts	O
for	O
your	O
records	O
.	O

2	O
.	O

Reporting	O
–	O
all	O
drivers	O
of	O
company	O
vehicles	O
are	O
required	O
to	O
keep	O
track	O
of	O
daily	O
mileage	O
.	O

should	O
be	O
emailed	O

to	O
the	O
Fleet	O
Coordinator	O
by	O
the	O
5th	O
of	O
every	O
month	O
.	O

a	O
.	O

You	O
can	O
not	O
count	O
travel	O
time	O
to	O
your	O
first	O
stop	O
or	O
from	O
your	O
last	O
stop	O
as	O
business	O
mileage	O
is	O
personal	O
use	O
.	O

b.	O
Business	O
mileage	O
is	O
the	O
mileage	O
from	O
your	O
first	O
stop	O
of	O
the	O
day	O
through	O
the	O
mileage	O
at	O
your	O
last	O
stop	O
.	O

Anything	O
else	O
is	O
personal	O
.	O

(	O
For	O
retail	O
DMs	O
,	O
it	O
is	O
the	O
distance	O
to	O
the	O
nearest	O
store	O
;	O
for	O
the	O
Ed	O
Reps	O
,	O
it	O
is	O
the	O

distance	O
to	O
their	O
nearest	O
servicing	O
account	O
.	O

Ex.	O
if	O
closest	O
servicing	O
school	O
is	O
10	O
miles	O
away	O
,	O
then	O
10	O

miles	O
to	O
and	O
from	O
is	O
considered	O
personal	O
mileage	O
,	O
the	O
rest	O
is	O
business	O
)	O

c	O
.	O

If	O
monthly	O
mileage	O
logs	O
are	O
not	O
received	O
,	O
you	O
will	O
be	O
charged	O
with	O
100	O
%	O
personal	O
use	O
.	O

d	O
.	O

Fringe	O
Benefit	O
taxes	O
are	O
calculated	O
quarterly	O

,	O

,	O

and	O

.	O
VEHICLE	O
USE	O
1	O
.	O
Company	O
Owned	O
Vehicles	O

a	O
.	O

Passenger	O
Vehicles	O
:	O

Only	O
employees	O
authorized	O
by	O
their	O
supervisors	O
will	O
be	O
permitted	O
to	O
operate	O
company	O
owned	O
/	O
leased	O
passenger	O
vehicle	O
.	O

When	O
the	O
vehicle	O
is	O
driven	O
for	O
personal	O
use	O
,	O
only	O
the	O

employee	O
will	O
be	O
permitted	O
to	O
operate	O
the	O
vehicle	O
except	O
in	O
the	O
case	O
of	O
repair	O
testing	O
by	O
a	O
mechanic	O
.	O

b.	O
Commercial	O
Vans	O
and	O
Trucks	O
:	O

Only	O
employees	O
authorized	O
by	O
their	O
supervisors	O
will	O
be	O
permitted	O
to	O
operate	O
a	O
company	O
owned	O
/	O
leased	O
commercial	O
van	O
or	O
truck	O
.	O

These	O
employees	O
must	O
also	O
comply	O
with	O

DOT	O
requirements	O
including	O
being	O
in	O
possession	O
of	O
a	O
valid	O
commercial	O
driver	O
’s	O
license	O
if	O
applicable	O
.	O

2	O
.	O

Rental	O
Vehicles	O
a.	O

When	O
renting	O
a	O
vehicle	O
the	O
employee	O
needs	O
to	O
ensure	O
that	O
the	O
agreement	O
names	O
MA	O
as	O
the	O
“	O
renter	O
”	O
(	O
ex:	O

John	O
Smith	O
for	O
Music	O
&	O
Arts	O
)	O
.	O

Rental	O
vehicles	O
are	O
covered	O
under	O
the	O
company	O
’s	O
“	O
hired	O
auto	O
”	O
coverage	O
.	O

Therefore	O
,	O
do	O
not	O
purchase	O
the	O
separate	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
as	O
you	O
will	O
not	O
be	O
reimbursed	O
.	O

b.	O

MA	O
will	O
reimburse	O
an	O
employee	O
for	O
the	O
base	O
rental	O
cost	O
and	O
all	O
associated	O
fees	O
or	O
taxes	O
.	O

Any	O
optional	O
accessories	O
or	O
“	O
upgrades	O
”	O
are	O
considered	O
non-covered	O
expenses	O
and	O
,	O
if	O
added	O
,	O
will	O
be	O
the	O
driver	O
’s	O

responsibility	O
.	O

These	O
upgrades	O
include	O
but	O
are	O
not	O
limited	O
to	O

devices	O
,	O
satellite	O

,	O
and	O
fuel	O

charges	O

the	O
vehicle	O

with	O
less	O
than	O
a	O
FULL	O
tank	O
of	O
fuel	O

ACCIDENT	O
REPORTING	O
PROCEDURES	O

?	O

The	O
employee	O
involved	O
is	O
responsible	O
for	O
making	O
the	O
initial	O
accident	O
report	O
,	O
and	O
making	O
a	O
claim	O

with	O
MA	O
’s	O
insurance	O
carrier	O
immediately	O
following	O
the	O
accident	O
.	O

?	O

Employees	O
will	O
take	O
the	O
following	O
actions	O
after	O
being	O
involved	O
in	O
an	O
accident	O
:	O

o	O
Call	O
for	O
medical	O
aid	O
if	O
necessary	O
.	O

o	O
Secure	O
accident	O
scene	O
--	O
pull	O
onto	O
shoulder	O
or	O
side	O
of	O
road	O
,	O
redirect	O
traffic	O
,	O
set	O
up	O
road	O

flares	O
/	O
reflectors	O
,	O
etc	O
.	O

o	O

Call	O
the	O
police	O
.	O

All	O
accidents	O
,	O
regardless	O
of	O
severity	O
,	O
must	O
be	O
reported	O
to	O
the	O
police	O
.	O

If	O
the	O

driver	O
can	O
not	O
get	O
to	O
phone	O
,	O
he	O
/	O
she	O
should	O
write	O
a	O
note	O
giving	O
location	O
to	O
a	O
reliable	O

appearing	O
motorist	O
and	O
ask	O
him	O
/	O
her	O
to	O
notify	O
the	O
police	O
.	O

o	O

Record	O
names	O
and	O
addresses	O
of	O
driver	O
,	O
witnesses	O
,	O
and	O
occupants	O
of	O
the	O
other	O
vehicles	O
and	O

any	O
medical	O
personnel	O
who	O
may	O
arrive	O
at	O
the	O
scene	O
.	O

Exchange	O
pertinent	O
info	O
below	O

?	O

Driver	O
’s	O
License	O
number	O
of	O
other	O
drivers	O

?	O

Insurance	O
company	O
names	O
and	O
policy	O
numbers	O
of	O
other	O
vehicles	O

?	O

and	O

of	O
other	O
vehicles	O

?	O

and	O
time	O
of	O
accident	O

?	O

Overall	O

and	O

?	O

Equipment	O
.	O

The	O
intent	O
of	O
this	O
policy	O
is	O
to	O
provide	O
expense	O
relief	O
for	O
the	O
business	O
portion	O
of	O
personal	O

device	O
usage	O
while	O
allowing	O
a	O
personal	O
choice	O
in	O
equipment	O
.	O

When	O
selecting	O
a	O
personal	O
device	O
,	O

associates	O
must	O
obtain	O
a	O
supported	O
device	O
.	O

The	O
current	O
list	O
of	O
supported	O
devices	O
is	O
available	O
from	O
the	O

Fleet	O
Manager	O
.	O

An	O
unsupported	O
device	O
will	O
not	O
be	O
provided	O
access	O
nor	O
will	O
it	O
be	O
eligible	O
for	O

reimbursement	O
.	O

On	O
a	O
limited	O
basis	O
the	O
company	O
may	O
provide	O
company	O
-	O
owned	O
cellular	O
numbers	O
,	O
devices	O
and	O

accessories	O
.	O

In	O
those	O
cases	O
,	O
all	O
calls	O
and	O
data	O
are	O
invoiced	O
and	O
presented	O
in	O
a	O
monthly	O
bill	O
to	O
the	O

company	O
and	O
end	O
users	O
may	O
be	O
required	O
to	O
reimburse	O
the	O
company	O
for	O
personal	O
usage	O
.	O

The	O
approved	O

vendor	O
for	O
company	O
-	O
provided	O
devices	O
is	O
currently	O
Verizon	O
Wireless	O
.	O

In	O
limited	O
circumstances	O
,	O
other	O

carriers	O
will	O
be	O
approved	O
where	O
prior	O
company	O
contracts	O
with	O
that	O
carrier	O
exist	O
.	O

Company	O
Owned	O
Equipment	O
Replacement	O
/	O
Upgrades	O
.	O

The	O
company	O
will	O
pay	O
up	O
to	O
$	O
150	O
for	O
an	O

upgrade	O

IF	O
the	O
device	O
is	O
eligible	O
for	O
an	O
upgrade	O
AND	O
the	O
company	O
’s	O
cellular	O
provider	O
has	O

confirmed	O
it	O
needs	O
replaced	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
feel	O
the	O
device	O
is	O
not	O
functioning	O
properly	O
;	O
please	O
take	O
it	O
to	O

the	O
company	O
’s	O
provider	O
store	O
and	O
have	O
them	O
troubleshoot	O
the	O
device	O
.	O

MA	O
’s	O
provider	O

determines	O
the	O
device	O
is	O
not	O
working	O
properly	O
and	O

to	O

they	O
will	O
need	O
to	O
note	O

the	O
account	O
accordingly	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
would	O
like	O
to	O
upgrade	O
"	O
just	O
because	O
;	O
"	O
it	O
is	O
at	O
your	O
expense	O
.	O

is	O
eligible	O
to	O

upgrade	O
,	O
you	O
will	O
be	O
responsible	O
for	O
the	O
upgrade	O
price	O
.	O

If	O

is	O
not	O
,	O
it	O
would	O
be	O
at	O
full	O

.	O

of	O

.	O

from	O
FREE	O
to	O
$	O
300	O
and	O
full	O
retail	O
,	O
from	O
$	O
300	O
-	O
800	O
+	O

Device	O
Support	O
.	O

The	O
Company	O
does	O
not	O
provide	O

for	O
personal	O
devices	O
and	O
is	O
not	O
responsible	O

for	O

to	O

devices	O
or	O

of	O
data	O
that	O
may	O

of	O

to	O
the	O

company	O
’s	O
systems	O
.	O

Lost	O
/	O
Stolen	O

.	O

a	O

is	O

or	O
stolen	O

Coordinator	O

and	O

number	O
.	O

The	O
associate	O
may	O
be	O

to	O

a	O

with	O
the	O
police	O
.	O

The	O
associate	O
is	O

responsible	O
for	O
replacing	O
a	O
company	O
-	O
provided	O
lost	O
or	O
stolen	O
device	O
.	O

For	O
the	O
security	O
of	O
the	O
associate	O
and	O
the	O
company	O
,	O
and	O
to	O
prevent	O
potential	O
identity	O
theft	O
or	O
the	O

release	O
of	O
confidential	O
company	O
information	O
,	O
the	O
associate	O
acknowledges	O
that	O
if	O
a	O
personal	O
device	O
is	O

lost	O
or	O
stolen	O

company	O
may	O
at	O
its	O
discretion	O

or	O
all	O
of	O
the	O
applications	O
and	O
data	O

stored	O
on	O
the	O
personal	O
device	O
.	O

Acceptable	O
Use.	O
Associates	O
must	O
maintain	O
professionalism	O
and	O
personal	O
responsibility	O
to	O
protect	O
the	O

company	O
’s	O
resources	O
,	O
reputation	O
and	O
public	O
image	O
.	O

Associates	O
must	O
not	O
discuss	O
sensitive	O
or	O

confidential	O
information	O
while	O
using	O
cellular	O
devices	O
and	O
must	O
comply	O
with	O
the	O
Associate	O
Handbook	O
,	O

acceptable	O
use	O
policies	O
and	O
state	O
and	O
local	O
rules	O
regarding	O
phone	O
usage	O
(	O
in	O
particular	O
restrictions	O
on	O

use	O
while	O
driving	O
)	O
.	O

Monitoring	O
.	O

The	O
company	O
reserves	O
the	O
right	O
to	O
disconnect	O
any	O
device	O
,	O
reclaim	O
company	O
-	O
provided	O

equipment	O
,	O
block	O
usage	O
and	O
terminate	O
access	O
to	O
any	O
service	O
or	O
activity	O
at	O
any	O
time	O
.	O

In	O
addition	O
,	O
if	O

illegal	O
activity	O
is	O
detected	O
,	O
all	O
communications	O
may	O
be	O
provided	O
to	O
appropriate	O
law	O
enforcement	O

officials	O
or	O
third	O
parties	O
without	O
prior	O
consent	O
of	O
or	O
notice	O
to	O
the	O
sender	O
or	O
receiver	O
.	O

Leaving	O
the	O
Company	O
.	O

Associates	O
that	O
for	O
any	O
reason	O
leave	O
the	O
company	O
must	O
return	O
company	O
-	O

provided	O
devices	O
and	O
accessories	O

Description	O
of	O
Operations.doc	O

About	O
Conestoga	B-ORG
Wood	I-ORG
Specialties	E-ORG

Conestoga	B-ORG
Wood	I-ORG
Specialties	E-ORG
is	O
the	O
cabinet	O
industry	O
's	O
leading	O
supplier	O
of	O
wood	O
doors	O
and	O
components	O
.	O

We	O
maintain	O
a	O
product	O
offering	O
that	O
is	O
second	O
to	O
none	O
,	O
creating	O
design	O
solutions	O
that	O
meet	O
the	O
needs	O
of	O
the	O
most	O
discriminating	O
customers	O
.	O

With	O
plants	O
located	O
in	O
North	O
Carolina	O
,	O
Pennsylvania	O
,	O
and	O
Washington	O
,	O
CWS	O
has	O
the	O
capabilities	O
to	O
offer	O
an	O
extensive	O
range	O
of	O
custom	O
wood	O
components	O
.	O

This	O
offering	O
includes	O
:	O
custom	O
doors	O
,	O
drawer	O
fronts	O
,	O
beaded	O
front	O
frames	O
,	O
dovetail	O
drawer	O
boxes	O
,	O
mouldings	O
,	O
cabinet	O
systems	O
,	O
finished	O
wood	O
products	O
,	O
a	O
variety	O
of	O
radius	O
products	O
,	O
special	O
designs	O
components	O
,	O
rigid	O
thermal	O
foil	O
and	O
medium	O
density	O
fiberboard	O
products	O
.	O

Manufacturing	O
and	O
support	O
systems	O
incorporate	O
state	O
of	O
the	O
art	O
technology	O
and	O
custom	O
designed	O
equipment	O
,	O
to	O
meet	O
our	O
customer	O
's	O
specific	O
needs	O
.	O

In	O
addition	O
,	O
CWS	O
manages	O
their	O
own	O
rough	O
mills	O
to	O
ensure	O
the	O
highest	O
quality	O
standards	O
throughout	O
production	O
,	O
even	O
in	O
the	O
early	O
stages	O
of	O
lumber	O
processing	O
.	O

Conestoga	O
operates	O
as	O
two	O
distinct	O
business	O
units	O
:	O
Original	O
Equipment	O
Manufacturer	O
(	O
OEM	O
)	O
/	O
Contract	O
Division	O
focuses	O
on	O
high	O
volume	O
customers	O
,	O
producing	O
thousands	O
of	O
doors	O
in	O
a	O
single	O
order	O
.	O

Custom	O
Division	O
services	O
the	O
custom	O
kitchen	O
&	O
bath	O
industry	O
,	O
producing	O
single	O
set	O
kitchens	O
,	O
catering	O
to	O
just	O
-	O
in	O
-	O
time	O
cabinet	O
manufacturers	O
and	O
routinely	O
producing	O
orders	O
as	O
small	O
as	O
a	O
single	O
piece	O
.	O

Since	O
1964	O
,	O
Conestoga	B-ORG
Wood	I-ORG
Specialties	E-ORG
has	O
been	O
a	O
symbol	O
of	O
quality	O
and	O
innovation	O
throughout	O
the	O
cabinet	O
industry	O
.	O

CWS	O
’s	O
people	O
and	O
products	O
reflect	O
a	O
strong	O
sense	O
of	O
pride	O
and	O
tradition	O
inherent	O
in	O
the	O
Pennsylvania	O
Dutch	O
heritage	O
of	O
their	O
founders	O
,	O
Norman	O
and	O
Samuel	O
Hahn	O
.	O

It	O
is	O
the	O
unique	O
combination	O
of	O
Old	O
World	O
craftsmanship	O
and	O
cutting	O
edge	O
technology	O
that	O
allows	O
Conestoga	O
to	O
set	O
the	O
standards	O
by	O
which	O
excellence	O
is	O
measured	O
.	O

company	O
is	O
still	O

Elizabeth	O

,	O

of	O

.	O

underlying	O
policy	O

definition	O
:	O

COMMON	O
POLICY	O
CONDITIONS	O
AND	O
DEFINITIONS	O

Various	O
provisions	O
in	O
this	O
policy	O
restrict	O
coverage	O
.	O

Read	O
the	O
entire	O
policy	O
carefully	O
to	O
determine	O
rights	O
,	O
duties	O
and	O
what	O
is	O
and	O
is	O
not	O
covered	O
.	O

Throughout	O
this	O
policy	O
the	O
words	O
"	O
you	O
"	O
and	O
"	O
your	O
"	O
refer	O
to	O
the	O
Named	O
Insured	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
Declarations	O
,	O
and	O
any	O
other	O
person	O
or	O
organization	O
qualifying	O
as	O
a	O
Named	O
Insured	O
under	O
this	O
policy	O
.	O

The	O
word	O
“	O
insured	O
”	O
means	O
any	O
per	O
-	O
son	O
or	O
organization	O
qualifying	O
as	O
such	O
under	O
the	O
definitions	O
and	O
qualifications	O
found	O
in	O
each	O
coverage	O
part	O
.	O

The	O
words	O
"	O
we	O
"	O
,	O
"	O
us	O
"	O
and	O
"	O
our	O
"	O
refer	O
to	O
the	O
company	O
providing	O
this	O
insurance	O
.	O

Other	O
words	O
and	O
phrases	O
that	O
appear	O
in	O
quotation	O
marks	O
have	O
special	O
meaning	O
.	O

Refer	O
to	O
Definitions	O
sections	O
found	O
below	O
and	O
in	O
the	O
various	O
coverage	O
parts	O
.	O

SECTION	O
I	O
–	O
CONDITIONS	O
All	O
Coverage	O
Parts	O
included	O
in	O
this	O
policy	O
are	O
subject	O
to	O
the	O
following	O
conditions	O
:	O

A.	O
Cancellation	O

1	O
.	O

The	O
first	O
Named	O
Insured	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
Declarations	O
may	O
cancel	O
this	O
policy	O
by	O
mailing	O
or	O
delivering	O
to	O
us	O
ad	O
-	O
vance	O
written	O
notice	O
of	O
cancellation	O
.	O

2	O
.	O

We	O
may	O
cancel	O
this	O
policy	O
by	O
mailing	O
or	O
delivering	O
to	O
the	O
first	O
Named	O
Insured	O
written	O
notice	O
of	O
cancellation	O
at	O
least	O
:	O
a.	O
10	O
days	O
before	O
the	O
effective	O
date	O
of	O
cancellation	O
if	O
we	O
cancel	O
for	O
nonpayment	O
of	O
premium	O
;	O
or	O

A.	O
Coverage	O
Territory	O
“	O
Coverage	O
territory	O
”	O
means	O
anywhere	O
in	O
the	O
world	O
,	O
including	O
international	O
waters	O
or	O
airspace	O
,	O
but	O
excluding	O
the	O
following	O
:	O

1	O
.	O
United	O
States	O
of	O
America	O
and	O
its	O
territories	O
and	O
possessions	O
,	O

2	O
.	O
Puerto	O
Rico	O
,	O
or	O
3	O
.	O

Canada	O
.	O

Coverage	O
under	O
this	O
policy	O
shall	O
not	O
extend	O
to	O
,	O
and	O
we	O
shall	O
have	O
no	O
obligation	O
or	O
liability	O
to	O
pay	O
any	O
claim	O
,	O
to	O
provide	O
any	O
benefit	O
,	O
or	O
to	O
engage	O
in	O
any	O
transaction	O
under	O
this	O
policy	O
to	O
the	O
extent	O
that	O
doing	O
so	O
would	O
be	O
a	O
vi-	O
olation	O
of	O
any	O
United	O
States	O
economic	O
,	O
trade	O
,	O
or	O
financial	O
sanctions	O
laws	O
or	O
regulations	O
including	O
but	O
not	O
limited	O
to	O
sanctions	O
administered	O
and	O
enforced	O
by	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
Treasury	O
Department	O
’s	O
Office	O
of	O
Foreign	O
Assets	O
Control	O
(	O
OFAC	O
)	O
.	O

In	O
such	O
case	O
,	O
coverage	O
under	O
and	O
the	O
insured	O
’s	O
rights	O
under	O
this	O
policy	O
shall	O
be	O
null	O

a	O
.	O

We	O

as	O

"	O

"	O

"	O
property	O
damage	O
"	O
to	O

this	O

.	O

B.	O
COVERAGE	O
B	O
-	O
PERSONAL	O
AND	O
ADVERTISING	O
INJURY	O
LIABILITY	O

1	O
.	O
Insuring	O
Agreement	O

a	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
pay	O
those	O
sums	O
that	O
the	O
insured	O
becomes	O
legally	O
obligated	O
to	O
pay	O
as	O
damages	O
because	O
of	O
"	O
per	O
-	O
sonal	O
and	O
advertising	O
injury	O
"	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
applies	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
have	O
the	O
right	O
and	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
the	O
insured	O
against	O
any	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
seeking	O
those	O
damages	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
have	O
no	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
the	O
insured	O
against	O
any	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
seeking	O
damages	O
for	O
"	O
personal	O
and	O
advertising	O
injury	O
"	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
does	O
not	O
apply	O
.	O

We	O
may	O
,	O
at	O
our	O
discretion	O
,	O
investigate	O
any	O
offense	O
and	O
settle	O
any	O
claim	O
or	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
that	O
may	O
result	O
.	O

NPG	O
GL	O
0001	O
0715	O
Page	O
7	O
of	O
19	O
?	O

those	O
countries	O

the	O
“	O
coverage	O
territory	O
”	O
where	O
we	O
are	O
prevented	O
by	O
law	O
or	O
otherwise	O
from	O

-	O

,	O

suits	O
”	O
brought	O
against	O
the	O
insured	O
,	O
we	O
have	O
no	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
indemnify	O
the	O
insured	O
for	O
those	O
sums	O
that	O
the	O
insured	O
becomes	O

obligated	O
to	O
pay	O
as	O
damages	O
to	O
which	O

SECTION	O
IV	O
–	O
COMMERCIAL	O
GENERAL	O
LIABILITY	O
CONDITIONS	O

1	O
.	O

Event	O
Of	O
Occurrence	O
,	O
Offense	O
,	O
Claim	O
Or	O
Suit	O

a	O
.	O

You	O
must	O
see	O
to	O
it	O
that	O
we	O
are	O
notified	O
as	O
soon	O
as	O
practicable	O
of	O
an	O
"	O
occurrence	O
"	O
or	O
an	O

which	O
may	O
result	O
in	O
a	O
claim	O
.	O

To	O
the	O

,	O

should	O

:	O

(	O
1	O
)	O
How	O
,	O
when	O
and	O
where	O
the	O
"	O
occurrence	O
"	O
or	O
offense	O
took	O
place	O
;	O
(	O
2	O
)	O
The	O
names	O
and	O
addresses	O
of	O
any	O
injured	O
persons	O
and	O
witnesses	O
;	O
and	O
(	O
3	O
)	O
The	O
nature	O
and	O
location	O
of	O
any	O

or	O
damage	O
arising	O
out	O
of	O
the	O
"	O
occurrence	O
"	O
or	O
offense	O
.	O

b	O
.	O

a	O

is	O
made	O
or	O
"	O

"	O
is	O
brought	O
against	O
any	O

,	O
you	O
must	O
:	O
(	O
1	O
)	O

the	O
specifics	O
of	O
the	O
claim	O
or	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
and	O
the	O
date	O
received	O
;	O
and	O
(	O
2	O
)	O
Notify	O
us	O
as	O
soon	O
as	O
practicable	O
.	O

You	O
must	O
see	O
to	O
it	O
that	O
we	O
receive	O
written	O
notice	O
of	O
the	O
claim	O
or	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
as	O
soon	O
as	O

.	O

c	O
.	O

and	O

insured	O

:	O

1	O
)	O

us	O

of	O

,	O

,	O

in	O
connec	O
-	O

tion	O
with	O
the	O

or	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
;	O
(	O
2	O
)	O
Authorize	O
us	O
to	O
obtain	O
records	O
and	O
other	O
information	O
;	O
(	O
3	O
)	O

with	O
us	O

or	O

of	O
the	O

or	O

against	O
the	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
;	O
and	O
(	O
4	O
)	O
Assist	O
us	O
,	O
upon	O
our	O
request	O
,	O
in	O
the	O
enforcement	O
of	O
any	O

DEFINITIONS	O
1	O
.	O

"	O

to	O

general	O

about	O
your	O

for	O

of	O

customers	O
or	O
supporters	O
.	O

For	O

of	O
this	O

:	O
a	O
.	O

that	O
are	O

your	O

A.	O
Coverage	O

We	O

all	O

as	O

"	O

a	O

"	O

"	O

"	O

this	O

,	O

by	O
an	O
"	O
accident	O
"	O
and	O
resulting	O
from	O
the	O

,	O

or	O

of	O

"	O
autos	O
"	O
.	O

"	O
.	O

“	O

,	O

.	O

"	O

"	O

SECTION	O
IV	O
–	O
AUTO	O
MEDICAL	O
PAYMENTS	O
A.	O
Coverage	O

We	O
will	O
pay	O
reasonable	O
expenses	O
incurred	O
for	O
necessary	O
medical	O
and	O
funeral	O
services	O
to	O
or	O
for	O
an	O
insured	O
who	O
sustains	O
"	O
bodily	O
injury	O
"	O
caused	O
by	O
"	O
accident	O
"	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
pay	O
only	O
those	O
expenses	O
incurred	O
,	O
for	O
services	O
rendered	O
within	O
three	O
years	O
from	O
the	O
date	O
of	O
the	O
"	O
accident	O
"	O
.	O

B.	O
Who	O
Is	O
An	O
Insured	O
1	O
.	O

You	O
while	O
"	O

CONDITIONS	O

The	O
following	O
conditions	O

in	O

to	O

Policy	O
Conditions	O
:	O
A.	O
Loss	O
Conditions	O

1	O
.	O
Appraisal	O
For	O
Physical	O
Damage	O
Loss	O

If	O
you	O
and	O
we	O
disagree	O
on	O
the	O
amount	O
of	O
"	O
loss	O
"	O
,	O
either	O
may	O
demand	O
an	O
appraisal	O
of	O
the	O
"	O
loss	O
"	O
.	O

In	O
this	O
event	O
,	O
each	O
party	O
will	O
select	O
a	O
competent	O
appraiser	O
.	O

The	O
two	O
appraisers	O
will	O
select	O
a	O
competent	O
and	O
impartial	O
umpire	O
.	O

The	O
appraisers	O
will	O
state	O
separately	O
the	O
actual	O
cash	O
value	O
and	O
amount	O
of	O
"	O
loss	O
"	O
.	O

If	O
they	O
fail	O
to	O
agree	O
,	O
they	O
will	O
submit	O
their	O
differences	O
to	O
the	O
umpire	O
.	O

A	O
decision	O
agreed	O
to	O
by	O
any	O
two	O
will	O
be	O
binding	O
.	O

Each	O
party	O
will	O
:	O
a.	O
Pay	O
it	O
s	O
chosen	O
appraiser	O
;	O
and	O
b.	O

Bear	O
the	O
other	O
expenses	O
of	O
the	O
appraisal	O
and	O
umpire	O
equally	O
.	O

If	O
we	O
submit	O
to	O
an	O
appraisal	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
still	O
retain	O
our	O
right	O
to	O
deny	O
the	O
claim	O
.	O

,	O

.	O

.	O

of	O

.	O

company	O

of	O

of	O

.	O

.	O

,	O

to	O

in	O

of	O
or	O

upon	O
the	O
absence	O
of	O
other	O
insurance	O
.	O

When	O
the	O
insurance	O
provided	O
by	O
this	O
coverage	O
is	O
primary	O
and	O
the	O
insured	O
has	O
other	O
insurance	O

to	O

to	O
the	O
loss	O

an	O
excess	O
or	O

basis	O
,	O
the	O
amount	O
of	O

this	O

not	O

by	O
the	O

of	O
such	O
other	O
insurance	O
.	O

c.	O
For	O
Hired	O
Auto	O

Damage	O
Coverage	O
,	O
any	O
covered	O
"	O
auto	O
"	O

,	O

to	O

a	O

"	O

.	O

"	O

"	O

"	O
.	O

d	O
.	O

When	O

form	O
and	O
any	O

coverage	O
form	O
or	O

covers	O

.	O

4	O
.	O

Local	O
Compulsory	O

Insurance	O

The	O
coverage	O

by	O
this	O
insurance	O

for	O
any	O
compulsory	O
local	O
insurance	O
.	O

The	O
insured	O

that	O

insurance	O
will	O
be	O
maintained	O
in	O
full	O
force	O
and	O
effect	O
at	O
limits	O
mandated	O
by	O
law	O
.	O

of	O

insured	O
to	O
comply	O
with	O
compulsory	O
insurance	O

shall	O
not	O

insurance	O

but	O
in	O
the	O
event	O
of	O
such	O
failure	O

we	O
shall	O
only	O
be	O

to	O

same	O
extent	O
as	O
if	O

insured	O

.	O

EMPLOYEE	O
FOREIGN	O
PROTECTION	O
COVERAGE	O
FORM	O

This	O
coverage	O
is	O
not	O
a	O
substitute	O
for	O
compulsory	O
admitted	O
insurance	O
and	O
may	O
not	O
be	O
offered	O
to	O

insurance	O
requirements	O
of	O
any	O
“	O
workers	O
compensation	O
law	O
”	O
or	O
employer	O
’s	O
liability	O
law	O
anywhere	O
.	O

You	O
have	O
the	O
duty	O
to	O
arrange	O
for	O
any	O
required	O
compulsory	O
admitted	O
insurance	O
and	O
you	O
agree	O
to	O
have	O
in	O
force	O
compulsory	O
admitted	O
insurance	O
that	O
is	O
necessary	O
to	O
satisfy	O
the	O
legal	O
requirements	O
of	O
any	O
jurisdiction	O
.	O

otherwise	O
stated	O
,	O
if	O
you	O
do	O
not	O
arrange	O
for	O
your	O
compulsory	O
admitted	O
insurance	O
,	O
we	O
shall	O
only	O
be	O

to	O
you	O
to	O
the	O
same	O
extent	O
as	O
if	O
you	O
had	O
arranged	O
for	O
such	O

admitted	O
insurance	O
.	O

D.	O
Limits	O
of	O
Liability	O

Our	O
liability	O
to	O
pay	O
for	O
damages	O
under	O
this	O
Section	O
II	O
is	O
limited	O
.	O

Our	O
limits	O
of	O
liability	O
are	O
shown	O
on	O
the	O
Declarations	O
page	O
.	O

They	O
apply	O
as	O
explained	O
below	O
:	O

1	O
.	O
“	O
Bodily	O
Injury	O
”	O
by	O
Accident	O

The	O
limit	O
shown	O
for	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
by	O
accident	O
–	O
each	O
accident	O
,	O
is	O
the	O
most	O
we	O
will	O
pay	O
for	O
all	O
damages	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
insurance	O
because	O
of	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
to	O
one	O
or	O
more	O
“	O
employees	O
”	O
in	O
any	O
one	O
accident	O
.	O
A	O
disease	O
is	O
not	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
by	O
accident	O
unless	O
it	O
results	O
directly	O
from	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
by	O
accident	O
.	O

2	O
.	O
“	O
Bodily	O
Injury	O
”	O
by	O
Disease	O

The	O
limit	O
shown	O
for	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
by	O
disease	O
–	O
policy	O
limit	O
,	O
is	O
the	O
most	O
we	O
will	O
pay	O
for	O
all	O
damages	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
insurance	O
and	O
arising	O
out	O
of	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
by	O
disease	O
,	O
regardless	O
of	O
the	O
number	O
of	O
“	O
employees	O
”	O
who	O
sustain	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
by	O
disease	O
.	O

The	O
limit	O
shown	O
for	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
by	O
disease	O
–	O
each	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
,	O
is	O
the	O
most	O
we	O
will	O
pay	O
for	O
all	O
damages	O
because	O
of	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
by	O
disease	O
to	O
any	O
one	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
.	O

“	O
Bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
by	O
disease	O
does	O
not	O
include	O
disease	O
that	O
results	O
directly	O
from	O
a	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
by	O
accident	O
.	O

3	O
.	O

“	O

.	O

,	O

,	O
or	O

.	O

or	O

between	O
the	O
fingers	O
and	O
the	O
hand	O

with	O
respect	O
of	O
eyes	O
or	O

,	O
the	O
entire	O
and	O

loss	O
of	O
sight	O
or	O
hearing	O
.	O

physician	O
due	O
to	O
either	O
unavailability	O
of	O
a	O
hospital	O
room	O
due	O
to	O
lack	O
of	O
capacity	O
or	O
distance	O
,	O
or	O
to	O
other	O
circumstances	O
beyond	O
the	O
control	O
of	O
the	O
covered	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
.	O

3	O
.	O

Emergency	O
Medical	O
Repatriation	O

Subject	O
to	O
the	O
applicable	O
Limits	O
Of	O
Insurance	O
shown	O
on	O
the	O
declarations	O
and	O
the	O
conditions	O
and	O
exclusions	O
stated	O
below	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
pay	O
on	O
your	O
behalf	O
or	O
reimburse	O
you	O
for	O
,	O
emergency	O
repatriation	O
or	O
evacuation	O
transportation	O
expenses	O
made	O
necessary	O
due	O
to	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
by	O
accident	O
,	O
illness	O
,	O
or	O
disease	O
including	O
“	O
endemic	O
disease	O
”	O
,	O
to	O
your	O
injured	O
,	O
sick	O
or	O
deceased	O
“	O
employees	O
”	O
indicated	O
as	O
covered	O
on	O
the	O
declarations	O
while	O
traveling	O
outside	O
of	O
their	O
country	O
of	O
domicile	O
during	O
“	O
temporary	O
business	O
travel	O
”	O
.	O

This	O
includes	O
emergency	O
repatriation	O
or	O
evacuation	O
expenses	O
associated	O
with	O
spouse	O
and	O
children	O
who	O
are	O
accompanying	O
the	O
covered	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
during	O
“	O
temporary	O
business	O
travel	O
”	O
outside	O
of	O
the	O
country	O
of	O
domicile	O
.	O

The	O
emergency	O
repatriation	O
or	O
evacuation	O
expenses	O
for	O
accompanying	O
spouse	O
or	O
children	O
are	O
subject	O
to	O
the	O
cost	O
of	O
economy	O
class	O
airfare	O
and	O
an	O
incidental	O
expense	O
maximum	O
of	O
$	O
300	O
per	O
day	O
and	O
$	O
5000	O
maximum	O
for	O
any	O
one	O
occurrence	O
.	O

The	O
repatriation	O
or	O
evacuation	O
must	O
be	O
necessary	O
in	O
the	O
opinion	O
of	O
our	O
approved	O
“	O
medical	O
assistance	O
service	O
”	O
or	O
certified	O
as	O
medically	O
necessary	O
due	O
to	O
severity	O
or	O
nature	O
of	O
the	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
by	O
a	O
physician	O
.	O

The	O
repatriation	O
or	O
evacuation	O
will	O
be	O
from	O
the	O
country	O
where	O
the	O
injury	O
,	O
death	O
,	O
or	O
disease	O
occurred	O
to	O
the	O
destination	O
determined	O
by	O
our	O
approved	O
“	O
medical	O
assistance	O
service	O
”	O
where	O
appropriate	O
treatment	O
can	O
be	O
obtained	O
.	O

If	O
needed	O
due	O
to	O
the	O
seriousness	O
of	O
the	O
sickness	O
or	O
injury	O
,	O
this	O
may	O
include	O
an	O
interim	O
country	O
for	O
preliminary	O
treatment	O
or	O
evaluation	O
in	O
route	O
to	O

final	O
destination	O
which	O
would	O
be	O
the	O
home	O
country	O
of	O
the	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
.	O

All	O
repatriation	O
or	O
evacuation	O
must	O
be	O

and	O
authorized	O
in	O
advance	O
by	O
our	O
“	O
medical	O
assistance	O
service	O
”	O
provider	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
also	O
pay	O
,	O
subject	O
to	O
the	O
applicable	O
Limits	O
of	O
Insurance	O
,	O
the	O
following	O
repatriation	O
of	O
remains	O
expenses	O
related	O
to	O
the	O
death	O
of	O
your	O
covered	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
:	O

a.	O

The	O
cost	O
of	O

or	O

to	O
meet	O
“	O
United	O

”	O
,	O

SECTION	O
IV	O
.	O

GENERAL	O
CONDITIONS	O

These	O
conditions	O
apply	O
to	O
Section	O
I	O
,	O
Section	O
II	O
,	O
and	O
Section	O
III	O
of	O
this	O
coverage	O
.	O

A	O
.	O
Who	O
Is	O
An	O
Insured	O
You	O
are	O
insured	O
if	O
you	O
are	O
an	O
employer	O
shown	O
as	O
a	O
Named	O
Insured	O
on	O
the	O
declarations	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
are	O
designated	O
on	O
the	O
Declarations	O
as	O
a	O
partnership	O
,	O
and	O
if	O
you	O
are	O
one	O
of	O
its	O
partners	O
,	O
you	O
are	O
insured	O
,	O
but	O
only	O
in	O
your	O
capacity	O
as	O
an	O
employer	O
of	O
the	O
partnership	O
’s	O
“	O
employees	O
”	O
.	O

B.	O

Other	O
Insurance	O
For	O
Section	O
II	O
Employers	O
Liability	O
Coverage	O
,	O
this	O
insurance	O
is	O
excess	O
and	O
contingent	O
of	O
local	O
compulsory	O
insurance	O
or	O
any	O
other	O
insurance	O
which	O
you	O
are	O
required	O
to	O
have	O
in	O
force	O
that	O
is	O
underwritten	O
by	O
an	O
insurer	O
licensed	O
to	O
do	O
business	O
in	O
the	O
jurisdiction	O
where	O
the	O
exposure	O
to	O
loss	O
is	O
located	O
.	O

If	O
your	O
local	O
compulsory	O
insurance	O
does	O
not	O
respond	O
to	O
a	O
claim	O
,	O
proceeding	O
or	O
suit	O
which	O
is	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
insurance	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
provide	O
primary	O
insurance	O
.	O

This	O
provision	O
will	O
not	O
apply	O
if	O
coverage	O
is	O
compulsory	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
not	O
pay	O
more	O
than	O
our	O
share	O
of	O
damages	O
and	O
costs	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
agreement	O
and	O
other	O
insurance	O
or	O
self	O
-	O
insurance	O
,	O
including	O
self	O
-	O
insurance	O
which	O
results	O
from	O
your	O
failure	O
to	O
comply	O
with	O
compulsory	O
admitted	O
Employers	O
Liability	O
Insurance	O
requirements	O
.	O

Contingent	O
insurance	O
takes	O
the	O
place	O
of	O
primary	O
insurance	O
when	O
you	O
have	O
no	O
primary	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
which	O
applies	O
.	O

Contingent	O
insurance	O
will	O
also	O
pay	O
only	O
the	O
amount	O
by	O
which	O
the	O
limit	O
of	O
liability	O
shown	O
on	O
the	O
declarations	O
exceeds	O
the	O
limits	O
of	O
any	O
primary	O
local	O
compulsory	O
insurance	O
including	O
primary	O
insurance	O
issued	O
on	O
an	O
excess	O
basis	O
which	O
applies	O
.	O
When	O
this	O
insurance	O
is	O
contingent	O
,	O
we	O
have	O
no	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
unless	O
the	O
amount	O
of	O
the	O
claim	O
or	O
suit	O
exceeds	O
the	O
limits	O
of	O
the	O
primary	O
insurance	O
which	O
applies	O
or	O
no	O
primary	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
applies	O
.	O

For	O
Section	O
I	O
Voluntary	O
Compensation	O
,	O
this	O
insurance	O
is	O
primary	O
for	O
your	O
“	O
employees	O
”	O
indicated	O
as	O
covered	O

on	O
the	O
declarations	O
if	O
the	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
arises	O
out	O
of	O
and	O
in	O
the	O
course	O
of	O
employment	O
by	O
you	O
in	O
the	O
“	O
coverage	O
territory	O
”	O
.	O

If	O
an	O
injured	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
is	O
eligible	O
for	O
workers	O
’	O
compensation	O
or	O
employers	O
’	O
liability	O
benefits	O
under	O
the	O
laws	O
of	O
countries	O
other	O
than	O
the	O
U.S	O
,	O
Canada	O
,	O
or	O
country	O
of	O
hire	O
”	O
;	O
we	O
will	O
not	O
require	O
the	O
filing	O
of	O
a	O
claim	O
under	O
that	O
foreign	O
program	O
if	O
the	O
claim	O
is	O
filed	O
with	O
us	O
first	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
if	O
an	O
injured	O
covered	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
or	O
dependent	O
,	O
actually	O
files	O
the	O
claim	O
and	O
receives	O
benefits	O
under	O
such	O
other	O
workers	O
’	O
compensation	O
or	O
social	O
security	O
plan	O
,	O
whether	O
private	O
or	O
state	O
sponsored	O
,	O
then	O
we	O
will	O
not	O
pay	O
more	O
than	O
the	O
difference	O
,	O
if	O
any	O
,	O
between	O
the	O
benefits	O
received	O
or	O

under	O
that	O
foreign	O
plan	O
and	O
the	O
benefits	O
payable	O
under	O
the	O
applicable	O
“	O
workers	O
’	O
compensation	O
laws	O
”	O
of	O
the	O
“	O
United	O
States	O
”	O
or	O
Canada	O
,	O
the	O
country	O
of	O
hire	O
,	O
or	O
any	O
other	O
country	O
for	O
which	O
you	O
become	O
liable	O
and	O
as	O
selected	O
on	O
the	O
declarations	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
only	O
pay	O
such	O
difference	O
when	O
the	O
amount	O
of	O
benefit	O
under	O
the	O
foreign	O
plan	O
has	O
been	O
determined	O
and	O
we	O
have	O
satisfactory	O
evidence	O
of	O
such	O
determination	O
.	O

If	O
there	O
is	O
other	O
insurance	O
which	O
is	O
on	O
the	O
same	O
basis	O
as	O
this	O
insurance	O
,	O

will	O
not	O
pay	O
more	O
than	O
our	O
share	O
of	O
benefits	O
and	O
costs	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
insurance	O
and	O
other	O
insurance	O
or	O
self	O
-	O
insurance	O
.	O

Subject	O
to	O
any	O
limits	O
of	O
liability	O
that	O
may	O
apply	O
,	O
all	O
shares	O
will	O
be	O
equal	O
until	O
the	O
loss	O
is	O
paid	O
.	O

If	O
any	O
insurance	O
or	O
self	O
-	O
insurance	O
is	O
exhausted	O
,	O
the	O
shares	O
of	O
all	O
remaining	O
insurance	O
will	O
be	O
equal	O
until	O
the	O
loss	O
is	O
paid	O
.	O

We	O
have	O
no	O
duty	O
under	O
this	O
coverage	O
to	O

against	O

.	O

C	O
.	O
When	O
Coverage	O
Commences	O
and	O
Ends	O
If	O
an	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
is	O
not	O
hired	O
in	O
the	O
“	O
United	O
States	O
”	O
or	O
Canada	O
but	O
is	O
within	O
the	O
“	O
coverage	O
territory	O
”	O
,	O
coverage	O
with	O
respect	O
to	O
any	O
such	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
in	O
a	O
group	O
described	O
as	O
covered	O
on	O
the	O
declarations	O
will	O
apply	O
from	O
the	O
moment	O
of	O
hire	O
or	O
assignment	O
for	O
such	O
work	O
and	O
shall	O
cease	O
from	O
the	O
moment	O
employment	O
or	O
assignment	O
for	O
such	O
work	O
is	O
terminated	O
.	O

Coverage	O
will	O
be	O
provided	O
on	O
a	O
24	O
hour	O
basis	O
while	O
such	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
is	O
engaged	O
in	O
“	O
temporary	O
business	O
travel	O
”	O
.	O

Coverage	O
commences	O
and	O
ends	O
for	O
covered	O
“	O
local	O
national	O
”	O
“	O
employees	O
”	O
only	O
while	O
engaged	O
in	O
“	O
temporary	O
business	O
travel	O
”	O
for	O
Section	O
I	O
or	O
Section	O
III	O
coverage	O
.	O

If	O
an	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
is	O
hired	O
within	O
the	O
“	O
United	O
States	O
”	O
or	O
Canada	O
,	O
coverage	O
commences	O
on	O
a	O
24	O
hour	O
basis	O
for	O
“	O
temporary	O
business	O
travel	O
”	O
at	O
the	O
point	O
and	O
time	O
of	O
embarkation	O
for	O
departure	O
when	O
the	O
employee	O
leaves	O
the	O
land	O
or	O
waters	O
of	O
the	O
“	O
United	O
States	O
”	O
or	O
Canada	O
and	O
coverage	O
ends	O
when	O
the	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
returns	O
to	O
the	O
land	O
or	O
waters	O
of	O
the	O
“	O
United	O
States	O
”	O
or	O
Canada	O
.	O

If	O
the	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
leaves	O
your	O
employment	O
for	O
any	O
reason	O
,	O
coverage	O
ceases	O
when	O
employment	O
ends	O
.	O

D.	O
Your	O
Duties	O
If	O
Injury	O
Occurs	O

Tell	O
us	O
as	O
soon	O
as	O
practicable	O
if	O
injury	O
occurs	O
that	O
may	O
be	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
coverage	O
.	O

Your	O
other	O
duties	O
include	O
the	O
following	O
:	O

1	O
.	O

Provide	O
for	O
immediate	O
medical	O
and	O
other	O
services	O
required	O
by	O
“	O
workers	O
compensation	O
laws	O
”	O
and	O
to	O
minimize	O
injury	O
,	O

2	O
.	O

Give	O
us	O
or	O
our	O
agent	O
the	O
names	O
and	O
addresses	O
of	O
the	O
injured	O
persons	O
and	O
of	O
witnesses	O
,	O
and	O
other	O
information	O
we	O
may	O
need	O
,	O

3	O
.	O

Promptly	O
give	O
us	O
all	O
notices	O
,	O
demands	O
and	O
legal	O
papers	O
related	O
to	O
the	O
injury	O
,	O
claim	O
proceeding	O
or	O
suit	O
.	O

4	O
.	O
Cooperate	O
with	O
us	O
and	O
assist	O
us	O
as	O
we	O
may	O
request	O
during	O
the	O
investigation	O
,	O
settlement	O
or	O
defense	O
of	O

any	O
claim	O
,	O
proceeding	O
or	O
suit	O
.	O

5	O
.	O
Do	O
nothing	O
after	O
an	O
injury	O
occurs	O
that	O
would	O
interfere	O
with	O
our	O
right	O
to	O
recover	O
from	O
others	O
.	O

6	O
.	O
Do	O
not	O
voluntarily	O
make	O
payments	O
,	O
assume	O
obligations	O
or	O
incur	O
expenses	O
,	O
except	O
at	O
your	O
own	O
cost	O
.	O

E	O
.	O
Before	O
We	O
Pay	O

Before	O
we	O
pay	O
benefits	O
to	O
the	O
persons	O
entitled	O
to	O
them	O
,	O
they	O
must	O
:	O

1	O
.	O

Release	O
you	O
and	O
us	O
in	O
writing	O
of	O
all	O
legal	O
liability	O
for	O
the	O
injury	O
or	O
death	O
.	O

2	O
.	O
Transfer	O
to	O
us	O
their	O
right	O
to	O
recover	O
from	O
others	O
who	O
may	O
be	O
responsible	O
for	O
the	O
injury	O
or	O
death	O
;	O
and	O
3	O
.	O

Cooperate	O
with	O
us	O
and	O
do	O
everything	O
necessary	O
to	O
enable	O
us	O
to	O
enforce	O
the	O
right	O
to	O
recover	O
from	O
others	O
.	O

If	O
the	O
person	O
entitled	O
to	O
the	O
benefits	O
of	O
this	O
insurance	O
fails	O
to	O
do	O
these	O
things	O
,	O
our	O
duty	O
to	O
pay	O
ends	O
at	O
once	O
.	O

F.	O
Recovery	O
from	O
Others	O

If	O
we	O
make	O
a	O
recovery	O
from	O
others	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
keep	O
an	O
amount	O
equal	O
to	O
our	O
expenses	O
of	O
recovery	O
and	O
the	O
benefits	O
we	O
paid	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
pay	O
the	O
balance	O
to	O
the	O
persons	O
entitled	O
to	O
it	O
.	O

If	O
the	O
person	O
entitled	O
to	O
the	O
benefits	O
of	O
this	O
insurance	O
make	O
a	O
recovery	O
from	O
others	O
,	O
they	O
must	O
reimburse	O
us	O
for	O
the	O
benefits	O
we	O
paid	O
them	O
.	O

G.	O
Premium	O
Basis	O
Premium	O
is	O
determined	O
by	O
multiplying	O
a	O
rate	O
times	O
an	O
exposure	O
basis	O
.	O

Premiums	O
will	O
usually	O
be	O
based	O
upon	O
the	O
number	O
of	O
trips	O
made	O
outside	O
of	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
and	O
Canada	O
or	O
on	O
“	O
remuneration	O
”	O
of	O
“	O
employees	O
”	O
.	O

You	O
will	O
submit	O
to	O
us	O
an	O
estimate	O
of	O
the	O
number	O
of	O
trips	O
,	O
the	O
length	O
of	O
trips	O
,	O
and	O
destinations	O
;	O
and	O
an	O
estimate	O
of	O
“	O
remuneration	O
”	O
.	O

“	O
Remuneration	O
”	O
includes	O
payroll	O
,	O
allowances	O
relating	O
to	O
“	O
expatriate	O
employees	O
”	O
and	O
all	O
other	O
remuneration	O
paid	O
or	O
payable	O
during	O
the	O
policy	O
period	O
for	O
all	O
“	O
employees	O
”	O
and	O
officers	O
engaged	O
in	O
work	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
policy	O
in	O
the	O
“	O
coverage	O
territory	O
”	O
.	O

For	O
any	O
other	O
person	O
engaged	O
in	O
work	O
that	O
could	O
make	O
us	O
liable	O
under	O
this	O
policy	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
use	O
contract	O
price	O
for	O
services	O
and	O
material	O
as	O
an	O
exposure	O
basis	O
if	O
“	O
remuneration	O
”	O
is	O
not	O
available	O
or	O
there	O
is	O
no	O
evidence	O
of	O
other	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
.	O

H	O
.	O

Audit	O

The	O
premium	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
declarations	O
is	O
an	O
estimate	O
unless	O
otherwise	O
indicated	O
as	O
non-auditable	O
.	O

If	O
auditable	O
,	O
the	O
final	O
premium	O
for	O
each	O
period	O
of	O
this	O
coverage	O
will	O
be	O
calculated	O
after	O
the	O
end	O
of	O
such	O
period	O
by	O
using	O
the	O
actual	O
,	O
not	O
the	O
estimated	O
,	O
premium	O
basis	O
and	O
the	O
rates	O
that	O
apply	O
to	O
the	O
business	O
and	O
work	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
policy	O
.	O

If	O
the	O
final	O
premium	O
is	O
more	O
than	O
the	O
premium	O
you	O
paid	O
to	O
us	O
,	O
you	O
must	O
pay	O
us	O
the	O
balance	O
.	O

If	O
it	O
is	O
less	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
refund	O
the	O
balance	O
to	O
you	O
.	O

If	O
this	O
policy	O
is	O
canceled	O
,	O
the	O
final	O
premium	O
will	O
be	O
calculated	O
based	O
on	O
the	O
time	O
this	O
policy	O
was	O
in	O
force	O
.	O

NPG	O
EFP	O
0001	O
09	O
10	O
Page	O
8	O
of	O
10	O
?	O

You	O
will	O
let	O
us	O
examine	O
and	O
audit	O
all	O
your	O
records	O
that	O
relate	O
to	O
this	O
policy	O
.	O

These	O
records	O
may	O
include	O
ledgers	O
,	O
journals	O
,	O
registers	O
,	O
vouchers	O
,	O
contracts	O
,	O
tax	O
reports	O
,	O
payroll	O
and	O
disbursement	O
records	O
,	O
and	O
programs	O
for	O
storing	O
and	O
retrieving	O
data	O
.	O

We	O
may	O
conduct	O
the	O
audits	O
during	O
regular	O
business	O
hours	O
during	O
the	O
policy	O
period	O
and	O
within	O
three	O
years	O
after	O
the	O
policy	O
period	O
ends	O
.	O

Information	O
developed	O
by	O
audit	O
may	O
be	O
used	O
to	O
determine	O
final	O
premiums	O
.	O

I.	O
Payments	O
You	O
Must	O
Make	O

This	O
insurance	O
does	O
not	O
apply	O
to	O
any	O
payments	O
for	O
which	O
you	O
are	O
responsible	O
in	O
excess	O
of	O
the	O
statutory	O
benefits	O
regularly	O
provided	O
by	O
the	O
applicable	O
“	O
workers	O
’	O
compensation	O
law	O
”	O
including	O
those	O
required	O
because	O
:	O

1	O
.	O
Of	O
your	O
serious	O
and	O
willful	O
misconduct	O
;	O
2	O
.	O

You	O
knowingly	O
employ	O
an	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
in	O
violation	O
of	O
law	O
;	O
3	O
.	O

You	O
fail	O
to	O
comply	O
with	O
a	O
health	O
or	O
safety	O
law	O
or	O
regulation	O
;	O
or	O
4	O
.	O

You	O
discharge	O
,	O
coerce	O
or	O
otherwise	O
discriminate	O
against	O
any	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
in	O
violation	O
of	O
any	O
applicable	O

law	O
.	O

If	O
we	O
make	O
any	O
payments	O
in	O
excess	O
of	O
the	O
benefits	O
regularly	O
provided	O
by	O

“	O

’	O

law	O
”	O
on	O
your	O
behalf	O
,	O
you	O
will	O
reimburse	O
us	O
promptly	O
.	O

In	O
addition	O
,	O
you	O
agree	O
to	O

us	O
or	O
our	O
designee	O
for	O
services	O
rendered	O
on	O

“	O

”	O

later	O

to	O
not	O

by	O
this	O

.	O

”	O

Will	O
Also	O

We	O

pay	O
the	O
following	O
costs	O
,	O

payable	O
under	O
this	O
insurance	O
,	O
as	O
part	O
of	O
any	O
claim	O
,	O
proceeding	O
,	O
or	O
suit	O
we	O
defend	O
:	O

1	O
.	O
Reasonable	O
expenses	O
incurred	O
at	O
our	O
request	O
,	O
but	O
not	O
loss	O
of	O

;	O
2	O
.	O

Premiums	O

3	O
.	O

against	O

;	O
4	O
.	O

Interest	O
on	O
a	O

until	O

.	O

Expenses	O

.	O

L.	O
We	O
Will	O
Defend	O

We	O
have	O
the	O
right	O
and	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
,	O
at	O
our	O
expense	O
,	O
any	O
claim	O
,	O
proceeding	O
or	O
suit	O
against	O
you	O
for	O
damages	O

payable	O
by	O
this	O
insurance	O
.	O

We	O
have	O
the	O
right	O
to	O
investigate	O
and	O
settle	O
these	O
claims	O
,	O
proceedings	O
and	O
suits	O
.	O

We	O
have	O
no	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
a	O
claim	O
,	O
proceeding	O
or	O
suit	O
that	O
is	O
not	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
insurance	O
.	O

We	O
have	O
no	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
or	O
continue	O
defending	O
after	O
we	O
have	O
paid	O
our	O
applicable	O
limit	O
of	O
liability	O
under	O
this	O
insurance	O
.	O

In	O
jurisdictions	O
where	O
we	O
may	O
be	O
prevented	O
by	O
law	O
or	O
otherwise	O
from	O
investigating	O
,	O
settling	O
or	O
defending	O
suits	O
brought	O
against	O
you	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
reimburse	O
you	O
for	O
reasonable	O
cost	O
of	O
such	O
investigations	O
,	O
defense	O
,	O
or	O
settlements	O
,	O
subject	O
to	O
our	O
prior	O
authorization	O
.	O

You	O
will	O
investigate	O
and	O
defend	O
as	O
reasonably	O
necessary	O
under	O
our	O
supervision	O
and	O
subject	O
to	O
prior	O
approval	O
by	O
us	O
,	O
make	O
an	O
appropriate	O
settlement	O
.	O

M.	O
Legal	O
Action	O
Against	O
Us	O

No	O

a	O

of	O
this	O

;	O

.	O

.	O

N.	O
Arbitration	O

In	O
the	O
event	O
of	O
any	O
dispute	O
in	O
regards	O
to	O
claims	O
or	O
losses	O
,	O
then	O
the	O
dispute	O
will	O
be	O
arbitrated	O
in	O
the	O
state	O
designated	O
as	O
the	O
insured	O
location	O
in	O
the	O
declarations	O
.	O

Each	O
party	O
will	O
select	O
one	O
arbitrator	O
and	O
those	O
two	O
arbitrators	O
will	O
choose	O
a	O
third	O
arbitrator	O
.	O

If	O
the	O
arbitrators	O
are	O
not	O
selected	O
within	O
45	O
days	O
of	O
the	O
request	O
,	O
either	O
party	O
may	O
request	O
that	O
arbitration	O
be	O
submitted	O
to	O
the	O
American	O
Arbitration	O
Association	O
for	O
the	O
appointment	O
of	O
such	O
arbitrator	O
.	O

The	O
decision	O
of	O
the	O
arbitrators	O
shall	O
be	O
final	O
and	O
for	O
the	O
purpose	O
of	O
enforcing	O
any	O
award	O
,	O
which	O
is	O
subject	O
to	O
the	O
maximum	O
limits	O
as	O
stated	O
in	O
the	O
declarations	O
.	O

SECTION	O
VI	O
–	O
DEFINITIONS	O
A	O
.	O
"	O
Employee	O
”	O
means	O
any	O
of	O
the	O
following	O
if	O
indicated	O
as	O
covered	O
on	O
the	O
declarations	O
:	O
any	O
“	O
expatriate	O
employee	O
”	O
,	O

any	O
“	O
third	O
country	O
national	O
”	O
,	O
or	O
any	O
“	O
local	O
national	O
”	O
,	O
who	O
is	O
hired	O
by	O
you	O
to	O
work	O
within	O
the	O
“	O
coverage	O
territory	O
”	O
,	O
or	O
any	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
normally	O
employed	O
in	O
the	O
“	O
United	O
States	O
”	O
or	O
Canada	O
while	O
on	O
“	O
temporary	O
business	O
travel	O
”	O
outside	O
of	O
the	O
“	O
United	O
States	O
”	O
or	O
Canada	O
.	O

“	O
Employee	O
”	O
includes	O
any	O
person	O
who	O
is	O
employed	O
directly	O
by	O
you	O
,	O
receives	O
“	O
remuneration	O
”	O
directly	O
from	O
you	O
,	O
and	O
is	O
subject	O
to	O
your	O
control	O
.	O

At	O
your	O
option	O
,	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
also	O
includes	O
volunteers	O
,	O
temporary	O
or	O
leased	O
workers	O
,	O
independent	O
contractors	O
where	O
you	O
have	O
specified	O
coverage	O
by	O
written	O
contract	O
,	O
and	O
any	O
other	O
person	O
specifically	O
designated	O
as	O
an	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
.	O

If	O
not	O
specifically	O
designated	O
or	O
described	O
,	O
no	O
other	O
person	O
qualifies	O
as	O
an	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
.	O

B.	O
"	O
Endemic	O
Disease	O
”	O
means	O
any	O
disease	O
which	O
is	O
1	O
.	O

Infectious	O
and	O
generally	O
recognized	O
as	O
a	O

;	O
2	O
.	O

Restricted	O
or	O
peculiar	O
to	O
a	O
locality	O
or	O
region	O
;	O
and	O
3	O
.	O

Not	O
disease	O
caused	O
or	O
aggravated	O
by	O
the	O
conditions	O
of	O
your	O
employment	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

N.	O
“	O

”	O

,	O

,	O

these	O
.	O

O.	O
“	O
Terrorism	O
”	O
means	O
activities	O
against	O
persons	O
,	O
organizations	O
or	O
property	O
of	O
any	O
nature	O
:	O

1	O
.	O

following	O
or	O

for	O
the	O

:	O

(	O
a	O
)	O

or	O

of	O

or	O

(	O
b	O
)	O
Commission	O

dangerous	O

)	O

that	O

with	O

.	O

:	O

(	O
a	O
)	O

The	O

of	O

?	O

.	O

a	O

have	O

Deductible	O
will	O
be	O
applied	O
only	O
once	O
per	O
occurrence	O
.	O

E.	O
Conditions	O

1	O
.	O
Abandonment	O

There	O
can	O
be	O
no	O
abandonment	O
of	O
any	O
property	O
to	O
us	O
2	O
.	O
Appraisal	O

If	O
we	O
and	O
you	O
disagree	O
on	O
the	O
values	O
of	O
the	O
property	O
or	O
the	O
amount	O
of	O
loss	O
,	O
either	O
may	O
make	O
written	O
de	O
-	O
mand	O
for	O
an	O
appraisal	O
of	O
the	O
loss	O
.	O

In	O
this	O
event	O
,	O
each	O
party	O
will	O
select	O
a	O
competent	O
and	O
impartial	O
appraiser	O
.	O

The	O
two	O
appraisers	O
will	O
select	O
an	O
umpire	O
.	O

If	O
they	O
can	O
not	O
agree	O
,	O
either	O
may	O
request	O
that	O
selection	O
be	O
made	O
by	O
a	O
judge	O
of	O
a	O
court	O
having	O
jurisdiction	O
.	O

The	O
appraisers	O
will	O
state	O
separately	O
the	O
value	O
of	O
the	O
property	O
and	O
amount	O
of	O
loss	O
.	O

If	O
they	O
fail	O
to	O
agree	O
,	O
they	O
will	O
submit	O
their	O
differences	O
to	O
the	O
umpire	O
.	O

A	O
decision	O
agreed	O
to	O
by	O
any	O
two	O
will	O
be	O
binding	O
.	O

Each	O
party	O
will	O
:	O
a.	O
Pay	O
it	O
s	O
chosen	O
appraiser	O
;	O
and	O
b.	O

Bear	O
the	O
other	O
expenses	O
of	O
the	O
appraisal	O
and	O
umpire	O
equally	O
.	O

If	O
there	O
is	O
an	O
appraisal	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
still	O
retain	O
our	O
right	O
to	O
deny	O
the	O
claim	O
.	O

3	O
.	O
Duties	O

Event	O
Of	O
Loss	O
Or	O
Damage	O
a	O
.	O

to	O

Property	O

(	O
1	O
)	O

.	O

(	O
2	O
)	O

of	O

or	O

.	O

Include	O
a	O

of	O

.	O

(	O
3	O
)	O

(	O

)	O

of	O
America	O
.	O

of	O

date	O
that	O
the	O
proof	O
of	O
loss	O
is	O
executed	O
by	O
us	O
.	O

the	O

a	O
business	O

in	O
-	O
volving	O
a	O

policy	O
we	O
cover	O
loss	O
or	O
damage	O
commencing	O
:	O
(	O
1	O
)	O
During	O
the	O
policy	O
period	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
Declarations	O
;	O
and	O
(	O
2	O
)	O
Within	O
the	O
“	O
coverage	O
territory	O
”	O
.	O

F.	O
Definitions	O
1	O
.	O
"	O
Fungus	O
"	O
means	O
any	O
type	O
or	O
form	O
of	O
fungus	O
,	O
including	O
mold	O
or	O
mildew	O
,	O
and	O
any	O
mycotoxins	O
,	O
spores	O
,	O
scents	O

or	O
by-products	O
produced	O
or	O
released	O
by	O
fungi	O
.	O

2	O
.	O
"	O
Pollutants	O
"	O
means	O
any	O
solid	O
,	O
liquid	O
,	O
gaseous	O
or	O
thermal	O
irritant	O
or	O
contaminant	O
,	O
including	O
smoke	O
,	O
vapor	O
,	O

soot	O
,	O
fumes	O
,	O
acids	O
,	O
alkalis	O
,	O
chemicals	O
and	O
waste	O
.	O

Waste	O
includes	O
materials	O
to	O
be	O
recycled	O
,	O
reconditioned	O
or	O
reclaimed	O
.	O

3	O
.	O
"	O
Stock	O
"	O
means	O
merchandise	O
held	O
in	O
storage	O
or	O
for	O
sale	O
,	O
raw	O
materials	O
and	O
in-	O
process	O
or	O
finished	O
goods	O
,	O
including	O
supplies	O
used	O
in	O
their	O
packing	O
or	O
shipping	O
.	O

4	O
.	O
"	O
Unoccupied	O
"	O
means	O
containing	O
contents	O
pertaining	O
to	O
the	O
occupancy	O
of	O
the	O
building	O
while	O
operations	O
or	O
other	O
customary	O
activities	O
are	O
suspended	O
.	O

5	O
.	O
"	O
Vacant	O
"	O
means	O
containing	O
no	O
contents	O
pertaining	O
to	O
operations	O
or	O
activities	O
customary	O
to	O
occupancy	O
of	O
the	O
building	O
.	O

0001	O
09	O
10	O
Page	O
20	O
of	O
21	O
?	O

6	O
.	O
“	O
Electronic	O
Data	O
”	O
means	O
information	O
,	O
facts	O
or	O
computer	O
programs	O
stored	O
as	O
or	O
on	O
,	O
created	O
or	O
used	O
on	O
,	O
or	O
transmitted	O
to	O
or	O
from	O
computer	O
software	O
(	O
including	O
systems	O
and	O
applications	O
software	O
)	O
,	O
on	O
hard	O
or	O
floppy	O
disks	O
,	O
CD	O
-	O
ROMs	O
,	O
tapes	O
,	O
drives	O
,	O
cells	O
,	O
data	O
processing	O
devices	O
or	O
any	O
other	O
repositories	O
of	O
computer	O
soft	O
-	O
ware	O
which	O
are	O
used	O
with	O
electronically	O
controlled	O
equipment	O
.	O

The	O
term	O
computer	O
programs	O
,	O
referred	O
to	O
in	O
the	O
foregoing	O
description	O
of	O
“	O
electronic	O
data	O
”	O
,	O
means	O
a	O
set	O
of	O
related	O
electronic	O
instructions	O
which	O
direct	O
the	O
operations	O
and	O
functions	O
of	O
a	O
computer	O
or	O
device	O
connected	O
to	O
it	O
,	O
which	O
enable	O
the	O
computer	O
or	O
device	O
to	O
receive	O
,	O
process	O
,	O
store	O
,	O
retrieve	O
or	O
send	O
data	O
.	O

7	O
.	O
“	O
Occurrence	O
”	O
means	O
any	O
one	O
loss	O
,	O
disaster	O
,	O
casualty	O
,	O
or	O
series	O
of	O
losses	O
,	O
disasters	O
,	O
or	O
casualties	O
arising	O
out	O
of	O
one	O
event	O
.	O

One	O
event	O
shall	O
be	O
construed	O
to	O
be	O
all	O
losses	O
arising	O
from	O
perils	O
such	O
as	O
hurricanes	O
,	O
hail	O
,	O
etc.	O
,	O
during	O
a	O
continuous	O
period	O
of	O
72	O
hours	O
.	O

8	O
.	O
“	O
Difference	O
in	O
Conditions	O
”	O
means	O
insurance	O
which	O
pays	O
only	O
the	O
amount	O
for	O
loss	O
or	O
damage	O
under	O
the	O
terms	O
and	O
conditions	O
that	O
are	O
broader	O
than	O
coverage	O
under	O
other	O
policies	O
the	O
insured	O
has	O
for	O
the	O
same	O
property	O
.	O

.	O
“	O
Valuable	O
papers	O
”	O
means	O
papers	O
and	O
records	O
that	O
include	O
but	O
are	O
not	O
limited	O
to	O
proprietary	O
information	O
,	O

of	O

,	O

,	O

,	O

,	O
drawings	O
and	O
card	O
index	O
systems	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

of	O

.	O

Ends	O
on	O
the	O

:	O
(	O
1	O
)	O
The	O
date	O
when	O

at	O

)	O
The	O

resumed	O
at	O
a	O
new	O

.	O

NPG	O
CPC	O
0002	O
1114	O
Page	O
1	O
of	O
4	O

Description	O
of	O
Assistance	O
Services	O
Provided	O
With	O
Your	O
Policy	O

In	O
addition	O
to	O
the	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
provided	O
under	O
your	O
policy	O
,	O
you	O
also	O
receive	O
integrated	O
medical	O
and	O
security	O
assistance	O
services	O
from	O
United	O
Healthcare	O
Global	O
Assistance	O
.	O

These	O
services	O
provide	O
additional	O
protection	O
and	O
convenience	O
for	O
you	O
and	O
your	O
traveling	O
“	O
employees	O
.	O
”	O

All	O
of	O
these	O
services	O
are	O
available	O
to	O
you	O
and	O
your	O
traveling	O
“	O
employees	O
”	O
while	O
you	O
are	O
insured	O
by	O
this	O
policy	O
.	O

These	O
services	O
are	O
not	O
insurance	O
,	O
thus	O
the	O
usage	O
of	O
some	O
of	O
these	O
will	O
be	O
at	O
your	O
own	O
cost	O
.	O

Depending	O
on	O
your	O
selection	O
of	O
coverages	O
and	O
which	O
“	O
employees	O
”	O
you	O
choose	O
to	O
cover	O
,	O
some	O
of	O
the	O
services	O
could	O
be	O
reimbursable	O
by	O
this	O
insurance	O
policy	O
or	O
by	O
other	O
insurance	O
policies	O
you	O
may	O
have	O
.	O

If	O
we	O
advance	O
payment	O
or	O
guarantee	O
payment	O
for	O
any	O
service	O
that	O
is	O
later	O
determined	O
not	O
to	O

under	O
your	O
insurance	O
policy	O
,	O
you	O
or	O

“	O

”	O
agree	O
to	O

for	O
the	O

.	O

Any	O

for	O
assistance	O
services	O

not	O

.	O

.	O

How	O
To	O

24	O
hours	O
a	O

,	O
7	O

days	O
a	O
year	O

United	O
Healthcare	O
Global	O
Assistance	O
is	O
your	O

to	O
safe	O
travel	O
.	O

If	O

“	O

”	O

,	O

The	O
toll	O

and	O
collect	O

-	O

of	O
the	O
country	O
you	O

in	O

the	O
Emergency	O
Response	O
Center	O

at	O
:	O

Baltimore	O
,	O
Maryland	O
+1-410-453-6330	O

A	O
multilingual	O
assistance	O
coordinator	O
will	O
ask	O
for	O
the	O
name	O
of	O

traveling	O
“	O

”	O

United	O
Healthcare	O
Global	O
Assistance	O
ID	O
number	O
shown	O
on	O
your	O
card	O
,	O
and	O
a	O
description	O
of	O
the	O
situation	O
.	O

We	O
will	O

providing	O
assistance	O
.	O

A	O
full	O
listing	O
of	O
services	O
follows	O
.	O

If	O

condition	O
is	O

We	O

and	O

.	O

DESCRIPTION	O
OF	O
ALL	O
SERVICES	O

MEDICAL	O
ASSISTANCE	O
SERVICES	O

Worldwide	O
Medical	O
and	O
Dental	O
Referrals	O
:	O

will	O
provide	O
referrals	O
to	O

appropriate	O
treatment	O
or	O
care	O
.	O

Monitoring	O
of	O
Treatment	O
:	O

Our	O
assistance	O

will	O
continually	O
monitor	O
your	O
case	O
.	O

In	O

and	O

of	O
the	O

you	O

receiving	O
.	O

Facilitation	O
of	O
Hospital	O
Payments	O
:	O

Upon	O
securing	O
payment	O
or	O
a	O

to	O

,	O
we	O
will	O
either	O

required	O
emergency	O
hospital	O

.	O

are	O
ultimately	O

of	O

of	O

.	O

/	O

MEDICAL	O
EVACUATION	O
&	O
REPATRIATION	O
SERVICES	O

The	O
following	O
services	O
are	O
available	O
if	O
you	O
suffer	O
an	O
“	O
injury	O
”	O

and	O
unexpected	O
“	O
illness	O
”	O
and	O

condition	O
requires	O
