emergency	O
services	O
:	O

Emergency	O
Medical	O
Evacuation	O
:	O

If	O
you	O
sustain	O
an	O
“	O
injury	O
”	O
or	O
suffer	O
a	O
sudden	O
and	O
unexpected	O
“	O
illness	O
”	O
and	O
adequate	O
medical	O
treatment	O
is	O
not	O
available	O
in	O
your	O
current	O
location	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
arrange	O
for	O
a	O
medically	O
supervised	O
evacuation	O
to	O
the	O
nearest	O
medical	O
facility	O
we	O
determine	O
to	O
be	O
capable	O
of	O
providing	O
appropriate	O
medical	O
treatment	O
.	O

Your	O
medical	O
condition	O
and	O
situation	O
must	O
be	O
such	O
that	O
,	O
in	O
the	O
professional	O
opinion	O
of	O
the	O
health	O
care	O
provider	O
and	O
United	O
Healthcare	O
Global	O
Assistance	O
,	O
you	O
require	O
immediate	O
emergency	O
medical	O
treatment	O
,	O
without	O
which	O
there	O
would	O
be	O
a	O
significant	O
risk	O
of	O
death	O
or	O
serious	O
impairment	O
.	O

Transportation	O
to	O
Join	O
a	O
Hospitalized	O

Participant	O
:	O

you	O
are	O
traveling	O
alone	O
and	O
are	O
or	O
will	O
be	O

,	O

for	O
a	O
person	O
of	O
your	O
choice	O
to	O
join	O
you	O
.	O

of	O
Dependent	O
Children	O
:	O

(	O

)	O
age	O
18	O

are	O

“	O

”	O

.	O

WORLDWIDE	O
DESTINATION	O
INTELLIGENCE	O

Destination	O
Profiles	O
:	O

When	O
preparing	O
for	O
travel	O
,	O
you	O
can	O
contact	O
the	O
Emergency	O
Response	O
Center	O
to	O
have	O
a	O
pre-trip	O
destination	O
report	O
sent	O
to	O
you	O
.	O

This	O
report	O
draws	O
upon	O
our	O
intelligence	O
database	O
of	O
over	O
170	O
countries	O
and	O
280	O
cities	O
covering	O
subjects	O
such	O
as	O
health	O
and	O
security	O
risks	O
,	O
immunizations	O
,	O
vaccinations	O
,	O
local	O
hospitals	O
,	O
crime	O
,	O
emergency	O
phone	O
numbers	O
,	O
culture	O
,	O
weather	O
,	O
transportation	O
information	O
,	O
entry	O
and	O
exit	O
requirements	O
,	O
and	O
currency	O
.	O

Our	O
global	O
medical	O
and	O
security	O
database	O
is	O
continuously	O
updated	O
and	O
includes	O
intelligence	O
from	O
thousands	O
of	O
worldwide	O
sources	O
.	O

SECURITY	O
AND	O
POLITICAL	O
EVACUATION	O
ASSISTANCE	O
SERVICES	O
Political	O
Evacuation	O
Services	O
:	O

In	O
the	O
event	O
the	O
officials	O
of	O
your	O
“	O
home	O
country	O
”	O
issue	O
a	O
written	O
recommendation	O
that	O
you	O
leave	O
your	O
“	O
host	O
country	O
”	O
for	O
non-medical	O
reasons	O
,	O
or	O
if	O
you	O
are	O
expelled	O
or	O
declared	O
“	O
persona	O
non	O
grata	O
”	O
on	O
the	O
written	O
authority	O
of	O
your	O
“	O
host	O
country	O
”	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
assist	O
you	O
in	O
making	O
evacuation	O
arrangements	O
,	O
including	O
flight	O
arrangements	O
,	O
securing	O
visas	O
,	O
and	O
logistical	O
arrangements	O
such	O
as	O
ground	O
transportation	O
and	O
housing	O
.	O

In	O
more	O
complex	O
situations	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
assist	O
you	O
in	O
making	O
arrangements	O
with	O
providers	O
of	O
specialized	O
security	O
services	O
.	O

Security	O
Evacuation	O
Services	O
:	O

In	O
the	O
event	O
of	O
an	O
“	O
emergency	O
security	O
situation	O
”	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
assist	O
you	O
in	O
making	O
evacuation	O
arrangements	O
,	O
including	O
flight	O
arrangements	O
,	O
securing	O
visas	O
,	O
and	O
logistical	O
arrangements	O
such	O
as	O
ground	O
transportation	O
and	O
housing	O
.	O

In	O
more	O
complex	O
situations	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
assist	O
you	O
in	O
making	O
arrangements	O
with	O
providers	O
of	O
specialized	O
security	O
services	O
.	O

Transportation	O
After	O
Political	O
and	O
Security	O
Evacuation	O
:	O

Following	O
a	O
Political	O
or	O
Security	O
Evacuation	O
and	O
when	O
safety	O
allows	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
coordinate	O
your	O
return	O
to	O
either	O
your	O
“	O
host	O
country	O
”	O
or	O
your	O
“	O
home	O
country	O
”	O
.	O

DEFINITIONS	O

The	O
following	O
definitions	O
apply	O
:	O

1	O
.	O
“	O
Emergency	O
Security	O
Situation	O
”	O
means	O
a	O
civil	O
and	O
/	O
or	O
military	O
uprising	O
,	O
insurrection	O
,	O
war	O
,	O
revolution	O
,	O
or	O
other	O
violent	O

disturbance	O
in	O
a	O
“	O
host	O
country	O
”	O
,	O
which	O
results	O
in	O
either	O
your	O
“	O
home	O
country	O
”	O
or	O
“	O
host	O
country	O
”	O
advising	O
immediate	O
evacuation	O
.	O

“	O
Emergency	O
Security	O
Situation	O
”	O
does	O
not	O
include	O
“	O
natural	O
disasters	O
”	O
.	O

2	O
.	O
“	O
Home	O
Country	O
”	O
means	O
the	O
country	O
as	O
shown	O
on	O
your	O
passport	O
or	O
the	O
country	O
where	O
you	O
have	O
your	O
permanent	O
residence	O
.	O

3	O
.	O
“	O
Host	O
Country	O
”	O
means	O
a	O
country	O
or	O
territory	O
you	O
are	O
visiting	O
or	O
in	O
which	O
you	O
are	O
living	O
which	O
is	O
not	O
your	O
“	O
home	O
country	O
”	O
.	O

4	O
.	O
“	O
Illness	O
”	O
means	O
a	O
sudden	O
and	O
unexpected	O
sickness	O
that	O
manifests	O
itself	O
during	O
the	O
policy	O
period	O
.	O

5	O
.	O
“	O
Injury	O
”	O
means	O
an	O
identifiable	O
accidental	O
“	O
injury	O
”	O
caused	O
by	O
a	O
sudden	O
,	O
unexpected	O
,	O
unusual	O
,	O
specific	O
event	O
that	O

occurs	O
during	O
the	O
policy	O
period	O
.	O

6	O
.	O
“	O
United	O
Healthcare	O
Global	O
Assistance	O
Physician	O
Advisors	O
”	O
means	O
physicians	O
,	O
retained	O
by	O
United	O
Healthcare	O
Global	O

Assistance	O
to	O
provide	O
us	O
with	O
consultative	O
and	O
advisory	O
services	O
,	O
including	O
the	O
review	O
and	O
analysis	O
of	O
the	O
quality	O
of	O
medical	O
care	O
you	O
are	O
receiving	O
.	O

7	O
.	O
“	O
Natural	O
Disaster	O
”	O
means	O
an	O
event	O
occurring	O
directly	O
from	O
natural	O
cause	O
,	O
including	O
but	O
not	O
limited	O
to	O
,	O
earthquake	O
,	O
flood	O
,	O
storm	O
(	O
wind	O
,	O
rain	O
,	O
snow	O
,	O
sleet	O
,	O
hail	O
,	O
lightning	O
,	O
dust	O
or	O
sand	O
)	O
,	O
tsunami	O
,	O
volcanic	O
eruption	O
,	O
wildfire	O
or	O
other	O
similar	O
event	O
that	O
results	O
in	O
severe	O
and	O
widespread	O
damage	O
such	O
that	O
the	O
area	O
of	O
damage	O
is	O
declared	O
a	O
disaster	O
area	O
by	O
the	O
government	O
of	O
the	O
home	O
or	O
“	O
host	O
country	O
”	O
.	O

8	O
.	O
“	O
Employee	O
”	O
means	O
a	O
person	O
employed	O
directly	O
by	O
you	O
who	O
received	O
remuneration	O
from	O
you	O
and	O
is	O
subject	O
to	O
your	O
control	O
.	O

“	O
Employee	O
”	O
also	O
includes	O
volunteers	O
,	O
temporary	O
or	O
leased	O
workers	O
,	O
and	O
any	O
other	O
person	O
specifically	O
designated	O
as	O
an	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
on	O
our	O
declarations	O
pages	O
.	O
A	O
spouse	O
or	O
child	O
accompanying	O
an	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
on	O
a	O
short	O
term	O
business	O
trip	O
will	O
also	O
be	O
included	O
for	O
assistance	O
services	O
.	O

1114	O

CONDITIONS	O
AND	O
LIMITATIONS	O

The	O
services	O
described	O
are	O

during	O
the	O

period	O
.	O

Medical	O
and	O
security	O
services	O
are	O
available	O
to	O

or	O

“	O
employees	O
”	O
only	O

outside	O
your	O
“	O
home	O
country	O
”	O
and	O
within	O
the	O
“	O
coverage	O
territory	O
”	O
.	O

We	O
are	O
not	O

for	O
the	O
availability	O
,	O
timing	O
,	O
quality	O
,	O
results	O
of	O
,	O

to	O
provide	O
any	O
medical	O
,	O
security	O
,	O

or	O
other	O

or	O

by	O

beyond	O

United	O
Healthcare	O
Global	O
Assistance	O
.	O

This	O

your	O
failure	O
to	O
obtain	O
care	O
or	O
service	O
or	O
where	O
the	O

of	O

.	O

Your	O

the	O

to	O

and	O
on	O

if	O
you	O
are	O
incapacitated	O
or	O

.	O

We	O
and	O
United	O
Healthcare	O
Global	O
Assistance	O
shall	O
not	O

for	O

any	O

a	O

arising	O
from	O
:	O

(	O
1	O
)	O
You	O
’re	O
traveling	O
against	O
the	O

of	O
a	O

.	O

(	O
2	O
)	O

assistance	O

“	O

”	O
.	O

(	O

.	O

(	O

,	O

,	O

.	O

TO	O
UNITEDHEALTHCARE	O
GLOBAL	O
ASSITANCE	O
AND	O
RIGHTS	O
OF	O
SUBROGATION	O

You	O
agree	O
that	O
you	O
or	O
your	O
“	O
employees	O
”	O
may	O
receive	O
certain	O
services	O
as	O
described	O
above	O
and	O
provided	O
by	O
United	O
Healthcare	O
Global	O
Assistance	O
.	O

You	O
understand	O
that	O
certain	O
of	O
these	O
services	O
are	O
not	O
covered	O
by	O
insurance	O
and	O
that	O
in	O
emergency	O
situations	O
;	O
United	O
Healthcare	O
Global	O
Assistance	O
may	O
provide	O
certain	O
services	O
without	O
knowledge	O
of	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
or	O
insurance	O
applicability	O
.	O

You	O
agree	O
to	O
indemnify	O
and	O
reimburse	O
United	O
Healthcare	O
Global	O
Assistance	O
or	O
the	O
insurance	O
company	O
for	O
any	O

incurred	O
in	O
any	O
situation	O
which	O
is	O
not	O
covered	O
by	O
insurance	O
under	O
this	O
policy	O
or	O
for	O
which	O
the	O
limit	O
of	O
insurance	O
is	O
exceeded	O
.	O

Any	O

payment	O
owing	O
under	O
this	O
agreement	O
shall	O
be	O
due	O
and	O
payable	O
within	O
15	O
days	O
of	O
notification	O
.	O

Such	O
reimbursement	O
shall	O
be	O
without	O
regard	O
to	O
the	O
specific	O
terms	O
,	O
conditions	O
,	O
or	O
limitations	O
of	O
any	O
insurance	O
policies	O
or	O
benefits	O
available	O
to	O
you	O
.	O

We	O
shall	O
be	O
fully	O
and	O
completely	O

to	O
your	O
rights	O
against	O
parties	O

.	O

This	O
endorsement	O
modifies	O
insurance	O
provided	O

:	O

COMMON	O
POLICY	O
CONDITIONS	O

The	O
following	O
is	O
added	O
:	O

The	O
term	O
“	O
Named	O
Insured	O
”	O
includes	O
any	O
direct	O
or	O
indirect	O
subsidiary	O
,	O
including	O
but	O
not	O
limited	O
to	O
,	O
any	O
affiliated	O
,	O

,	O

,	O

or	O

company	O
,	O
that	O

of	O

policy	O
is	O

by	O
the	O
first	O
Named	O
Insured	O
set	O
forth	O
in	O
the	O
Declarations	O
,	O
but	O
only	O
if	O
such	O

and	O

operations	O
have	O
been	O
declared	O
in	O
writing	O
to	O
us	O
prior	O
to	O
such	O
inception	O
date	O
.	O

An	O
entity	O
shall	O
qualify	O
as	O
a	O
subsidiary	O
if	O
more	O
than	O
50	O
%	O
of	O
its	O
ownership	O
interest	O
is	O
owned	O
by	O
its	O
direct	O
parent	O
.	O

In	O
addition	O
,	O
if	O
you	O
exercise	O
management	O
control	O
or	O
financial	O
control	O
over	O
a	O
newly	O
formed	O
partnership	O
or	O
joint	O
venture	O
,	O
that	O
partnership	O
or	O
joint	O
venture	O
is	O
included	O
as	O
a	O
named	O
insured	O
to	O
the	O
extent	O
of	O
the	O
insured	O
’s	O
interest	O
subject	O
to	O
the	O
limit	O
of	O
liability	O
.	O

VIII	O
.	O

Bodily	O
Injury	O
Definition	O
Extension	O
Section	O
V.3.	O
is	O
amended	O
to	O
read	O
:	O
“	O
Bodily	O
Injury	O
”	O
means	O
physical	O
injury	O
,	O
sickness	O
or	O
disease	O
sustained	O
by	O
a	O
person	O
,	O
including	O
death	O
resulting	O
from	O
any	O
of	O
these	O
at	O
any	O
time	O
.	O
When	O
accompanied	O
by	O
physical	O
injury	O
,	O
sickness	O
or	O
disease	O
,	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
also	O
includes	O
mental	O
anguish	O
,	O
shock	O
,	O
humiliation	O
,	O
or	O
emotional	O
distress	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

"	O

"	O

.	O

–	O
Coverages	O
:	O
COVERAGE	O
–	O
Crisis	O
Communication	O
Management	O
Insurance	O

Crisis	O
Communication	O
Management	O
Insurance	O
Policy	O
Limit	O
-	O
$	O
25,000.00___	O

Subject	O
to	O
the	O
limit	O
of	O
liability	O
shown	O
above	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
reimburse	O
or	O
pay	O
those	O
“	O
crisis	O
management	O
fees	O
”	O
incurred	O
by	O
you	O
as	O
a	O
direct	O
result	O
of	O
a	O
“	O
crisis	O
event	O
”	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
applies	O
,	O
but	O
only	O
if	O
the	O
“	O
crisis	O
event	O
”	O
:	O

a.	O
commences	O
during	O
the	O
policy	O
period	O
;	O
b.	O
is	O
discovered	O
by	O
you	O
and	O
reported	O
in	O
writing	O
to	O
us	O
during	O
the	O
policy	O
period	O
;	O
and	O
c.	O
arises	O
out	O
of	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
or	O
“	O
property	O
damage	O
”	O
for	O
which	O
coverage	O
is	O
provided	O
under	O
the	O
policy	O
or	O
“	O
imminent	O
injury	O
”	O
but	O
only	O
with	O
respect	O
to	O
a	O
“	O
crisis	O
event	O
”	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
applies	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
pay	O
those	O
“	O
crisis	O
management	O
fees	O
”	O
you	O
incur	O
even	O
if	O
coverage	O
under	O
this	O
policy	O
is	O
still	O
unconfirmed	O
by	O
us	O
,	O
but	O
we	O
will	O
stop	O
paying	O
such	O
fees	O
as	O
soon	O
as	O
it	O
becomes	O
evident	O
,	O
to	O
either	O
you	O
or	O
us	O
,	O
that	O
this	O
insurance	O
does	O
not	O
apply	O
.	O

“	O
Crisis	O
management	O
fees	O
”	O
are	O
not	O
subject	O
to	O
any	O
retention	O
or	O
deductible	O
.	O

The	O
knowledge	O
of	O
a	O
“	O
crisis	O
management	O
event	O
”	O
by	O
an	O
insured	O
constitutes	O
discovery	O
on	O
your	O
part	O
.	O

The	O
following	O
definitions	O
are	O
added	O
to	O
Section	O
V	O
–	O
Definitions	O
:	O

“	O
Crisis	O
Management	O
Fees	O
”	O
mean	O
those	O
reasonable	O
and	O
necessary	O
fees	O
and	O
expenses	O
,	O
incurred	O
by	O
you	O
within	O
ninety	O
(	O
90	O
)	O
days	O
after	O
the	O
“	O
crisis	O
event	O
”	O
is	O
discovered	O
by	O
you	O
,	O
or	O
as	O
approved	O
by	O
us	O
in	O
writing	O
;	O
for	O
services	O
provided	O
to	O
you	O
by	O
a	O
“	O
crisis	O
management	O
firm	O
”	O
for	O

sole	O
purpose	O
of	O
assisting	O
you	O
with	O
:	O

1	O
.	O

Managing	O
the	O
media	O
in	O
direct	O
response	O
to	O
a	O
“	O
crisis	O
event	O
”	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
applies	O
;	O
or	O

2	O
.	O

Minimizing	O
the	O
economic	O
harm	O
to	O
you	O

by	O
a	O
“	O
crisis	O
event	O
”	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
applies	O
by	O
consulting	O
with	O
you	O
with	O
respect	O
to	O
maintaining	O
and	O
restoring	O
your	O
public	O
image	O
or	O
reputation	O
.	O

must	O

to	O

“	O
crisis	O
management	O
fees	O
”	O
.	O

”	O

a	O

.	O

following	O
is	O
added	O
to	O
Section	O
III	O
–	O
AD&D	O
,	O
Emergency	O
Medical	O
,	O
and	O
Repatriation	O
–	O
24	O
Hour	O
Coverage	O
,	O
A.	O
How	O
This	O
Insurance	O
Applies	O
:	O

Designated	O
Companion	O
Coverage	O

This	O
coverage	O
only	O
applies	O
when	O
:	O

1	O
.	O

A	O
covered	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
is	O
alone	O
and	O
has	O
been	O
admitted	O
to	O
a	O
hospital	O
for	O
more	O
than	O
24	O
hours	O
for	O
care	O
of	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
that	O
is	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
policy	O
;	O

2	O
.	O

A	O
covered	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
requires	O
a	O
non-medical	O
escort	O
in	O
the	O
opinion	O
of	O
our	O
assistance	O
service	O
provider	O
for	O
a	O
medical	O
repatriation	O
that	O
is	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
policy	O
;	O
or	O

3	O
.	O

A	O
covered	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
is	O
deceased	O
and	O
the	O
repatriation	O
of	O
remains	O
is	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
policy	O
.	O

If	O
this	O
coverage	O
applies	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
pay	O
the	O
following	O
expenses	O
for	O
one	O
individual	O
to	O
join	O
,	O
remain	O
with	O
or	O
accompany	O
the	O
covered	O
“	O
employee	O
”	O
:	O

1	O
.	O

Round	O
trip	O
economy	O
class	O
airfare	O
;	O
and	O

2	O
.	O

Reasonable	O
and	O
necessary	O
incidental	O
expenses	O
,	O
including	O
but	O
not	O
limited	O
to	O
lodging	O
and	O
meals	O
,	O
up	O
to	O
a	O
maximum	O
of	O
$	O
300	O
per	O
day	O
and	O
$	O
5,000	O
per	O
occurrence	O
.	O

This	O
coverage	O
does	O
not	O
reduce	O
the	O
Limits	O
of	O
Insurance	O
shown	O
on	O
the	O
declarations	O
page	O
.	O

coverage	O
is	O

to	O

conditions	O
and	O
exclusions	O
applicable	O
to	O
SECTION	O
III	O

advice	O

other	O

assistance	O

or	O
other	O
similar	O

with	O

in	O
the	O
required	O
field	O
.	O

This	O
is	O
a	O
proposal	O
for	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
and	O
is	O
not	O
an	O
insurance	O
policy	O
.	O

coverage	O
description	O
shown	O
in	O
this	O
proposal	O
may	O

title	O
and	O
does	O
not	O

insurance	O
policy	O
language	O
.	O

the	O
insurance	O
policy	O
itself	O
provides	O
coverage	O
.	O

This	O
proposal	O
is	O
not	O

of	O
and	O
is	O
not	O
incorporated	O
into	O
the	O
insurance	O
policy	O
.	O

,	O
are	O

are	O
not	O

itself	O
and	O
do	O
not	O

final	O

and	O

of	O
the	O
insurance	O
policy	O
.	O

If	O
there	O
is	O
any	O
conflict	O

Proposal	O

in	O

.	O

by	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

and	O

other	O
terms	O
under	O
this	O
policy	O
,	O
we	O
shall	O
not	O
provide	O
coverage	O
nor	O
will	O
we	O
make	O
any	O
payments	O
or	O
provide	O
any	O
service	O
or	O
benefit	O
to	O
any	O
insured	O
,	O
beneficiary	O
,	O
or	O
third	O
party	O
who	O
may	O
have	O
any	O
rights	O
under	O
this	O
policy	O
to	O
the	O
extent	O
that	O
such	O
cover	O
,	O
payment	O
,	O
service	O
,	O
benefit	O
,	O
or	O
any	O
business	O
or	O
activity	O
of	O
the	O
insured	O
would	O
violate	O
any	O
applicable	O
trade	O
or	O
economic	O
sanctions	O
law	O
or	O
regulation	O
.	O

This	O
Condition	O
shall	O
not	O
be	O
superseded	O
by	O
the	O
terms	O
,	O
conditions	O
,	O
limitations	O
and	O
/	O
or	O
definitions	O
of	O
any	O
Coverage	O
Part	O
.	O

Zurich	B-ORG
's	I-ORG
Global	I-ORG
Recovery	I-ORG
Services	E-ORG
Overview	O

Zurich	B-ORG
’s	I-ORG
Recovery	I-ORG
Services	E-ORG
consist	O
of	O
seven	O
regional	O
recovery	O
hubs	O
providing	O
multi-line	O
commercial	O
recovery	O
services	O
on	O
a	O
domestic	O
and	O
international	O
basis	O
.	O

Front	O
-	O
end	O
data	O
mining	O
,	O
fully	O
dedicated	O
personnel	O
,	O
recovery	O
panel	O
counsel	O
,	O
forensic	O
engineering	O
and	O
other	O
leveraged	O
programs	O
assist	O
in	O
driving	O
results	O
.	O

Zurich	B-ORG
Recovery	I-ORG
Services	E-ORG
will	O
charge	O
seventeen	O
percent	O
(	O
17	O
%	O
)	O
*	O
of	O
the	O
gross	O
amount	O
recovered	O
from	O
the	O
third	O
parties	O
responsible	O
for	O
the	O
loss	O
.	O

If	O
a	O
recovery	O
is	O
not	O
produced	O
,	O
a	O
fee	O
will	O
not	O
be	O
earned	O
.	O

Associated	O
expense	O
in	O
pursuit	O
of	O
recovery	O
will	O
be	O
charged	O
to	O
the	O
claim	O
file	O
.	O

*	O
Subject	O
to	O
change	O

Certain	O
special	O
claim	O
handling	O
services	O
are	O
provided	O
only	O
for	O
the	O
duration	O
of	O
your	O
effective	O
policy	O
period	O
.	O

These	O
services	O
can	O
continue	O
beyond	O
an	O
effective	O
policy	O
term	O
,	O
but	O
will	O
be	O
charged	O
according	O
to	O
Zurich	S-ORG
’s	O
current	O
rates	O
at	O
that	O
time	O
.	O

16	O

&G	I-ORG
FOODS	I-ORG
,	I-ORG
INC	I-ORG
.	E-ORG

DEFINITIONS	O

Non-Admitted	O
Insurance	O
:	O

A	O
policy	O
issued	O
in	O
one	O
country	O
that	O
covers	O
exposures	O
in	O
other	O
countries	O
where	O
the	O
Company	O
has	O
not	O
filed	O
for	O
admitted	O
insurer	O
status	O
with	O
the	O
Insurance	O
Regulator	O
of	O
the	O
country	O
where	O
the	O
risk	O
is	O
located	O
to	O
provide	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
.	O

For	O
a	O
list	O
of	O
the	O
countries	O
where	O
non-admitted	O
insurance	O
is	O
permitted	O
please	O
see	O
the	O
Solution	O
Type	O
and	O
Premium	O
section	O
.	O

Restrictions	O
on	O
Insurance	O
Activities	O
:	O

While	O
certain	O
jurisdictions	O
may	O
not	O
prohibit	O
covering	O
a	O
risk	O
on	O
a	O
non-admitted	O
basis	O
,	O
there	O
may	O
be	O
additional	O
restrictions	O
as	O
to	O
what	O
Insurance	O
Activities	O
may	O
be	O
conducted	O
in	O
a	O
jurisdiction	O
.	O

Zurich	S-ORG
is	O
committed	O
to	O
ensure	O
that	O
the	O
International	O
Program	O
is	O
serviced	O
in	O
alignment	O
with	O
these	O
limitations	O
.	O

Such	O
restrictions	O
include	O
but	O
many	O
not	O
be	O
limited	O
to	O
:	O
Risk	O
Engineering	O
Activities	O
;	O
Premium	O
Invoicing	O
;	O
Premium	O
Reimbursement	O
;	O
Loss	O
Adjustment	O
Activities	O
;	O
Claims	O
Payments	O
;	O
Passing	O
on	O
of	O
Claims	O
Payments	O

Details	O
of	O
each	O
restriction	O
and	O
the	O
countries	O
where	O
such	O
restrictions	O
apply	O
are	O
available	O
upon	O
request	O
.	O

Differences	O
in	O
Conditions	O
/	O
Difference	O
In	O
Limits	O
(	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
)	O
:	O

DIC	O
:	O
Difference	O
in	O
Conditions	O
is	O
a	O
provision	O
under	O
the	O
U.S.	O
Master	O
Policy	O
,	O
which	O
covers	O
the	O
difference	O
in	O
definitions	O
,	O
perils	O
,	O
conditions	O
,	O
or	O
coverage	O
between	O
the	O
Local	O
Policy	O
and	O
the	O
U.S.	O
Master	O
Policy	O
.	O

The	O
conditions	O
of	O
the	O
U.S.	O
Master	O
Policy	O
are	O
generally	O
broader	O
than	O
those	O
of	O
a	O
Local	O
Policy	O
.	O

DIL	O
:	O
Difference	O
in	O
Limits	O
is	O
a	O
provision	O
under	O
the	O
U.S.	O
Master	O
Policy	O
which	O
covers	O
the	O
difference	O
between	O
the	O
respective	O
limit	O
of	O
liability	O
stated	O
in	O
the	O
Local	O
Policy	O
and	O
the	O
U.S.	O
Master	O
Policy	O
.	O

The	O
U.S.	O
Master	O
Policy	O
provides	O
for	O
additional	O
limits	O
of	O
liability	O
when	O
the	O
limits	O
of	O
liability	O
under	O
the	O
Local	O
Policy	O
are	O
exhausted	O
.	O

For	O
a	O
list	O
of	O
the	O
countries	O
where	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
insurance	O
is	O
permitted	O
please	O
see	O
the	O
Solution	O
Type	O
and	O
Premium	O
section	O
.	O

Financial	O
Interest	O
Coverage	O
(	O
FInC	O
)	O
:	O

Based	O
upon	O
our	O
standard	O
of	O
providing	O
insurance	O
that	O
meets	O
the	O
legal	O
and	O
regulatory	O
requirements	O
of	O
insurer	O
licensing	O
,	O
we	O
do	O
not	O
provide	O
either	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
or	O
non-admitted	O
insurance	O
in	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdictions	O
.	O

A	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdiction	O
means	O
any	O
country	O
or	O
political	O
subdivision	O
,	O
outside	O
of	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
of	O
America	O
,	O
its	O
territories	O
and	O
possessions	O
,	O
in	O
which	O
the	O
insurance	O
laws	O
and	O
regulations	O
in	O
that	O
country	O
or	O
political	O
subdivision	O
prohibit	O
the	O
Company	O
from	O
Insuring	O
risks	O
under	O
either	O
non-admitted	O
or	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
insurance	O
.	O

To	O
help	O
avoid	O
potential	O
gaps	O
in	O
coverage	O
across	O
your	O
International	O
Program	O
for	O
risks	O
located	O
in	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdictions	O
,	O
we	O
have	O
developed	O
Financial	O
Interest	O
Coverage	O
(	O
FInC	O
)	O
.	O

This	O
coverage	O
provides	O
that	O
the	O
Company	O
will	O
pay	O
for	O
the	O
first	O
Named	O
Insured	O
’s	O
financial	O
loss	O
resulting	O
from	O
a	O
loss	O
in	O
a	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdiction	O
.	O

The	O
loss	O
must	O
be	O
sustained	O
by	O
a	O
qualified	O
entity	O
.	O

A	O
qualified	O
entity	O
may	O
be	O
one	O
that	O
is	O
registered	O
,	O
domiciled	O
or	O
has	O
ongoing	O
operations	O
in	O
one	O
or	O
more	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdictions	O
.	O

Additionally	O
,	O
the	O
qualified	O
entity	O
is	O
an	O
entity	O
that	O
would	O
have	O
qualified	O
as	O
an	O
insured	O
under	O
the	O
U.S.	O
Master	O
Policy	O
except	O
for	O
the	O
fact	O
that	O
the	O
qualified	O
entity	O
is	O
registered	O
,	O
domiciled	O
or	O
has	O
ongoing	O
operations	O
in	O
one	O
or	O
more	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdictions	O
.	O

In	O
such	O
an	O
event	O
,	O
FInC	O
is	O
provided	O
to	O
the	O
first	O
Named	O
Insured	O
as	O
respects	O
its	O
insurable	O
interest	O
in	O
such	O
qualified	O
entity	O
and	O
only	O
to	O
the	O
extent	O
the	O
loss	O
is	O
not	O
otherwise	O
insured	O
.	O

Under	O
FInC	O
we	O
shall	O
have	O
no	O
duty	O
to	O
investigate	O
or	O
settle	O
claims	O
or	O
pay	O
those	O
sums	O
that	O
a	O
qualified	O
entity	O
becomes	O
legally	O
obligated	O
to	O
pay	O
.	O

Additionally	O
,	O
we	O
do	O
not	O
have	O
the	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
a	O
qualified	O
entity	O
against	O
suit	O
seeking	O
a	O
claim	O
for	O
damages	O
.	O

The	O
most	O
the	O
Company	O
will	O
pay	O
under	O
FInC	O
is	O
the	O
amount	O
that	O
would	O
have	O
been	O
payable	O
under	O
the	O
U.S.	O
Master	O
Policy	O
if	O
local	O
law	O
allowed	O
coverage	O
or	O
payment	O
for	O
loss	O
under	O
non-admitted	O
or	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
insurance	O
.	O

Notwithstanding	O
the	O
coverage	O
for	O
FInC	O
under	O
the	O
U.S.	O
Master	O
Policy	O
,	O
it	O
is	O
understood	O
and	O
agreed	O
that	O
any	O
qualified	O
entity	O
registered	O
,	O
domiciled	O
or	O
with	O
ongoing	O
operations	O
in	O
one	O
or	O
more	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdictions	O
is	O
not	O
party	O
to	O
or	O
a	O
beneficiary	O
under	O
the	O
U.S.	O
Master	O
Policy	O
and	O
has	O
no	O
rights	O
under	O
the	O
U.S.	O
Master	O
Policy	O
.	O

As	O
FInC	O
provides	O
cover	O
to	O
the	O
first	O
Named	O
Insured	O
for	O
its	O
financial	O
interest	O
in	O
a	O
qualified	O
entity	O
,	O
where	O
FInC	O
is	O
provided	O
,	O
particularly	O
when	O
provided	O
on	O
a	O
ground	O
-	O
up	O
basis	O
,	O
consideration	O
should	O
be	O
given	O
to	O
whether	O
or	O
not	O
the	O
qualified	O
entity	O
needs	O
a	O
local	O
certificate	O
of	O
insurance	O
or	O
local	O
claim	O
handling	O
,	O
has	O
experienced	O
claim	O
frequency	O
or	O
severity	O
,	O
or	O
has	O
the	O
financial	O
ability	O
to	O
absorb	O
the	O
loss	O
.	O

In	O
such	O
events	O
,	O
FInC	O
may	O
not	O
be	O
the	O
first	O
Named	O
Insured	O
’s	O
optimal	O
solution	O
.	O

For	O
a	O
list	O
of	O
the	O
countries	O
where	O
FInC	O
insurance	O
applies	O
please	O
see	O
the	O
Solution	O
Type	O
and	O
Premium	O
section	O
.	O

World	O
Travel	O
Protection	O

Helping	O
you	O
keep	O
your	O
employees	O
safe	O
–	O
wherever	O
they	O
are	O
in	O
the	O
world	O

World	O
Travel	O
Protection	O
(	O
WTP	O
)	O
provides	O
specialized	O
travel	O
and	O
medical	O
assistance	O
globally	O
.	O

The	O
team	O
manages	O
cases	O
24	O
hours	O
a	O
day	O
,	O
365	O
days	O
per	O
year	O
,	O
for	O
travelers	O
anywhere	O
in	O
the	O
world	O
.	O

Through	O
a	O
network	O
of	O
trusted	O
partners	O
,	O
affiliates	O
and	O
agents	O
,	O
WTP	O
helps	O
individuals	O
in	O
need	O
across	O
more	O
than	O
200	O
countries	O
.	O

A	O
team	O
of	O
registered	O
nurses	O
and	O
well	O
-	O
trained	O
case	O
managers	O
operate	O
in	O
a	O
sophisticated	O
triage	O
and	O
care	O
model	O
.	O

They	O
quickly	O
identify	O
the	O
best	O
assistance	O
options	O
for	O
the	O
customer	O
,	O
connecting	O
them	O
with	O
exceptional	O
care	O
regardless	O
of	O
their	O
situation	O
.	O

with	O
us	O
via	O
:	O

Phone	O
Toll-	O
free	O
:	O

(	O

&	O
Canada	O
)	O
Collect	O
:	O

(	O
worldwide	O
)	O

Kit	O

study	O

:	O

risk	O

international	O

of	O

Overview	O
:	O

Global	B-ORG
Brass	I-ORG
and	I-ORG
Copper	I-ORG
Holdings	I-ORG
,	I-ORG
Inc.	E-ORG
,	O
through	O
its	O
wholly	O
-	O
owned	O
principal	O
operating	O
subsidiary	O
,	O
Global	B-ORG
Brass	I-ORG
and	I-ORG
Copper	I-ORG
,	I-ORG
Inc.	E-ORG
is	O
a	O
leading	O
,	O
value	O
-	O
added	O
converter	O
,	O
fabricator	O
,	O
processor	O
and	O
distributor	O
of	O
specialized	O
non-ferrous	O
products	O
,	O
including	O
a	O
wide	O
range	O
of	O
sheet	O
,	O
strip	O
,	O
foil	O
,	O
rod	O
,	O
tube	O
and	O
fabricated	O
metal	O
component	O
products	O
.	O

While	O
we	O
primarily	O
process	O
copper	O
and	O
copper	O
-alloys	O
,	O
we	O
also	O
reroll	O
and	O
form	O
certain	O
other	O
metals	O
such	O
as	O
stainless	O
steel	O
,	O
carbon	O
steel	O
and	O
aluminum	O
.	O

Using	O
processed	O
scrap	O
,	O
virgin	O
metals	O
and	O
other	O
refined	O
metals	O
,	O
we	O
engage	O
in	O
metal	O
melting	O
and	O
casting	O
,	O
rolling	O
,	O
drawing	O
,	O
extruding	O
,	O
welding	O
and	O
stamping	O
to	O
fabricate	O
finished	O
and	O
semi-finished	O
alloy	O
products	O
.	O

The	O
majority	O
of	O
our	O
operations	O
and	O
sales	O
activities	O
are	O
focused	O
in	O
North	O
America	O
under	O
the	O
Olin	B-ORG
Brass	E-ORG
,	O
Chase	B-ORG

and	O

brand	O

.	O

of	O

A.J.	B-ORG
Oster	E-ORG

Oster	E-ORG
has	O

been	O
a	O

and	O

of	O
primarily	O

.	O

business	O

1	I-DATE
,	I-DATE

significantly	O

sheet	O
and	O
coated	O
aluminum	O
products	O
.	O

(	O
aluminum	O
)	O
and	O
roofing	O
(	O

-	O

)	O

within	O
the	O
building	O
and	O
housing	O
industry	O
.	O

Oster	E-ORG
historically	O

KENNAMETAL	S-ORG

Profile	O

Kennametal	S-ORG
delivers	O
productivity	O
to	O
customers	O
seeking	O
peak	O
performance	O
in	O
demanding	O
environments	O
by	O
providing	O
innovative	O
custom	O
and	O
standard	O
wear	O
-	O
resistant	O
solutions	O
.	O

This	O
proven	O
productivity	O
is	O
enabled	O
through	O
our	O
advanced	O
materials	O

Errors	O
or	O
Omissions	O
:	O

No	O

error	O
,	O
omission	O
or	O
failure	O
in	O

reports	O

of	O

shall	O
be	O
corrected	O
as	O
soon	O
as	O
practical	O
when	O
brought	O
to	O
the	O
attention	O
of	O
the	O
individual	O

for	O
insurance	O
matters	O
.	O

is	O
further	O

and	O

that	O
any	O

or	O

.	O

Acquisitions	O
:	O
Any	O
mid-	O
term	O
acquisitions	O
will	O
be	O
considered	O
on	O
an	O
“	O
own	O
merits	O
“	O
basis	O
and	O
rating	O
determined	O
on	O
historical	O
exposure	O
and	O
claims	O
information	O
at	O
that	O
time	O
.	O

Page	O
12	O
of	O
19	O

10.2	O

Brokerage	O

10.3	O
Taxes	O
,	O
Charges	O
and	O
Duties	O
The	O
Premiums	O
shown	O
for	O
the	O
Master	O
Policy	O
,	O
FOS	O
Policy	O
,	O
Local	O
Policy	O
(	O
ies	O
)	O
and	O
other	O
policy	O
(	O
ies	O
)	O
may	O
not	O
be	O
inclusive	O
of	O
taxes	O
,	O
charges	O
and	O
duties	O
.	O

For	O
Certain	O
Jurisdictions	O
it	O
may	O
be	O
required	O
or	O
customary	O
for	O
taxes	O
,	O
charges	O
and	O
duties	O
to	O
be	O
included	O
within	O
the	O
premium	O
.	O

You	O
are	O
obligated	O
to	O
pay	O
those	O
sums	O
as	O
part	O
of	O
the	O
invoiced	O
amounts	O
.	O

Where	O
Zurich	S-ORG
is	O
permitted	O
to	O
separate	O
the	O
taxes	O
,	O
charges	O
and	O
duties	O
from	O
the	O
premium	O
,	O
then	O
the	O
premiums	O
quoted	O
in	O
this	O
offer	O
will	O
be	O
grossed	O
up	O
(	O
increased	O
)	O
and	O
the	O
premium	O
amount	O
included	O
in	O
the	O
invoice	O
will	O
have	O
taken	O
into	O
account	O
the	O
applicable	O
taxes	O
,	O
charges	O
and	O
duties	O
once	O
agreement	O
has	O
been	O
reached	O
on	O
an	O
acceptable	O
premium	O
allocation	O
.	O

In	O
some	O
jurisdictions	O
there	O
may	O
be	O
taxes	O
,	O
charges	O
and	O
duties	O
which	O
are	O
the	O
direct	O
responsibility	O
of	O
the	O
insured	O
.	O

These	O
amounts	O
are	O
in	O
addition	O
to	O
,	O
and	O
not	O
included	O
in	O
,	O
the	O
premiums	O
shown	O
in	O
this	O
offer	O
or	O
in	O
the	O
amounts	O
invoiced	O
by	O
us	O
.	O

Premium	O

11	O
.	O

International	O
Program	O
Structure	O
11.1	O
Multinational	O
Insurance	O
Proposition	O
(	O
MIP	O
)	O
Zurich	S-ORG
MIP	O
aims	O
to	O
resolve	O
the	O
uncertainty	O
around	O
the	O
application	O
of	O
insurance	O
regulatory	O
and	O
licensing	O
laws	O
and	O
premium	O
tax	O
requirements	O
applicable	O
to	O
the	O
insurer	O
in	O
countries	O
where	O
International	O
or	O
Cross	O
-	O
border	O
risk	O
is	O
written	O
.	O

At	O
the	O
core	O
of	O
Zurich	S-ORG
MIP	O
is	O
the	O
Multinational	O
Insurance	O
Application	O
(	O
MIA	O
)	O
-	O
a	O
proprietary	O
tool	O
that	O
provides	O
a	O
detailed	O
picture	O
of	O
the	O
insurance	O
licensing	O
legislation	O
and	O
the	O
insurer	O
’s	O
foreign	O
premium	O
tax	O
requirements	O
that	O
are	O
applicable	O
for	O
about	O
180	O
countries	O
.	O

Page	O
13	O
of	O
19	O

Zurich	S-ORG
MIP	O
follows	O
three	O
steps	O
:	O

Country	O
Mapping	O
:	O
The	O
Multinational	O
Insurance	O
Application	O
groups	O
countries	O
into	O
categories	O
based	O
on	O
the	O
local	O
regulations	O
that	O
define	O
what	O
types	O
of	O
Multinational	O
coverage	O
we	O
are	O
permitted	O
to	O
provide	O
.	O

Program	O
/	O
Policy	O

Structuring	O
:	O
Insurance	O
cover	O
is	O
structured	O
and	O
mapped	O
out	O
using	O
a	O
combination	O
of	O
Local	O
Policies	O
,	O
a	O
Master	O
Policy	O
,	O
Freedom	O
of	O
Service	O
Policy	O
-	O
for	O
countries	O
in	O
the	O
European	O
Economic	O
Area	O
,	O
as	O
well	O
as	O
other	O
coverage	O
options	O
.	O

Premium	O
Allocation	O
and	O
Payment	O
of	O
Insurer	O
Premium	O
Taxes	O
:	O
All	O
premium	O
allocations	O
will	O
be	O
based	O
in	O
a	O
manner	O
that	O
is	O
fair	O
,	O
reasonable	O
and	O
compliant	O
with	O
the	O
local	O
licensing	O
and	O
tax	O
rules	O
in	O
each	O
country	O
involved	O
.	O

Master	O
Policy	O
The	O
Master	O
Policy	O
provides	O
Difference	O
in	O
Conditions	O
/	O
Difference	O
in	O
Limits	O
(	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
)	O
in	O
countries	O
where	O
insurance	O
for	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
is	O
allowed	O
.	O

The	O
Master	O
Policy	O
will	O
apply	O
as	O
non-admitted	O
in	O
countries	O
where	O
insurance	O
for	O
non-admitted	O
is	O
permissible	O
.	O

The	O
Master	O
Policy	O
provides	O
the	O
Named	O
Insured	O
(	O
Section	O
1	O
)	O
with	O
Financial	O
Interest	O
coverage	O
in	O
the	O
US	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdictions	O
,	O
countries	O
of	O
risk	O
where	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
and	O
/	O
or	O
non-admitted	O
is	O
not	O
permitted	O
.	O

Non	O
-	O
Admitted	O
Insurance	O
A	O
policy	O
issued	O
in	O
one	O
country	O
that	O
covers	O
exposures	O
in	O
other	O
countries	O
where	O
the	O
Company	O
has	O
not	O
filed	O
for	O
admitted	O
insurer	O
status	O
with	O
the	O
Insurance	O
Regulator	O
of	O
the	O
country	O
where	O
the	O
risk	O
is	O
located	O
to	O
provide	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
.	O

Restrictions	O
on	O
Insurance	O
Activities	O
While	O
certain	O
jurisdictions	O
may	O
not	O
prohibit	O
covering	O
a	O
risk	O
on	O
a	O
non-admitted	O
basis	O
,	O
there	O
may	O
be	O
additional	O
restrictions	O
as	O
to	O
what	O
Insurance	O
Activities	O
are	O
permissible	O
to	O
be	O
conducted	O
in	O
a	O
jurisdiction	O
.	O

Zurich	S-ORG
is	O
committed	O
to	O
ensure	O
that	O
the	O
International	O
Program	O
is	O
serviced	O
in	O
alignment	O
with	O
these	O
limitations	O
and	O
act	O
in	O
accordance	O
.	O

Such	O
restrictions	O
include	O
but	O
may	O
not	O
be	O
limited	O
to	O
:	O

•	O
Risk	O
Engineering	O
Activities	O
•	O
Premium	O
Invoicing	O
•	O
Premium	O
Reimbursement	O
•	O
Loss	O
Adjustment	O
Activities	O
•	O
Claims	O
Payments	O
•	O
Passing	O
on	O
of	O
Claims	O
Payments	O

Details	O
of	O
each	O
restriction	O
and	O
countries	O
where	O
such	O
restrictions	O
apply	O
are	O
available	O
upon	O
request	O
.	O

Difference	O
in	O
Conditions	O
/	O
Difference	O
in	O
Limits	O
(	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
)	O
DIC	O
:	O
Difference	O
in	O
Conditions	O
,	O
a	O
provision	O
under	O
the	O
Master	O
Policy	O
,	O
which	O
covers	O
the	O
difference	O
in	O
definitions	O
,	O
perils	O
,	O
conditions	O
,	O
or	O
coverage	O
between	O
the	O
Local	O
Policy	O
and	O
the	O
Master	O
Policy	O
.	O

The	O
conditions	O
of	O
the	O
Master	O
Policy	O
are	O
generally	O
broader	O
than	O
those	O
of	O
a	O
Local	O
Policy	O
.	O

Page	O
14	O
of	O
19	O

DIL	O
:	O
Difference	O
in	O
Limits	O
,	O
a	O
provision	O
under	O
the	O
Master	O
Policy	O
which	O
covers	O
the	O
difference	O
between	O
the	O
respective	O
limit	O
of	O
liability	O
stated	O
in	O
the	O
Local	O
Policy	O
and	O
the	O
Master	O
Policy	O
.	O

The	O
Master	O
Policy	O
provides	O
for	O
additional	O
limits	O
of	O
liability	O
when	O
the	O
limits	O
of	O
liability	O
under	O
the	O
Local	O
Policy	O
are	O
exhausted	O
.	O

Financial	O
Interest	O
Cover	O
(	O
FInC	O
)	O
Based	O
upon	O
our	O
standard	O
of	O
providing	O
insurance	O
that	O
meets	O
the	O
legal	O
and	O
regulatory	O
requirements	O
of	O
insurer	O
licensing	O
,	O
we	O
do	O
not	O
provide	O
either	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
or	O
non-admitted	O
insurance	O
in	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdictions	O
.	O

A	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdiction	O
means	O
any	O
country	O
or	O
political	O
subdivision	O
,	O
outside	O
of	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
of	O
America	O
,	O
its	O
territories	O
and	O
possessions	O
,	O
in	O
which	O
the	O
insurance	O
laws	O
and	O
regulations	O
in	O
that	O
country	O
or	O
political	O
subdivision	O
prohibit	O
the	O
Company	O
from	O
insuring	O
risks	O
under	O
either	O
non-admitted	O
or	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
insurance	O
.	O

To	O
help	O
avoid	O
potential	O
gaps	O
in	O
coverage	O
across	O
your	O
International	O
Program	O
for	O
risks	O
located	O
in	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdictions	O
,	O
we	O
have	O
developed	O
Financial	O
Interest	O
Coverage	O
(	O
FInC	O
)	O
.	O

This	O
coverage	O
provides	O
that	O
the	O
Company	O
will	O
pay	O
for	O
the	O
first	O
Named	O
Insured	O
’s	O
financial	O
loss	O
resulting	O
from	O
a	O
loss	O
in	O
a	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdiction	O
.	O

The	O
loss	O
must	O
be	O
sustained	O
by	O
a	O
qualified	O
entity	O
.	O

A	O
qualified	O
entity	O
may	O
be	O
one	O
that	O
is	O
registered	O
,	O
domiciled	O
or	O
has	O
ongoing	O
operations	O
in	O
one	O
or	O
more	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdictions	O
.	O

Additionally	O
,	O
the	O
qualified	O
entity	O
is	O
an	O
entity	O
that	O
would	O
have	O
qualified	O
as	O
an	O
insured	O
under	O
the	O
Master	O
Policy	O
except	O
for	O
the	O
fact	O
that	O
the	O
qualified	O
entity	O
is	O
registered	O
,	O
domiciled	O
or	O
has	O
ongoing	O
operations	O
in	O
one	O
or	O
more	O
Prohibited	O
Jurisdictions	O
.	O

In	O
such	O
an	O
event	O
,	O
FInC	O
is	O
provided	O
to	O
the	O
first	O
Named	O
Insured	O
as	O
respects	O
its	O
insurable	O
interest	O
in	O
such	O
qualified	O
entity	O
and	O
only	O
to	O
the	O
extent	O
the	O
loss	O
is	O
not	O
otherwise	O
insured	O
.	O

Under	O
FInC	O
we	O
shall	O
have	O
no	O
duty	O
to	O
investigate	O
or	O
settle	O
claims	O
or	O
pay	O
these	O
sums	O
that	O
a	O
qualified	O
entity	O
becomes	O
legally	O
obligated	O
to	O
pay	O
.	O

Additionally	O
,	O
we	O
do	O
not	O
have	O
the	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
a	O
qualified	O
entity	O
against	O
suit	O
seeking	O
a	O
claim	O
for	O
damages	O
and	O
they	O
have	O
no	O
rights	O
under	O
the	O
Master	O
Policy	O
.	O

The	O
most	O
the	O
Company	O
will	O
pay	O
under	O
FInC	O
is	O
the	O
amount	O
that	O
would	O
have	O
been	O
payable	O
under	O
the	O
Master	O
Policy	O
.	O

FiNC	O
Premium	O
will	O
be	O
subject	O
to	O
stateside	O
insurance	O
premium	O
taxes	O
.	O

Freedom	O
of	O
Services	O
(	O
FOS	O
)	O
Master	O
Policy	O

Most	O
European	O
Economic	O
Area	O
(	O
EEA	O
)	O
countries	O
do	O
not	O
allow	O
non-admitted	O
or	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
coverage	O
to	O
be	O
written	O
by	O
an	O
out	O
of	O
territory	O
insurer	O
.	O

To	O
address	O
this	O
,	O
the	O
U.S.	O
Master	O
Policy	O
wording	O
has	O
been	O
localized	O
and	O
is	O
our	O
good	O
local	O
standard	O
FOS	O
wording	O
.	O

The	O
FOS	O
Policy	O
will	O
be	O
issued	O
by	O
Zurich	B-ORG
Insurance	E-ORG
plc	O
,	O
UK	O
Branch	O
,	O
and	O
would	O
cover	O
your	O
risk	O
in	O
the	O
EEA	O
either	O
as	O
Ground	O
Up	O
or	O
DIC	O
/	O
DIL	O
basis	O
over	O
locally	O
issued	O
policies	O
within	O
certain	O
EEA	O
countries	O
.	O

For	O
a	O

of	O
countries	O
where	O
the	O
FOS	O
Master	O
applies	O
please	O
see	O
Premium	O
Allocations	O
.	O

Local	O
Policies	O

-	O
31	O
Coverage	O
provided	O
by	O
any	O
local	O
policies	O
issued	O
as	O
part	O
of	O
this	O
program	O
will	O
contemplate	O
Zurich	S-ORG
Good	O
Local	O
Standard	O
wording	O
subject	O
to	O
any	O
extensions	O
or	O
exclusions	O
.	O

Request	O
for	O
local	O
coverage	O
extensions	O

coverage	O
that	O
is	O
greater	O
than	O
Zurich	S-ORG
’s	O
Good	O
Local	O
Standard	O
will	O
be	O
negotiated	O
and	O
priced	O
separately	O
.	O

are	O

Details	O

the	O
large	O
GL	O
claims	O
are	O
as	O
follows	O
:	O

Michele	B-CONTACT
Jones	E-CONTACT
–	O

Total	O
incurred	O
$	O
308,992	O

-	O
This	O
was	O
a	O
slip	O
and	O
fall	O
after	O
the	O
floor	O
was	O
mopped	O
.	O

The	O
claimant	O
suffered	O
a	O
fractured	O
tibia	O
/	O
kneecap	O
,	O
and	O
required	O
surgery	O
.	O

Suit	O
was	O
filed	O
and	O
the	O
claim	O
went	O
to	O
mediation	O
where	O
they	O
stopped	O
at	O
$	O
425,000	O
demand	O
and	O
$	O
45,000	O
offer	O
.	O
Non-binding	O
arbitration	O
took	O
place	O
in	O
September	O
2016	O
,	O
where	O
the	O
Judge	O
entered	O
an	O

ADVISORY	O
NOTICE	O
TO	O
POLICYHOLDERS	O

No	O
coverage	O
is	O
provided	O
by	O
this	O
Policyholder	O
Notice	O
nor	O
can	O
it	O
be	O
construed	O
to	O
replace	O
any	O
provisions	O
of	O
your	O
policy	O
.	O

You	O
should	O
read	O
your	O
policy	O
and	O
review	O
your	O
Declarations	O
page	O
for	O
complete	O
information	O
on	O
the	O

you	O
are	O
provided	O
.	O

Notice	O
provides	O
information	O
concerning	O
possible	O
impact	O
on	O
your	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
due	O
to	O

OFAC	S-ORG
.	O

read	O
this	O
Notice	O
carefully	O
.	O

The	B-ORG
Office	I-ORG
of	I-ORG
Foreign	I-ORG
Assets	I-ORG
Control	E-ORG
(	O
OFAC	S-ORG
)	O
administers	O
and	O
enforces	O
sanctions	O
policy	O
,	O
based	O
on	O
Presidential	O
declarations	O
of	O
"	O
national	O
emergency	O
"	O
.	O

OFAC	S-ORG
has	O
identified	O
and	O
listed	O
numerous	O
:	O

•	O
Foreign	O
agents	O
;	O

•	O
Front	O
organizations	O
;	O

•	O

Terrorists	O
;	O

•	O
Terrorist	O
organizations	O
;	O
and	O

•	O
Narcotics	O
traffickers	O
;	O

as	O
"	O
Specially	O
Designated	O
Nationals	O
and	O
Blocked	O
Persons	O
"	O
.	O

This	O
list	O
can	O
be	O
located	O
on	O
the	O
Un	B-ORG
ited	I-ORG
States	I-ORG
Treasury	E-ORG
's	O
web	O
site	O
–	O
http//www.treas.gov/ofac.	S-WEBSITE

In	O
accordance	O
with	O
OFAC	S-ORG
regulations	O
,	O
if	O
it	O
is	O
determined	O
that	O
you	O
or	O
any	O
other	O
insured	O
,	O
or	O
any	O
person	O
or	O
entity	O
claiming	O
the	O
benefits	O
of	O
this	O
insurance	O
has	O
violated	O
U.S.	O
sanctions	O
law	O
or	O
is	O
a	O
Specially	O
Designated	O
National	O
and	O
Blocked	O
Person	O
,	O
as	O
identified	O
by	O
OFAC	S-ORG
,	O
this	O
insurance	O
will	O
be	O
considered	O
a	O
blocked	O
or	O
frozen	O
contract	O
and	O
all	O
provisions	O
of	O
this	O
insurance	O
are	O
immediately	O
subject	O
to	O
OFAC	S-ORG
.	O

When	O
an	O
insurance	O
policy	O
is	O
considered	O
to	O
be	O
such	O
a	O
blocked	O
or	O
frozen	O
contract	O
,	O
no	O

nor	O
premium	O

may	O
be	O
made	O

.	O

POLICYHOLDER	O
DISCLOSURE	O
NOTICE	O
OF	O
TERRORISM	O
INSURANCE	O
COVERAGE	O

As	O
we	O
previously	O
notified	O
you	O
,	O
as	O
required	O
by	O
the	O
Terrorism	O
Risk	O
Insurance	O
Act	O
,	O
as	O
amended	O
in	O
2015	O
,	O
you	O
were	O
offered	O
the	O
opportunity	O
to	O
purchase	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
for	O
losses	O
resulting	O
from	O
acts	O
of	O
terrorism	O
,	O
as	O
defined	O
in	O
Section	O
102	O
(	O
1	O
)	O
of	O
the	O
Act	O
:	O
The	O
term	O
“	O
act	O
of	O
terrorism	O
”	O
means	O
any	O
act	O
or	O
acts	O
that	O
are	O
certified	O
by	O
the	O
Secretary	O
of	O
the	O
Treasury	O
,	O
in	O
consultation	O
with	O
the	O
Secretary	O
of	O
Homeland	O
Security	O
,	O
and	O
the	O
Attorney	O
General	O
of	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
-	O
to	O
be	O
an	O
act	O
of	O
terrorism	O
;	O
to	O
be	O
a	O
violent	O
act	O
or	O
an	O
act	O
that	O
is	O
dangerous	O
to	O
human	O
life	O
,	O
property	O
,	O
or	O
infrastructure	O
;	O
to	O
have	O
resulted	O
in	O
damage	O
within	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
,	O
or	O
outside	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
in	O
the	O
case	O
of	O
an	O
air	O
carrier	O
or	O
vessel	O
or	O
the	O
premises	O
of	O
a	O
United	O
States	O
mission	O
;	O
and	O
to	O
have	O
been	O
committed	O
by	O
an	O
individual	O
or	O
individuals	O
as	O
part	O
of	O
an	O
effort	O
to	O
coerce	O
the	O
civilian	O
population	O
of	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
or	O
to	O
influence	O
the	O
policy	O
or	O
affect	O
the	O
conduct	O
of	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
Government	O
by	O
coercion	O
.	O

YOU	O
SHOULD	O
KNOW	O
THAT	O
WHERE	O
COVERAGE	O
IS	O
PROVIDED	O
BY	O
THIS	O
POLICY	O
FOR	O
LOSSES	O
RESULTING	O
FROM	O
CERTIFIED	O
ACTS	O
OF	O
TERRORISM	O
,	O
SUCH	O
LOSSES	O
MAY	O
BE	O
PARTIALLY	O
REIMBURSED	O
BY	O
THE	O
UNITED	O
STATES	O
GOVERNMENT	O
UNDER	O
A	O
FORMULA	O
ESTABLISHED	O
BY	O
FEDERAL	O
LAW	O
.	O

HOWEVER	O
,	O
YOUR	O
POLICY	O
MAY	O
CONTAIN	O
OTHER	O
EXCLUSIONS	O
WHICH	O
MIGHT	O
AFFECT	O
YOUR	O
COVERAGE	O
,	O
SUCH	O
AS	O
AN	O
EXCLUSION	O
FOR	O
NUCLEAR	O
EVENTS	O
.	O

UNDER	O
THE	O
FORMULA	O
,	O
THE	O
UNITED	O
STATES	O
GOVERNMENT	O
GENERALLY	O
REIMBURSES	O
85	O
%	O
THROUGH	O
2015	O
;	O
84	O
%	O
BEGINNING	O
ON	O
JANUARY	B-DATE
1	I-DATE
,	I-DATE
2016	E-DATE
;	O
83	O
%	O
BEGINNING	O
ON	O
JANUARY	B-DATE
1	I-DATE
,	I-DATE

;	O

BEGINNING	O
ON	O
JANUARY	B-DATE

,	I-DATE
2018	E-DATE
;	O
81	O
%	O
BEGINNING	O
ON	O
JANUARY	B-DATE
1	I-DATE
,	I-DATE
2019	E-DATE
AND	O
80	O
%	O
BEGINNING	O
ON	O
JANUARY	B-DATE
1	I-DATE
,	I-DATE
2020	E-DATE
,	O
OF	O
COVERED	O
TERRORISM	O
LOSSES	O
EXCEEDING	O
THE	O
STATUTORILY	O
ESTABLISHED	O
DEDUCTIBLE	O
PAID	O
BY	O
THE	O
INSURANCE	O
COMPANY	O

COVERAGE	O
.	O

TO	O

BELOW	O
AND	O
DOES	O
NOT	O

BY	O

FEDERAL	O
GOVERNMENT	O
UNDER	O

ACT	O
.	O

THAT	O
THE	O
TERRORISM	O
RISK	O
INSURANCE	O
ACT	O
,	O
AS	O
AMENDED	O
,	O
CONTAINS	O
A	O
$	O
100	O
BILLION	O
CAP	O
THAT	O
LIMITS	O
U.S.	O
GOVERNMENT	O
REIMBURSEMENT	O
AS	O

INSURERS	O
’	O
LIABILITY	O
FOR	O
LOSSES	O
RESULTING	O
FROM	O
CERTIFIED	O

OF	O
TERRORISM	O
WHEN	O

AMOUNT	O
OF	O
SUCH	O
LOSSES	O
IN	O
ANY	O
ONE	O
CALENDAR	O
YEAR	O
EXCEEDS	O
$	O
100	O
BILLION	O
.	O

IF	O

INSURED	O
LOSSES	O
FOR	O
ALL	O
INSURERS	O
EXCEED	O
$	O
100	O
BILLION	O
,	O
YOUR	O
COVERAGE	O
MAY	O
BE	O
REDUCED	O
.	O

You	O
rejected	O
the	O
offer	O
of	O
terrorism	O
coverage	O
you	O
received	O
as	O
part	O
of	O
your	O
policy	O
quote	O
and	O
you	O
have	O
no	O
coverage	O
for	O
losses	O
resulting	O
from	O
an	O
act	O
of	O
terrorism	O
as	O

in	O

.	O

:	O

continues	O

-	O

of	O

on	O
that	O

.	O

.	O

,	O

first	O

.	O

be	O
pro	O
rata	O
.	O

less	O

.	O

ef	O

fective	O
even	O
if	O

not	O

.	O

,	O

surveys	O

.	O

:	O

a	O
.	O

or	O
healthful	O

or	O

,	O

F.	O

Your	O

And	O
Duties	O
Under	O

This	O
Policy	O
Your	O
rights	O
and	O
duties	O
under	O
this	O
policy	O
may	O
not	O
be	O
transferred	O
without	O
our	O
written	O
consent	O
except	O
in	O
the	O

of	O

of	O

individual	O
named	O
in	O
-	O
sured	O
.	O

you	O
die	O
,	O

rights	O
and	O
duties	O
will	O
be	O
transferred	O
to	O
your	O
legal	O

but	O
only	O
while	O
acting	O

endorsement	O
modifies	O
insurance	O
provided	O
under	O
the	O
following	O
:	O

COMMERCIAL	O
GENERAL	O
LIABILITY	O
COVERAGE	O
PART	O

A	O
.	O
The	O
following	O
exclusion	O
is	O
added	O
to	O
Paragraph	O
2	O
.	O
,	O
Exclusions	O
of	O
Section	O
I	O
–	O
Coverage	O
A	O
–	O
Bodily	O
Injury	O

And	O
Property	O
Damage	O
Liability	O
and	O
to	O
Paragraph	O
2	O
.	O
,	O
Exclusions	O
of	O
Section	O
I	O
–	O
Coverage	O
B	O
–	O
Personal	O

And	O
Advertising	O
Injury	O
Liability	O
:	O
This	O
insurance	O
does	O
not	O
apply	O
to	O
"	O
bodily	O
injury	O
,	O
"	O
"	O
property	O
damage	O
,	O
"	O
or	O
“	O
personal	O
and	O
advertising	O
injury	O
”	O
arising	O
out	O
of	O
fireworks	O
,	O
pyrotechnic	O
devices	O
,	O
or	O
any	O
explosive	O
materials	O
.	O

This	O
exclusion	O
does	O
not	O
apply	O
to	O
any	O
“	O
concussion	O
effect	O
”	O
,	O
“	O
flashpot	O
”	O
or	O
“	O
smokepot	O
”	O
that	O
is	O
induced	O
electrically	O
in	O
a	O
cylinder	O
with	O
no	O
projectile	O
,	O
wadding	O
or	O
wrapping	O
and	O
is	O
used	O
to	O
create	O
visual	O
effects	O
and	O
/	O
or	O
an	O
explosive	O
noise	O
.	O

B	O
.	O
For	O
the	O
purpose	O
of	O
this	O
endorsement	O
,	O
the	O
following	O
definitions	O
apply	O
:	O
1	O
.	O
“	O
Concussion	O
effect	O
”	O
means	O
an	O
effect	O
intended	O
to	O
produce	O
a	O
loud	O
noise	O
and	O
a	O
violent	O
jarring	O
shock	O
for	O

dramatic	O
effect	O
.	O
2	O
.	O
“	O
Flashpot	O
”	O
means	O
a	O
device	O
containing	O
flashpowder	O
and	O
intended	O
to	O
produce	O
a	O
flash	O
of	O
light	O
and	O
capable	O
of	O

directing	O
the	O
flash	O
in	O
an	O
upward	O
direction	O
.	O

3	O
.	O
“	O
Smokepot	O
”	O
is	O
a	O
pyrotechnic	O
device	O
used	O
to	O
create	O
smoke	O
.	O

excess	O
over	O
any	O

A	O
or	O
B	O

any	O
“	O
suit	O
”	O

any	O

a	O

to	O

the	O

against	O
that	O
“	O
suit	O
”	O
.	O

insurer	O

we	O
will	O
undertake	O
to	O
do	O
so	O

we	O
will	O
be	O

to	O
the	O
insured	O

rights	O
against	O
those	O
other	O
insurers	O
.	O

A.	O
Section	O
II	O
–	O
Who	O
Is	O
An	O
Insured	O
is	O
amended	O
to	O
include	O
as	O
an	O
additional	O
insured	O
any	O
state	O
or	O
governmental	O
agency	O
or	O
subdivision	O
or	O
political	O
subdivision	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
Schedule	O
,	O
subject	O
to	O
the	O
following	O
provisions	O
:	O

1	O
.	O

This	O
insurance	O
applies	O
only	O
with	O
respect	O
to	O
operations	O
performed	O
by	O
you	O
or	O
on	O
your	O
behalf	O
for	O
which	O
the	O
state	O
or	O
governmental	O
agency	O
or	O
subdivision	O
or	O
political	O
subdivision	O
has	O

a	O
permit	O
or	O
authorization	O
.	O

However	O
:	O

a	O
.	O

The	O
insurance	O
afforded	O
to	O
such	O
additional	O
insured	O
only	O
applies	O
to	O
the	O
extent	O
permitted	O
by	O
law	O
;	O
and	O

b	O
.	O

If	O
coverage	O
provided	O
to	O
the	O
additional	O
insured	O
is	O
required	O
by	O
a	O
contract	O
or	O
agreement	O
,	O
the	O
insurance	O
afforded	O
to	O
such	O
additional	O
insured	O
will	O
not	O
be	O
broader	O
than	O
that	O
which	O
you	O
are	O
required	O
by	O
the	O
contract	O
or	O
agreement	O
to	O
provide	O
for	O
such	O
additional	O
insured	O
.	O

2	O
.	O

This	O
insurance	O
does	O
not	O
apply	O
to	O
:	O

a	O
.	O
"	O

injury	O
"	O
,	O
"	O
property	O
damage	O
"	O

"	O

"	O

of	O

for	O

,	O
state	O
or	O
municipality	O
;	O
or	O

"	O

injury	O
"	O
or	O
"	O

"	O

"	O

"	O

"	O
.	O

"	O

"	O

one	O
or	O
more	O

following	O
are	O
attributed	O
to	O
such	O
act	O
:	O

1	O
.	O
The	O
total	O
of	O
insured	O
damage	O
to	O
all	O
types	O
of	O
property	O
exceeds	O
$	O
25,000,000	O
(	O
valued	O
in	O
US	O
dollars	O
)	O
.	O

In	O
determining	O
whether	O
the	O
$	O
25,000,000	O
threshold	O
is	O
exceeded	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
include	O
all	O
insured	O
damage	O
sustained	O
by	O
property	O
of	O
all	O
persons	O
and	O

affected	O
by	O
the	O
terrorism	O
and	O
business	O
interruption	O
losses	O

by	O
owners	O
or	O

of	O
the	O
damaged	O
property	O
.	O

the	O

of	O
this	O

any	O

but	O
for	O

application	O
of	O
any	O
terrorism	O
exclusions	O
;	O
or	O

2	O
.	O
Fifty	O
or	O
more	O
persons	O
sustain	O
death	O
or	O
serious	O
physical	O
injury	O
.	O

For	O

of	O
this	O
provision	O
,	O

injury	O
means	O
:	O

a.	O
Physical	O

that	O

of	O
death	O
;	O
or	O

Protracted	O
and	O

;	O
or	O

c.	O

the	O

of	O
a	O
bodily	O

or	O
organ	O
;	O
or	O

3	O
.	O

terrorism	O

Various	O

in	O
this	O
policy	O
restrict	O
coverage	O
.	O

entire	O
policy	O
carefully	O
to	O

rights	O
,	O

and	O
what	O
is	O
and	O

not	O

.	O

.	O

,	O

"	O

"	O

this	O
insurance	O
.	O

word	O
"	O

"	O

such	O

I	O
–	O
COVERAGES	O

COVERAGE	O
A	O
–	O
BODILY	O
INJURY	O
AND	O
PROPERTY	O
DAMAGE	O
LIABILITY	O

1	O
.	O
Insuring	O
Agreement	O

a	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
pay	O
those	O
sums	O
that	O
the	O
insured	O
becomes	O
legally	O
obligated	O
to	O
pay	O
as	O
damages	O
because	O
of	O
"	O
bodily	O
injury	O
"	O
or	O
"	O
property	O
damage	O
"	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
applies	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
have	O
the	O
right	O
and	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
the	O
insured	O
against	O
any	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
seeking	O
those	O
damages	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
have	O
no	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
the	O
insured	O
against	O
any	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
seeking	O
damages	O
for	O
"	O
bodily	O
injury	O
"	O
or	O
"	O
property	O
damage	O
"	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
does	O
not	O
apply	O
.	O

We	O
may	O
,	O
at	O
our	O
discretion	O
,	O
investigate	O
any	O
"	O
occurrence	O
"	O
and	O
settle	O
any	O
claim	O
or	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
that	O
may	O
result	O
.	O

But	O
:	O

(	O
1	O
)	O
The	O
amount	O
we	O
will	O
pay	O
for	O
damages	O
is	O
limited	O
as	O
described	O
in	O
Section	O
III	O
–	O
Limits	O
Of	O
Insurance	O
;	O
and	O

(	O
2	O
)	O

right	O
and	O

to	O
defend	O

when	O

COVERAGE	O
B	O
–	O
PERSONAL	O
AND	O
ADVERTISING	O
INJURY	O
LIABILITY	O

1	O
.	O
Insuring	O
Agreement	O

a	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
pay	O
those	O
sums	O
that	O
the	O
insured	O
becomes	O
legally	O
obligated	O
to	O
pay	O
as	O
damages	O
because	O
of	O
"	O
personal	O
and	O
advertising	O
injury	O
"	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
applies	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
have	O
the	O
right	O
and	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
the	O
insured	O
against	O
any	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
seeking	O
those	O
damages	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
have	O
no	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
the	O
insured	O
against	O
any	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
seeking	O
damages	O
for	O
"	O
personal	O
and	O
advertising	O
injury	O
"	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
does	O
not	O
apply	O
.	O

We	O
may	O
,	O

,	O

and	O

"	O

1	O
)	O

–	O

Of	O

and	O

)	O

and	O

a	O
.	O

We	O

expenses	O
as	O

below	O
for	O
"	O

injury	O
"	O
caused	O
by	O
an	O
accident	O
:	O

(	O
1	O
)	O
On	O
premises	O
you	O
own	O
or	O
rent	O
;	O

(	O
2	O
)	O

ways	O
next	O
to	O
premises	O
you	O
own	O
or	O
rent	O
;	O
or	O

(	O
3	O
)	O

of	O

operations	O
;	O

provided	O

:	O

(	O
a	O
)	O

takes	O

in	O

"	O
coverage	O
territory	O
"	O
and	O
during	O
the	O
policy	O
period	O
;	O

(	O
b	O
)	O
The	O
expenses	O
are	O
incurred	O
and	O
reported	O
to	O
us	O
within	O
one	O
year	O
of	O
the	O
date	O
of	O
the	O
accident	O
;	O
and	O

(	O
c	O
)	O

injured	O
person	O
submits	O
to	O
examination	O
,	O
at	O
our	O
expense	O
,	O
by	O
physicians	O
of	O
our	O
choice	O
as	O
often	O
as	O
we	O
reasonably	O
require	O
.	O

b.	O

We	O
will	O
make	O
these	O
payments	O
regardless	O
of	O
fault	O
.	O

These	O
payments	O
will	O
not	O
exceed	O
the	O
applicable	O
limit	O
of	O
insurance	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
pay	O
reasonable	O
expenses	O
for	O
:	O

(	O
1	O
)	O
First	O
aid	O

at	O
the	O

of	O
an	O

;	O

(	O
2	O
)	O

,	O

)	O

,	O

,	O

and	O

services	O
.	O

.	O

We	O
will	O
not	O
pay	O
expenses	O
for	O
"	O
bodily	O
injury	O
"	O
:	O

a.	O

Any	O
Insured	O

any	O

,	O

"	O

.	O

SUPPLEMENTARY	O

A	O

1	O
.	O

to	O

any	O
"	O

"	O
against	O
an	O
insured	O

:	O

a.	O

All	O

incur	O
.	O

b.	O

Up	O
to	O
$	O
250	O
for	O

of	O

because	O
of	O

to	O

Bodily	O
Injury	O

Coverage	O
applies	O
.	O

We	O

not	O

to	O

.	O

c.	O

The	O

of	O

to	O

,	O

only	O
for	O
bond	O

of	O
insurance	O
.	O

We	O
do	O
not	O

to	O

these	O

.	O

d.	O

.	O

SECTION	O
IV	O
–	O
COMMERCIAL	O
GENERAL	O
LIABILITY	O
CONDITIONS	O

1	O
.	O
Bankruptcy	O

Bankruptcy	O
or	O
insolvency	O
of	O
the	O
insured	O
or	O
of	O
the	O
insured	O
's	O
estate	O
will	O
not	O
relieve	O
us	O
of	O
our	O
obligations	O
under	O
this	O
Coverage	O
Part	O
.	O

2	O
.	O
Duties	O
In	O
The	O
Event	O
Of	O
Occurrence	O
,	O
Offense	O
,	O
Claim	O
Or	O
Suit	O

a	O
.	O

You	O
must	O
see	O
to	O
it	O
that	O
we	O
are	O
notified	O
as	O
soon	O
as	O
practicable	O
of	O
an	O
"	O
occurrence	O
"	O
or	O
an	O
offense	O
which	O
may	O
result	O
in	O
a	O
claim	O
.	O

To	O
the	O
extent	O
possible	O
,	O
notice	O
should	O
include	O
:	O

(	O
1	O
)	O
How	O
,	O
when	O
and	O
where	O
the	O
"	O
occurrence	O
"	O
or	O
offense	O
took	O
place	O
;	O

(	O
2	O
)	O
The	O
names	O
and	O
addresses	O
of	O
any	O
injured	O
persons	O
and	O
witnesses	O
;	O
and	O

(	O
3	O
)	O
The	O
nature	O
and	O
location	O
of	O
any	O
injury	O
or	O
damage	O
arising	O
out	O
of	O
the	O
"	O
occurrence	O
"	O
or	O
offense	O
.	O

b.	O

If	O
a	O
claim	O
is	O
made	O
or	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
is	O
brought	O
against	O
any	O
insured	O
,	O
you	O
must	O
:	O

(	O
1	O
)	O
Immediately	O
record	O
the	O
specifics	O
of	O
the	O
claim	O
or	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
and	O
the	O
date	O
received	O
;	O
and	O

(	O
2	O
)	O
Notify	O
us	O
as	O
soon	O
as	O
practicable	O
.	O

You	O
must	O
see	O
to	O
it	O
that	O
we	O
receive	O
written	O
notice	O
of	O
the	O
claim	O
or	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
as	O
soon	O
as	O
practicable	O
.	O

c.	O

You	O
and	O
any	O
other	O
involved	O
insured	O
must	O
:	O

(	O
1	O
)	O
Immediately	O
send	O
us	O

of	O
any	O
demands	O
,	O
notices	O
,	O
summonses	O
or	O
legal	O
papers	O
received	O
in	O
connection	O
with	O
the	O
claim	O
or	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
;	O

(	O
2	O
)	O
Authorize	O
us	O
to	O
obtain	O
records	O
and	O
other	O
information	O
;	O

(	O
3	O
)	O
Cooperate	O
with	O
us	O
in	O
the	O
investigation	O
or	O
settlement	O
of	O
the	O
claim	O
or	O
defense	O
against	O
the	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
;	O
and	O

(	O
4	O
)	O
Assist	O
us	O
,	O
upon	O
our	O
request	O
,	O
in	O
the	O
enforcement	O
of	O
any	O
right	O
against	O
any	O
person	O
or	O
organization	O
which	O
may	O
be	O
liable	O
to	O
the	O
insured	O
because	O
of	O
injury	O
or	O
damage	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
may	O
also	O
apply	O
.	O

d.	O

No	O
insured	O
will	O
,	O
except	O
at	O
that	O
insured	O
's	O
own	O
cost	O
,	O
voluntarily	O
make	O
a	O
payment	O
,	O
assume	O
any	O
obligation	O
,	O
or	O
incur	O
any	O
expense	O
,	O
other	O
than	O
for	O
first	O
aid	O
,	O
without	O
our	O
consent	O
.	O

3	O
.	O
Legal	O
Action	O
Against	O
Us	O

No	O
person	O
or	O
organization	O
has	O
a	O
right	O
under	O
this	O
Coverage	O
Part	O
:	O

a	O
.	O

To	O
join	O
us	O
as	O
a	O
party	O
or	O
otherwise	O
bring	O
us	O
into	O
a	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
asking	O
for	O
damages	O
from	O
an	O
insured	O
;	O
or	O

b.	O

To	O
sue	O
us	O
on	O
this	O
Coverage	O
Part	O
unless	O
all	O
of	O
its	O
terms	O
have	O
been	O
fully	O
complied	O
with	O
.	O

A	O
person	O
or	O
organization	O
may	O
sue	O
us	O
to	O
recover	O
on	O
an	O
agreed	O
settlement	O
or	O
on	O
a	O
final	O
judgment	O
against	O
an	O
insured	O
;	O
but	O
we	O
will	O
not	O
be	O
liable	O
for	O
damages	O
that	O
are	O
not	O
payable	O
under	O
the	O
terms	O
of	O
this	O
Coverage	O
Part	O
or	O
that	O
are	O
in	O
excess	O
of	O
the	O
applicable	O
limit	O
of	O
insurance	O
.	O

An	O
agreed	O
settlement	O
means	O
a	O
settlement	O
and	O
release	O
of	O
liability	O
signed	O
by	O
us	O
,	O
the	O
insured	O
and	O
the	O
claimant	O
or	O
the	O
claimant	O
's	O
legal	O
representative	O
.	O

Page	O
12	O
of	O
16	O
©	O
Insurance	B-ORG
Services	I-ORG
Office	I-ORG
,	I-ORG
Inc.	E-ORG
,	O
2012	O
CG	O
00	O
01	O
04	O
13	O

4	O
.	O
Other	O
Insurance	O

If	O
other	O
valid	O
and	O
collectible	O
insurance	O
is	O
available	O
to	O
the	O
insured	O
for	O
a	O
loss	O
we	O
cover	O
under	O
Coverages	O
A	O
or	O
B	O
of	O
this	O
Coverage	O
Part	O
,	O
our	O
obligations	O
are	O
limited	O
as	O
follows	O
:	O

a.	O
Primary	O
Insurance	O

This	O
insurance	O
is	O
primary	O
except	O
when	O
Paragraph	O
b.	O
below	O
applies	O
.	O

If	O
this	O
insurance	O
is	O
primary	O
,	O
our	O
obligations	O
are	O
not	O
affected	O
unless	O
any	O
of	O
the	O
other	O
insurance	O
is	O
also	O
primary	O
.	O

Then	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
share	O
with	O
all	O
that	O
other	O
insurance	O
by	O
the	O
method	O
described	O
in	O
Paragraph	O
c.	O
below	O
.	O

b.	O
Excess	O
Insurance	O

(	O
1	O
)	O
This	O
insurance	O
is	O
excess	O
over	O
:	O

(	O
a	O
)	O
Any	O
of	O
the	O
other	O
insurance	O
,	O
whether	O
primary	O
,	O
excess	O
,	O
contingent	O
or	O
on	O
any	O
other	O
basis	O
:	O

(	O
i	O
)	O
That	O
is	O
Fire	O
,	O
Extended	O
Coverage	O
,	O
Builder	O
's	O
Risk	O
,	O
Installation	O
Risk	O
or	O
similar	O
coverage	O
for	O
"	O
your	O
work	O
"	O
;	O

(	O
ii	O
)	O
That	O
is	O
Fire	O
insurance	O
for	O
premises	O
rented	O
to	O
you	O
or	O
temporarily	O
occupied	O
by	O
you	O
with	O
permission	O
of	O
the	O
owner	O
;	O

(	O
iii	O
)	O
That	O
is	O
insurance	O
purchased	O
by	O
you	O
to	O
cover	O
your	O
liability	O
as	O
a	O
tenant	O
for	O
"	O
property	O
damage	O
"	O
to	O
premises	O
rented	O
to	O
you	O
or	O
temporarily	O
occupied	O
by	O
you	O
with	O
permission	O
of	O
the	O
owner	O
;	O
or	O

(	O
iv	O
)	O
If	O
the	O
loss	O
arises	O
out	O
of	O
the	O
maintenance	O
or	O
use	O
of	O
aircraft	O
,	O
"	O
autos	O
"	O
or	O
watercraft	O
to	O
the	O
extent	O
not	O
subject	O
to	O
Exclusion	O
g.	O
of	O
Section	O
I	O
–	O
Coverage	O
A	O
–	O
Bodily	O
Injury	O
And	O
Property	O
Damage	O
Liability	O
.	O

(	O
b	O
)	O
Any	O
other	O
primary	O
insurance	O
available	O
to	O
you	O
covering	O
liability	O
for	O
damages	O
arising	O
out	O
of	O
the	O
premises	O
or	O
operations	O
,	O
or	O
the	O
products	O
and	O
completed	O
operations	O
,	O
for	O
which	O
you	O
have	O
been	O
added	O
as	O
an	O
additional	O
insured	O
.	O

(	O
2	O
)	O
When	O
this	O
insurance	O
is	O
excess	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
have	O
no	O
duty	O
under	O
Coverages	O
A	O
or	O
B	O
to	O
defend	O
the	O
insured	O
against	O
any	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
if	O
any	O
other	O
insurer	O
has	O
a	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
the	O
insured	O
against	O
that	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
.	O

If	O
no	O
other	O
insurer	O
defends	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
undertake	O
to	O
do	O
so	O
,	O
but	O
we	O
will	O
be	O
entitled	O
to	O
the	O
insured	O
's	O
rights	O
against	O
all	O
those	O
other	O
insurers	O
.	O

(	O
3	O
)	O
When	O
this	O
insurance	O
is	O
excess	O
over	O
other	O
insurance	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
pay	O
only	O
our	O
share	O
of	O
the	O
amount	O
of	O
the	O
loss	O
,	O
if	O
any	O
,	O
that	O
exceeds	O
the	O
sum	O
of	O
:	O

(	O
a	O
)	O
The	O
total	O
amount	O
that	O
all	O
such	O
other	O
insurance	O
would	O
pay	O
for	O
the	O
loss	O
in	O
the	O
absence	O
of	O
this	O
insurance	O
;	O
and	O

(	O
b	O
)	O
The	O
total	O
of	O
all	O
deductible	O
and	O
self	O
-	O
insured	O
amounts	O
under	O
all	O
that	O
other	O
insurance	O
.	O

(	O
4	O
)	O
We	O
will	O
share	O
the	O
remaining	O
loss	O
,	O
if	O
any	O
,	O
with	O
any	O
other	O
insurance	O
that	O
is	O
not	O
described	O
in	O
this	O
Excess	O
Insurance	O
provision	O
and	O
was	O
not	O
bought	O
specifically	O
to	O
apply	O
in	O
excess	O
of	O
the	O
Limits	O
of	O
Insurance	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
Declarations	O
of	O
this	O
Coverage	O
Part	O
.	O

c.	O
Method	O
Of	O
Sharing	O

If	O
all	O
of	O
the	O
other	O
insurance	O
permits	O
contribution	O
by	O
equal	O
shares	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
follow	O
this	O
method	O
also	O
.	O

Under	O
this	O
approach	O
each	O
insurer	O
contributes	O
equal	O
amounts	O
until	O
it	O
has	O
paid	O
its	O
applicable	O
limit	O
of	O
insurance	O
or	O
none	O
of	O
the	O
loss	O
remains	O
,	O
whichever	O
comes	O
first	O
.	O

If	O
any	O
of	O
the	O
other	O
insurance	O
does	O
not	O
permit	O
contribution	O
by	O
equal	O
shares	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
contribute	O
by	O
limits	O
.	O

Under	O
this	O
method	O
,	O
each	O
insurer	O
's	O
share	O
is	O
based	O
on	O
the	O
ratio	O
of	O
its	O
applicable	O
limit	O
of	O
insurance	O
to	O
the	O
total	O
applicable	O
limits	O
of	O
insurance	O
of	O
all	O
insurers	O
.	O

5	O
.	O
Premium	O
Audit	O

a	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
compute	O
all	O
premiums	O
for	O
this	O
Coverage	O
Part	O
in	O
accordance	O
with	O
our	O
rules	O
and	O
rates	O
.	O

b.	O

Premium	O
shown	O
in	O
this	O
Coverage	O
Part	O
as	O
advance	O
premium	O
is	O
a	O
deposit	O
premium	O
only	O
.	O

At	O
the	O
close	O
of	O
each	O
audit	O
period	O
we	O
will	O
compute	O
the	O
earned	O
premium	O
for	O
that	O
period	O
and	O
send	O
notice	O
to	O
the	O
first	O
Named	O
Insured	O
.	O

The	O
due	O
date	O
for	O
audit	O
and	O
retrospective	O
premiums	O
is	O
the	O
date	O
shown	O
as	O
the	O
due	O
date	O
on	O
the	O
bill	O
.	O

If	O
the	O
sum	O
of	O
the	O
advance	O
and	O
audit	O
premiums	O
paid	O
for	O
the	O
policy	O
period	O
is	O
greater	O
than	O
the	O
earned	O
premium	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
return	O
the	O
excess	O
to	O
the	O
first	O
Named	O
Insured	O
.	O

c.	O

The	O
first	O
Named	O
Insured	O
must	O
keep	O
records	O
of	O
the	O
information	O
we	O
need	O
for	O

,	O
and	O

.	O

.	O

SECTION	O
V	O
–	O
DEFINITIONS	O

1	O
.	O
"	O
Advertisement	O
"	O
means	O
a	O
notice	O
that	O
is	O
broadcast	O
or	O
published	O
to	O
the	O
general	O
public	O
or	O
specific	O
market	O
segments	O
about	O
your	O
goods	O
,	O
products	O
or	O
services	O
for	O
the	O
purpose	O
of	O
attracting	O
customers	O
or	O
supporters	O
.	O

For	O
the	O
purposes	O
of	O
this	O
definition	O
:	O

a	O
.	O

Notices	O
that	O
are	O
published	O
include	O
material	O
placed	O
on	O
the	O
Internet	O
or	O
on	O
similar	O
electronic	O
means	O
of	O
communication	O
;	O
and	O

b.	O

Regarding	O
web	O
sites	O
,	O
only	O
that	O
part	O
of	O
a	O
web	O
site	O
that	O
is	O
about	O
your	O
goods	O
,	O
products	O
or	O
services	O
for	O
the	O
purposes	O
of	O
attracting	O
customers	O
or	O
supporters	O
is	O
considered	O
an	O
advertisement	O
.	O

2	O
.	O
"	O
Auto	O
"	O
means	O
:	O

a.	O

A	O
land	O
motor	O
vehicle	O
,	O
trailer	O
or	O
semitrailer	O
designed	O
for	O
travel	O
on	O
public	O
roads	O
,	O
including	O
any	O
attached	O
machinery	O
or	O
equipment	O
;	O
or	O

b	O
.	O

Any	O
other	O
land	O
vehicle	O
that	O
is	O
subject	O
to	O
a	O
compulsory	O
or	O
financial	O
responsibility	O
law	O
or	O
other	O
motor	O
vehicle	O
insurance	O
law	O
where	O
it	O
is	O
licensed	O
or	O
principally	O
garaged	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
"	O
auto	O
"	O
does	O
not	O
include	O
"	O
mobile	O
equipment	O
"	O
.	O

3	O
.	O
"	O
Bodily	O
injury	O
"	O
means	O
bodily	O
injury	O
,	O
sickness	O
or	O
disease	O
sustained	O
by	O
a	O
person	O
,	O
including	O
death	O
resulting	O
from	O
any	O
of	O
these	O
at	O
any	O
time	O
.	O

4	O
.	O
"	O
Coverage	O
territory	O
"	O
means	O
:	O

a.	O

States	O
of	O

(	O

its	O

and	O

and	O

b.	O

waters	O

if	O

or	O

of	O

any	O

or	O

All	O

of	O
the	O
world	O
if	O
the	O

or	O

arises	O
out	O
of	O
:	O

(	O
1	O
)	O

products	O

or	O

by	O
you	O
in	O
the	O

in	O

;	O

(	O

your	O

or	O

(	O
3	O
)	O

and	O

"	O

,	O

in	O

of	O

.	O

of	O

or	O

:	O

(	O
1	O
)	O
That	O

a	O
railroad	O
for	O
"	O
bodily	O
injury	O
"	O
or	O
"	O

"	O

of	O

or	O

,	O

-	O

,	O

,	O

(	O
2	O
)	O

an	O

,	O

or	O

for	O

or	O

of	O
:	O

(	O
a	O
)	O

,	O

to	O
prepare	O
or	O

,	O
maps	O

20	O
.	O
"	O
Volunteer	O
worker	O
"	O
means	O
a	O
person	O
who	O
is	O
not	O
your	O
"	O
employee	O
"	O
,	O
and	O
who	O
donates	O

or	O

work	O
and	O
acts	O
at	O
the	O
direction	O
of	O
and	O
within	O
the	O
scope	O
of	O
duties	O
determined	O
by	O
you	O
,	O
and	O
is	O
not	O
paid	O
a	O
fee	O
,	O
salary	O
or	O
other	O
compensation	O
by	O
you	O
or	O
anyone	O
else	O
for	O
their	O
work	O
performed	O
for	O
you	O
.	O

ADVISORY	O
NOTICE	O
TO	O
POLICYHOLDERS	O

No	O
coverage	O
is	O
provided	O
by	O
this	O
Policyholder	O
Notice	O
nor	O
can	O
it	O
be	O
construed	O
to	O
replace	O
any	O
provisions	O
of	O
your	O
policy	O
.	O

You	O
should	O
read	O
your	O
policy	O
and	O
review	O
your	O
Declarations	O
page	O
for	O
complete	O
information	O
on	O
the	O
coverages	O
you	O
are	O
provided	O
.	O

This	O
Notice	O
provides	O
information	O
concerning	O
possible	O
impact	O
on	O
your	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
due	O
to	O
directives	O
issued	O
by	O
OFAC	S-ORG
.	O

Please	O
read	O
this	O
Notice	O
carefully	O
.	O

The	O
Office	B-ORG
of	I-ORG
Foreign	I-ORG
Assets	I-ORG
Control	E-ORG
(	O
OFAC	S-ORG
)	O
administers	O
and	O
enforces	O
sanctions	O
policy	O
,	O
based	O
on	O
Presidential	O
declarations	O
of	O
"	O
national	O
emergency	O
"	O
.	O

OFAC	S-ORG
has	O
identified	O
and	O
listed	O
numerous	O
:	O

•	O
Foreign	O
agents	O
;	O

•	O
Front	O
organizations	O
;	O

•	O

Terrorists	O
;	O

•	O
Terrorist	O
organizations	O
;	O
and	O

•	O
Narcotics	O
traffickers	O
;	O

as	O
"	O
Specially	O
Designated	O
Nationals	O
and	O
Blocked	O
Persons	O
"	O
.	O

This	O
list	O
can	O
be	O
located	O
on	O
the	O
Un	O
ited	O
States	O
Treasury	O
's	O
web	O
site	O
–	O
http//www.treas.gov/ofac.	S-WEBSITE

In	O
accordance	O
with	O
OFAC	S-ORG
regulations	O
,	O
if	O
it	O
is	O
determined	O
that	O
you	O
or	O
any	O
other	O
insured	O
,	O
or	O
any	O
person	O
or	O
entity	O
claiming	O
the	O
benefits	O
of	O
this	O
insurance	O
has	O
violated	O
U.S.	O
sanctions	O
law	O
or	O
is	O
a	O
Specially	O
Designated	O
National	O
and	O
Blocked	O
Person	O
,	O
as	O
identified	O
by	O
OFAC	S-ORG
,	O
this	O
insurance	O
will	O
be	O
considered	O
a	O
blocked	O
or	O
frozen	O
contract	O
and	O
all	O
provisions	O
of	O
this	O
insurance	O
are	O
immediately	O
subject	O
to	O
OFAC	S-ORG
.	O

When	O
an	O
insurance	O
policy	O
is	O
considered	O
to	O
be	O
such	O
a	O
blocked	O
or	O

contract	O
,	O

nor	O

may	O

.	O

and	O

also	O

POLICYHOLDER	O
DISCLOSURE	O
NOTICE	O
OF	O
TERRORISM	O
INSURANCE	O
COVERAGE	O

As	O
we	O
previously	O
notified	O
you	O
,	O
as	O
required	O
by	O
the	O
Terrorism	O
Risk	O
Insurance	O
Act	O
,	O
as	O
amended	O
in	O
2015	O
,	O
you	O
were	O
offered	O
the	O
opportunity	O
to	O
purchase	O
insurance	O
coverage	O
for	O
losses	O
resulting	O
from	O
acts	O
of	O
terrorism	O
,	O
as	O
defined	O
in	O
Section	O
102	O
(	O
1	O
)	O
of	O
the	O
Act	O
:	O
The	O
term	O
“	O
act	O
of	O
terrorism	O
”	O
means	O
any	O
act	O
or	O
acts	O
that	O
are	O
certified	O
by	O
the	O
Secretary	O
of	O
the	O
Treasury	O
,	O
in	O
consultation	O
with	O
the	O
Secretary	O
of	O
Homeland	O
Security	O
,	O
and	O
the	O
Attorney	O
General	O
of	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
-	O
to	O
be	O
an	O
act	O
of	O
terrorism	O
;	O
to	O
be	O
a	O
violent	O
act	O
or	O
an	O
act	O
that	O
is	O
dangerous	O
to	O
human	O
life	O
,	O
property	O
,	O
or	O
infrastructure	O
;	O
to	O
have	O
resulted	O
in	O
damage	O
within	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
,	O
or	O
outside	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
in	O
the	O
case	O
of	O
an	O
air	O
carrier	O
or	O
vessel	O
or	O
the	O
premises	O
of	O
a	O
United	O
States	O
mission	O
;	O
and	O
to	O
have	O
been	O
committed	O
by	O
an	O
individual	O
or	O
individuals	O
as	O
part	O
of	O
an	O
effort	O
to	O
coerce	O
the	O
civilian	O
population	O
of	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
or	O
to	O
influence	O
the	O
policy	O
or	O
affect	O
the	O
conduct	O
of	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
Government	O
by	O
coercion	O
.	O

YOU	O
SHOULD	O
KNOW	O
THAT	O
WHERE	O
COVERAGE	O
IS	O
PROVIDED	O
BY	O
THIS	O
POLICY	O
FOR	O
LOSSES	O
RESULTING	O
FROM	O
CERTIFIED	O
ACTS	O
OF	O
TERRORISM	O
,	O
SUCH	O
LOSSES	O
MAY	O
BE	O
PARTIALLY	O
REIMBURSED	O
BY	O
THE	O
UNITED	O
STATES	O
GOVERNMENT	O
UNDER	O
A	O
FORMULA	O
ESTABLISHED	O
BY	O
FEDERAL	O
LAW	O
.	O

HOWEVER	O
,	O
YOUR	O
POLICY	O
MAY	O
CONTAIN	O
OTHER	O
EXCLUSIONS	O
WHICH	O
MIGHT	O
AFFECT	O
YOUR	O
COVERAGE	O
,	O
SUCH	O
AS	O
AN	O
EXCLUSION	O
FOR	O
NUCLEAR	O
EVENTS	O
.	O

UNDER	O
THE	O
FORMULA	O
,	O
THE	O
UNITED	O
STATES	O
GOVERNMENT	O
GENERALLY	O
REIMBURSES	O
85	O
%	O
THROUGH	O
2015	O
;	O
84	O
%	O
BEGINNING	O
ON	O
JANUARY	B-DATE
1	I-DATE
,	I-DATE

JANUARY	B-DATE

,	O

.	O

EXCEED	O
$	O
100	O

YOUR	O

REDUCED	O
.	O

of	O

as	O

CONDITIONS	O

the	O

conditions	O
.	O

A.	O
Cancellation	O
1	O
.	O

first	O

Insured	O

in	O
the	O

-	O

tions	O

-	O

to	O
us	O

cancella	O
-	O
tion	O
.	O

2	O
.	O

may	O

or	O
deliv	O
-	O

to	O

of	O

to	O

on	O
that	O

.	O

5	O
.	O

this	O

,	O
we	O
will	O

the	O
first	O

due	O
.	O

will	O
be	O
pro	O
rata	O
.	O

may	O
be	O
less	O
than	O

.	O

will	O
be	O
ef	O
-	O
fective	O
even	O
if	O
we	O

not	O
made	O
or	O

a	O

.	O

.	O

notice	O
is	O

of	O
mailing	O
will	O
be	O
suffi-	O
cient	O

of	O
notice	O

B	O
.	O
Changes	O
This	O
policy	O
contains	O
all	O
the	O
agreements	O
between	O
you	O
and	O
us	O
concerning	O
the	O
insurance	O

.	O

first	O
Named	O

shown	O
in	O
the	O
Declara	O
-	O
tions	O
is	O
authorized	O
to	O
make	O
changes	O
in	O
the	O
terms	O
of	O
this	O
policy	O
with	O
our	O
consent	O
.	O

This	O
policy	O
's	O
terms	O
can	O
be	O
amended	O
or	O
waived	O
only	O
by	O
endorsement	O
issued	O
by	O
us	O
and	O
made	O
a	O
part	O
of	O
this	O
policy	O
.	O

C.	O

Your	O

Records	O

may	O

and	O

-	O

dur	O
-	O

policy	O
period	O

up	O
to	O
three	O
years	O
after	O
-	O
ward	O
.	O

D.	O
Inspections	O
And	O
Surveys	O
1	O
.	O
We	O
have	O
the	O
right	O
to	O
:	O
a.	O

Make	O
inspections	O
and	O
surveys	O
at	O
any	O
time	O
;	O

b.	O

Give	O
you	O
reports	O
on	O
the	O
conditions	O
we	O
find	O
;	O
and	O

c.	O

Recommend	O
changes	O
.	O
2	O
.	O
We	O
are	O
not	O
obligated	O
to	O
make	O
any	O
inspections	O
,	O

surveys	O
,	O
reports	O
or	O
recommendations	O
and	O
any	O
such	O
actions	O
we	O
do	O
undertake	O
relate	O
only	O
to	O
in	O
-	O
surability	O
and	O
the	O
premiums	O
to	O
be	O
charged	O
.	O

We	O
do	O
not	O
make	O
safety	O
inspections	O
.	O

We	O
do	O
not	O
un	O
-	O
dertake	O
to	O
perform	O
the	O
duty	O
of	O
any	O
person	O
or	O
organization	O
to	O
provide	O
for	O
the	O
health	O
or	O
safety	O
of	O
workers	O
or	O
the	O
public	O
.	O

And	O
we	O
do	O
not	O
warrant	O
that	O
conditions	O
:	O

a	O
.	O

Are	O
safe	O
or	O
healthful	O
;	O
or	O
b.	O
Comply	O
with	O
laws	O
,	O
regulations	O
,	O
codes	O
or	O

standards	O
.	O

surance	O

”	O

any	O

not	O

to	O
any	O
“	O
concussion	O
effect	O
”	O
,	O
“	O
flashpot	O
”	O
or	O
“	O
smokepot	O
”	O
that	O
is	O
induced	O
electrically	O
in	O
a	O
cylinder	O
with	O
no	O
projectile	O
,	O
wadding	O
or	O

is	O
used	O
to	O
create	O
visual	O
effects	O
and	O
/	O
or	O
an	O

noise	O
.	O

B	O
.	O

the	O
purpose	O
of	O
this	O
endorsement	O

the	O
following	O
definitions	O
apply	O
:	O
1	O
.	O

Concussion	O
effect	O
”	O
means	O
an	O
effect	O

to	O

a	O

noise	O
and	O
a	O
violent	O
jarring	O
shock	O
for	O

dramatic	O
effect	O
.	O
2	O
.	O
“	O
Flashpot	O
”	O
means	O
a	O
device	O
containing	O
flashpowder	O
and	O
intended	O
to	O
produce	O
a	O
flash	O
of	O
light	O
and	O
capable	O
of	O

directing	O
the	O
flash	O
in	O
an	O
upward	O
direction	O
.	O

3	O
.	O
“	O
Smokepot	O
”	O
is	O
a	O
pyrotechnic	O
device	O
used	O
to	O
create	O
smoke	O
.	O

.	O

not	O

GENERAL	O
AGGREGATE	O
LIMIT	O
(	O
PER	O
OPERATION	O
,	O
DESIGNATED	O
EVENT	O
,	O
OR	O
PREMISES	O
)	O

This	O
endorsement	O
modifies	O
insurance	O
provided	O
under	O
the	O
following	O
:	O

COMMERCIAL	O
GENERAL	O
LIABILITY	O
COVERAGE	O
PART	O

SCHEDULE	O

Designated	O
Covered	O
Event	O
,	O
Operations	O
,	O
or	O
Premises	O
:	O
per	O
production	O

Information	O
required	O
to	O
complete	O
this	O

Schedule	O
,	O
if	O
not	O
shown	O
above	O
,	O
will	O
be	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
Declarations	O
.	O

A	O
.	O

For	O
all	O
sums	O
which	O
the	O
insured	O
becomes	O
legally	O
obligated	O
to	O
pay	O
as	O
damages	O
caused	O
by	O
“	O
occurrences	O
”	O
under	O
Coverage	O
A	O
(	O
Section	O
I	O
)	O
,	O
and	O
for	O
all	O
medical	O
expenses	O
caused	O
by	O
accidents	O
under	O
Coverage	O
C	O
(	O
Section	O
I	O
)	O
,	O
which	O
can	O
be	O
attributed	O
only	O
to	O
a	O
single	O
designated	O
location	O
,	O
operation	O
,	O
or	O
event	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
Schedule	O
above	O
:	O

1	O
.	O
A	O
separate	O
Designated	O
Event	O
,	O
Operation	O
,	O
or	O
Premises	O
General	O
Aggregate	O
Limit	O
applies	O
to	O
each	O

designated	O
event	O
,	O
operation	O
,	O
or	O
premises	O
,	O
and	O
that	O
limit	O
is	O
equal	O
to	O
the	O
amount	O
of	O
the	O
General	O
Aggregate	O
Limit	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
Declarations	O
.	O

2	O
.	O

The	O
Designated	O
Event	O
,	O
Operation	O
,	O
or	O
Premises	O
General	O
Aggregate	O
Limit	O
is	O
the	O
most	O
we	O
will	O
pay	O
for	O
the	O
sum	O
of	O
all	O
damages	O
under	O
Coverage	O
A	O
,	O
except	O
damages	O
because	O
of	O
“	O
bodily	O
injury	O
”	O
or	O
“	O
property	O
damage	O
”	O
included	O
in	O
the	O
“	O
products	O
-	O
completed	O
operations	O
hazard	O
”	O
,	O
and	O
for	O
medical	O
expenses	O
under	O
Coverage	O
C	O
regardless	O
of	O
the	O
number	O
of	O
:	O
a	O
.	O
Insureds	O
;	O
b.	O
Claims	O
made	O
or	O
“	O
suits	O
”	O
brought	O
;	O
or	O
c.	O
Persons	O
or	O
organizations	O
making	O
claims	O
or	O
bringing	O
“	O
suits	O
”	O
.	O

3	O
.	O

Any	O
payments	O
made	O
under	O
Coverage	O
A	O
for	O
damages	O
or	O
under	O
Coverage	O
C	O
for	O
medical	O
expenses	O
shall	O
reduce	O
the	O
Designated	O
Event	O
,	O
Operation	O
,	O
or	O
Premises	O
General	O
Aggregate	O
Limit	O
for	O
that	O
designated	O
Event	O
,	O
Operation	O
,	O
or	O
Premises	O
.	O
Such	O
payments	O
shall	O
not	O
reduce	O
the	O
General	O
Aggregate	O
Limit	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
Declarations	O
nor	O
shall	O
they	O
reduce	O
any	O
other	O
Designated	O
Event	O
,	O
Operation	O
,	O
or	O
Premises	O
General	O
Aggregate	O
Limit	O
for	O
any	O
other	O
designated	O
Event	O
,	O
Operations	O
,	O
or	O
Premises	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
Schedule	O
above	O
.	O

4	O
.	O

The	O
limits	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
Declarations	O
for	O
Each	O
Occurrence	O
and	O
Medical	O
Expense	O
continue	O
to	O
apply	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
instead	O
of	O
being	O
subject	O
to	O
the	O
General	O
Aggregate	O
Limit	O
shown	O
in	O
the	O
Declarations	O
,	O
such	O
limits	O
will	O
be	O
subject	O
to	O
the	O
applicable	O
Designated	O
Event	O
,	O
Operation	O
,	O
or	O
Premises	O
General	O
Aggregate	O
Limit	O

law	O
;	O
and	O

2	O
.	O

coverage	O
provided	O
to	O
the	O

insured	O
is	O

by	O
a	O

or	O

A	O
.	O

The	O
following	O
exclusion	O
is	O
added	O
:	O

This	O
insurance	O
does	O
not	O
apply	O
to	O
:	O

TERRORISM	O

"	O
Any	O
injury	O
or	O
damage	O
"	O
arising	O
,	O
directly	O
or	O
indirectly	O
,	O
out	O
of	O
a	O
"	O
certified	O
act	O
of	O
terrorism	O
"	O
,	O
or	O
out	O
of	O
an	O
"	O
other	O
act	O
of	O
terrorism	O
"	O
that	O
is	O
committed	O
outside	O
of	O
the	O
United	O
States	O
(	O
including	O
its	O
territories	O
and	O
possessions	O
and	O
Puerto	O
Rico	O
)	O
,	O
but	O
within	O
the	O
"	O
coverage	O
territory	O
"	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
with	O
respect	O
to	O
an	O
"	O
other	O
act	O
of	O
terrorism	O
"	O
,	O
this	O
exclusion	O
applies	O
only	O
when	O
one	O
or	O
more	O
of	O
the	O
following	O
are	O
attributed	O
to	O
such	O
act	O
:	O

1	O
.	O
The	O
total	O
of	O
insured	O
damage	O
to	O
all	O
types	O
of	O
property	O
exceeds	O
$	O
25,000,000	O
(	O
valued	O
in	O
US	O
dollars	O
)	O
.	O

In	O
determining	O
whether	O
the	O
$	O
25,000,000	O
threshold	O
is	O
exceeded	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
include	O
all	O
insured	O
damage	O
sustained	O
by	O
property	O
of	O
all	O
persons	O
and	O
entities	O
affected	O
by	O
the	O
terrorism	O
and	O
business	O
interruption	O
losses	O
sustained	O
by	O
owners	O
or	O
occupants	O
of	O
the	O
damaged	O
property	O
.	O

For	O
the	O
purpose	O
of	O
this	O
provision	O
,	O
insured	O
damage	O
means	O
damage	O
that	O
is	O
covered	O
by	O
any	O
insurance	O
plus	O
damage	O
that	O
would	O
be	O
covered	O
by	O
any	O
insurance	O
but	O
for	O
the	O
application	O
of	O
any	O
terrorism	O
exclusions	O
;	O
or	O

2	O
.	O
Fifty	O
or	O
more	O
persons	O
sustain	O
death	O
or	O
serious	O
physical	O
injury	O
.	O

For	O
the	O
purposes	O
of	O
this	O
provision	O
,	O
serious	O
physical	O
injury	O
means	O
:	O

a.	O
Physical	O
injury	O
that	O
involves	O
a	O
substantial	O
risk	O
of	O
death	O
;	O
or	O

b.	O

Protracted	O
and	O
obvious	O
physical	O
disfigurement	O
;	O
or	O

c.	O

Protracted	O
loss	O
of	O
or	O
impairment	O
of	O
the	O
function	O
of	O
a	O
bodily	O
member	O
or	O
organ	O
;	O
or	O

3	O
.	O
The	O
terrorism	O
involves	O
the	O
use	O
,	O
release	O
or	O
escape	O
of	O
nuclear	O
materials	O
,	O
or	O
directly	O
or	O
indirectly	O
results	O
in	O
nuclear	O
reaction	O
or	O
radiation	O
or	O
radioactive	O
contamination	O
;	O
or	O

4	O
.	O
The	O
terrorism	O
is	O
carried	O
out	O
by	O
means	O
of	O
the	O
dispersal	O
or	O
application	O
of	O
pathogenic	O
or	O

biological	O
or	O
chemical	O
materials	O
;	O
or	O

5	O
.	O
Pathogenic	O
or	O
poisonous	O
biological	O
or	O
chemical	O
materials	O
are	O
released	O
,	O

that	O

of	O

terrorism	O
was	O

.	O

With	O

to	O

,	O

1	O
.	O
and	O
2	O
.	O

to	O

"	O

"	O

.	O

Coverage	O
Part	O

Coverage	O

–	O

Dwellings	O
,	O
Appurtenant	O
Structures	O
And	O
Household	O
Personal	O
Property	O
Coverage	O
Form	O

a	O
.	O

may	O

not	O
to	O

any	O

,	O

(	O
1	O
)	O
The	O
nonrenewal	O

to	O

;	O

(	O
2	O
)	O
The	O
Commissioner	O
of	O
Insurance	O
finds	O
that	O
the	O
exposure	O
to	O

will	O

or	O
place	O

in	O
a	O

.	O

to	O
,	O
a	O

)	O

:	O

2	O
.	O
Exclusions	O

This	O
insurance	O
does	O
not	O
apply	O
to	O
:	O

p.	O
Access	O
Or	O
Disclosure	O
Of	O
Confidential	O
Or	O
Personal	O
Information	O
And	O
Data	O
-	O
related	O
Liability	O

Damages	O
arising	O
out	O
of	O
:	O

(	O
1	O
)	O
Any	O
access	O
to	O
or	O
disclosure	O
of	O
any	O
person	O
's	O
or	O
organization	O
's	O
confidential	O
or	O
personal	O
information	O
,	O
including	O

,	O

,	O
processing	O
methods	O
,	O

,	O

information	O
,	O

information	O
,	O
health	O
information	O
or	O
any	O
other	O
type	O
of	O
nonpublic	O
information	O
;	O
or	O

(	O
2	O
)	O
The	O
loss	O
of	O
,	O
loss	O
of	O
use	O
of	O
,	O
damage	O
to	O
,	O
corruption	O
of	O
,	O
inability	O
to	O
access	O
,	O
or	O
inability	O
to	O
manipulate	O
electronic	O
data	O
.	O

This	O
exclusion	O
applies	O
even	O
if	O
damages	O
are	O
claimed	O
for	O
notification	O
costs	O
,	O
credit	O
monitoring	O
expenses	O
,	O
forensic	O
expenses	O
,	O
public	O
relations	O
expenses	O
or	O
any	O
other	O
loss	O
,	O
cost	O
or	O
expense	O
incurred	O
by	O
you	O
or	O
others	O
arising	O
out	O
of	O
that	O
which	O
is	O
described	O
in	O
Paragraph	O
(	O
1	O
)	O
or	O
(	O
2	O
)	O
above	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
unless	O
Paragraph	O
(	O
1	O
)	O
above	O
applies	O
,	O
this	O
exclusion	O
does	O
not	O
apply	O
to	O
damages	O
because	O
of	O
"	O
bodily	O
injury	O
"	O
.	O

As	O
used	O
in	O
this	O
exclusion	O
,	O
electronic	O
data	O
means	O
information	O
,	O
facts	O
or	O
programs	O
stored	O
as	O
or	O
on	O
,	O
created	O
or	O
used	O
on	O
,	O
or	O
transmitted	O
to	O
or	O
from	O
computer	O
software	O
,	O
including	O
systems	O
and	O
applications	O
software	O
,	O
hard	O
or	O
floppy	O
disks	O
,	O
CD	O
-	O
ROMs	O
,	O
tapes	O
,	O
drives	O
,	O
cells	O
,	O
data	O
processing	O
devices	O
or	O
any	O
other	O
media	O
which	O
are	O
used	O
with	O
electronically	O
controlled	O
equipment	O
.	O

B	O
.	O

The	O
following	O
is	O
added	O
to	O
Paragraph	O
2	O
.	O
Exclusions	O
of	O
Section	O
I	O
–	O
Coverage	O
B	O
–	O
Personal	O

And	O
Advertising	O
Injury	O
Liability	O
:	O

2	O
.	O
Exclusions	O

This	O
insurance	O
does	O

GENERAL	O
LIABILITY	O
COVERAGE	O
FORM	O

Various	O

in	O
this	O
policy	O
restrict	O
coverage	O
.	O

Read	O
the	O
entire	O
policy	O
carefully	O
to	O
determine	O
rights	O
,	O
duties	O
and	O
what	O
is	O
and	O
is	O
not	O
covered	O
.	O

this	O
policy	O
the	O

"	O

"	O
and	O
"	O

"	O
refer	O
to	O
the	O

or	O

as	O
a	O

.	O

"	O

,	O
"	O

"	O
and	O
"	O

"	O

to	O

this	O
insurance	O
.	O

word	O
"	O

"	O
means	O

such	O

.	O

COVERAGES	O

COVERAGE	O
A	O
–	O
BODILY	O
INJURY	O
AND	O
PROPERTY	O
DAMAGE	O
LIABILITY	O

1	O
.	O
Insuring	O
Agreement	O

a	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
pay	O
those	O
sums	O
that	O
the	O
insured	O
becomes	O
legally	O
obligated	O
to	O
pay	O
as	O
damages	O
because	O
of	O
"	O
bodily	O
injury	O
"	O
or	O
"	O
property	O
damage	O
"	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
applies	O
.	O

We	O
will	O
have	O
the	O
right	O
and	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
the	O
insured	O
against	O
any	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
seeking	O
those	O
damages	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
we	O
will	O
have	O
no	O
duty	O
to	O
defend	O
the	O
insured	O
against	O
any	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
seeking	O
damages	O
for	O
"	O
bodily	O
injury	O
"	O
or	O
"	O
property	O
damage	O
"	O
to	O
which	O
this	O
insurance	O
does	O
not	O
apply	O
.	O

We	O
may	O
,	O
at	O
our	O
discretion	O
,	O
investigate	O
any	O
"	O
occurrence	O
"	O
and	O
settle	O
any	O
claim	O
or	O
"	O
suit	O
"	O
that	O
may	O
result	O
.	O

But	O
:	O

(	O
1	O
)	O

will	O

for	O

is	O

described	O
in	O
Section	O
III	O
–	O

Of	O
Insurance	O
;	O
and	O

and	O

of	O

)	O
